 10 /**
 11  * Event for a binding ready.<br>
 12  * It is invoked whenever a binding is ready to control.<br>
 13  * 
 14  * @name iot_binding_ready 
 15  * @event
 16  * @since 1.22.2
 17  * @see
 18  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
 19  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
 20  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
 21  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
 22  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
 23  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
 24  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
 25  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
 26  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
 27  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
 28  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
 29  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
 30  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
 31  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
 32  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
 33  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
 34  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
 35  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
 36  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
 37  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
 38  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
 39  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
 40  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
 41  * @example
 42  * document.addEventListener(
 43  *      "iot_binding_ready", 
 44  *      function (param) {
 45  *          // {String} param.bindingId - binding ID ready to conrol.
 46  *          console.log(
 47  *              "Event 'iot_binding_ready' is received.\n" +
 48  *              "bindingId = " + param.bindingId + "\n" +
 49  *          );
 50  *      },
 51  *      false
 52  * );
 53  */
 54 
 55 /**
 56  * Event for the discovery of a thing.<br>
 57  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a thing is discovered in the bridge "scan" mode.<br>
 58  * 
 59  * @name iot_thing_discovered 
 60  * @event
 61  * @since 1.22.2
 62  * @see
 63  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
 64  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
 65  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
 66  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
 67  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
 68  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
 69  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
 70  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
 71  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
 72  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
 73  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
 74  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
 75  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
 76  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
 77  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
 78  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
 79  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
 80  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
 81  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
 82  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
 83  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
 84  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
 85  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
 86  * @example
 87  * document.addEventListener(
 88  *      "iot_thing_discovered", 
 89  *      function (param) {
 90  *          // {String} param.bindingId - binding ID of the bridge a thing is discovered.
 91  *          // {String} param.thingUid - thing UID to be discovered.
 92  *          // {String} param.thingId - thing ID.
 93  *          // {String} param.label - thing label.
 94  *          console.log(
 95  *              "Event 'iot_thing_discovered' is received.\n" +
 96  *              "bindingId = " + param.bindingId + "\n" +
 97  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid + "\n" +
 98  *              "thingId = " + param.thingId + "\n" +
 99  *              "label = " + param.label
100  *          );
101  *      },
102  *      false
103  * );
104  */
105 
106 /**
107  * Event for the status change of a bridge.<br>
108  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a bridge status is changed.<br>
109  * 
110  * @name iot_bridge_status_changed 
111  * @event
112  * @since 1.22.2
113  * @see
114  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
115  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
116  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
117  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
118  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
119  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
120  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
121  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
122  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
123  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
124  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
125  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
126  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
127  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
128  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
129  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
130  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
131  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
132  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
133  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
134  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
135  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
136  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
137  * @example
138  * document.addEventListener(
139  *      "iot_bridge_status_changed", 
140  *      function (param) {
141  *          // {String} param.bridgeUid - bridge UID.
142  *          // {String} param.status - the bridge status after the change. "scan" for scan status, "normal" for normal (non-scan) status.
143  *          console.log("Event 'iot_bridge_status_changed' is received.\n" +
144  *              "bridgeUid = " + param.bridgeUid + "\n" +
145  *              "status = " + param.status
146  *          );
147  *      },
148  *      false
149  * );
150  */
151 
152 /**
153  * Event for the registration of a new thing.<br>
154  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a thing is registered in the bridge "scan" mode.<br>
155  * 
156  * @name iot_thing_registered 
157  * @event
158  * @since 1.22.2
159  * @see
160  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
161  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
162  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
163  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
164  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
165  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
166  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
167  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
168  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
169  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
170  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
171  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
172  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
173  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
174  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
175  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
176  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
177  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
178  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
179  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
180  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
181  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
182  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
183  * @example
184  * document.addEventListener(
185  *      "iot_thing_registered", 
186  *      function (param) {
187  *          // {String} param.thingUid : new thing UID
188  *          console.log(
189  *              "Event 'iot_thing_registered' is received.\n" +
190  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
191  *          );
192  *      },
193  *      false
194  * );
195  */
196 
197 /**
198  * Event for the rejection to register a discovered thing.<br>
199  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a discovered thing is rejected to register in the bridge "scan" mode.<br>
200  * 
201  * @name iot_thing_rejected
202  * @event
203  * @since 1.22.2
204  * @see
205  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
206  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
207  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
208  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
209  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
210  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
211  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
212  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
213  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
214  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
215  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
216  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
217  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
218  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
219  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
220  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
221  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
222  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
223  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
224  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
225  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
226  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
227  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
228  * @example
229  * document.addEventListener(
230  *      "iot_thing_rejected", 
231  *      function (param) {
232  *          // {String} param.thingUid - thing UID.
233  *          console.log(
234  *              "Event 'iot_thing_rejected' is received.\n" +
235  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
236  *          );
237  *      },
238  *      false
239  * );
240  */
241 
242 /**
243  * Event for the report of a component of a thing.<br>
244  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a binding reports the component.<br>
245  * 
246  * @name iot_component_reported
247  * @event
248  * @since 1.22.2
249  * @see
250  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
251  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
252  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
253  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
254  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
255  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
256  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
257  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
258  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
259  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
260  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
261  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
262  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
263  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
264  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
265  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
266  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
267  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
268  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
269  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
270  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
271  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
272  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
273  * @example
274  * document.addEventListener(
275  *      "iot_component_reported", 
276  *      function (param) {
277  *          // {String} param.thingUid - thing UID.
278  *          // {String} param.componentId - component ID.
279  *          // {Object} param.fromValue - |ComponentValue|, // previous component value of changed
280  *          // {Object} param.toValue - |ComponentValue|, // later component value of changed
281  *              // {Object} |ComponentValue| - json object of a component value
282  *              //     {
283  *              //       "valueType": |string|, // "Unknown", "String", "Boolean", "Variables", "Double", "Float", "Int8", "Int16", "Int32", "Int64", "UInt8", "UInt16", "UInt32", "UInt64"
284  *              //       "value": |string|, // value
285  *              //       "additionalValue": |string|, // custom additional value as a string
286  *              //     }
287  *          console.log(
288  *              "Event 'iot_component_reported' is received.\n" +
289  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid + "\n" +
290  *              "componentId = " + param.componentId + "\n" +
291  *              "fromValue = " + JSON.stringify(param.fromValue) + "\n" +
292  *              "toValue = " + JSON.stringify(param.toValue)
293  *          );
294  *      },
295  *      false
296  * );
297  */
298 
299 /**
300  * Event for the unregistration of a registered thing.<br>
301  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a registered thing is unregistered.<br>
302  * 
303  * @name iot_thing_unregistered 
304  * @event
305  * @since 1.22.2
306  * @see
307  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
308  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
309  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
310  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
311  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
312  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
313  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
314  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
315  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
316  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
317  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
318  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
319  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
320  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
321  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
322  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
323  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
324  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
325  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
326  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
327  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
328  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
329  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
330  * @example
331  * document.addEventListener(
332  *      "iot_thing_unregistered", 
333  *      function (param) {
334  *          // {String} param.thingUid : thing UID.
335  *          console.log(
336  *              "Event 'iot_thing_unregistered' is received.\n" +
337  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
338  *          );
339  *      },
340  *      false
341  * );
342  */
343 
344 /**
345  * Event for the change of a thing meta data.<br>
346  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a meta data of a thing is changed.<br>
347  * 
348  * @name iot_thing_meta_data_changed 
349  * @event
350  * @since 1.22.2
351  * @see
352  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
353  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
354  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
355  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
356  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
357  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
358  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
359  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
360  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
361  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
362  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
363  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
364  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
365  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
366  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
367  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
368  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
369  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
370  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
371  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
372  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
373  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
374  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
375  * @example
376  * document.addEventListener(
377  *      "iot_thing_meta_data_changed", 
378  *      function (param) {
379  *          // {String} param.thingUid - UID of the changed thing
380  *          // {Object} param.thingMetaData - |ThingMetaData|, // later meta data of changed
381  *              // {Object} |ThingMetaData| - json object of the meta data of a thing
382  *              //     {
383  *              //       "hardwareVersion": |string|,  // thing hardware version
384  *              //       "softwareVersion": |string|, // thing software version
385  *              //       "registrationDate": |string|, // date the thing was registered
386  *              //       "label": |string|, //thing label
387  *              //       "modelName": |string|, //thing model name
388  *              //       "manufacturer": |string|, //thing manufacturer
389  *              //       "nickname": |string|, //thing nickname         
390  *              //     }
391  *          console.log(
392  *              "Event 'iot_thing_meta_data_changed' is received.\n" +
393  *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
394  *              "thingMetaData = " + JSON.stringify(param.thingMetaData)
395  *          );
396  *      },
397  *      false
398  * );
399  */
400 
401 /**
402  * Event for the result of <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a>.<br>
403  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the result of <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a> is received.<br>
404  * 
405  * @name iot_set_component_result_received 
406  * @event
407  * @since 1.22.2
408  * @see
409  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
410  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
411  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
412  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
413  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
414  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
415  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
416  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
417  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
418  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
419  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
420  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
421  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
422  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
423  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
424  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
425  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
426  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
427  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
428  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
429  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
430  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
431  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
432  * @example
433  * document.addEventListener(
434  *      "iot_set_component_result_received", 
435  *      function (param) {
436  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true for the success, otherwise false.
437  *          // {String} param.callId - callId of the callId in <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a>.
438  *          console.log(
439  *              "Event 'iot_set_component_result_received' is received.\n" +
440  *              "result = " + param.result + "\n" +
441  *              "callId = " + param.callId
442  *          );
443  *      },
444  *      false
445  * );
446  */
447 
448 /**
449  * Event for the change of IoT framework status.<br>
450  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the IoT framework status is changed.<br>
451  * 
452  * @name iot_framework_status_changed
453  * @event
454  * @since 1.22.2
455  * @see
456  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
457  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
458  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
459  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
460  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
461  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
462  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
463  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
464  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
465  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
466  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
467  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
468  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
469  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
470  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
471  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
472  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
473  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
474  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
475  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
476  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
477  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
478  * @example
479  * document.addEventListener(
480  *      "iot_framework_status_changed", 
481  *      function (param) {
482  *          // {String} param.status - "off" : framework is off, "initializing" : framework is initializing, "ready" : framework is ready.
483  *          console.log(
484  *              "Event 'iot_framework_status_changed' is received.\n" +
485  *              "status = " + param.status
486  *          );
487  *      },
488  *      false
489  * );
490  */
491 
492 /**
493  * Event for the action result of IoT framework status.<br>
494  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the factory reset for core DB and binding DBs is requested.<br>
495  * 
496  * @name iot_factory_reset_result_received
497  * @event
498  * @since 1.22.2
499  * @see
500  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
501  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
502  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
503  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
504  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
505  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
506  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
507  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
508  * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
509  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
510  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
511  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
512  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
513  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
514  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
515  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
516  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
517  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
518  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
519  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
520  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
521  * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
522  * @example
523  * document.addEventListener(
524  *      "iot_factory_reset_result_received", 
525  *      function (param) {
526  *          // {Array} param.factoryResetResultList - |FactoryResetResult| // list of factory reset results.
527  *              // {Object} |FactoryResetResult| - json object of a factory reset result.
528  *              //     {
529  *              //       "id": |string|,  // "Core" or binding ID
530  *              //       "factoryResetResult": |boolean|, // facotry reset result      
531  *              //     }
532  *          console.log(
533  *              "Event 'iot_factory_reset_result_received' is received.\n" +
534  *              "factory reset result list = " + JSON.stringify(param.factoryResetResultList)
535  *          );
536  *      },
537  *      false
538  * );
539  */
540 
541 /**
542  * Event for the change of STT (Speech-To-Text) status.<br>
543  * Its listener will be invoked whenever STT status is changed.<br>
544  * 
545  * @name speech_to_text_status_changed 
546  * @event
547  * @since 1.22.2
548  * @see
549  * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.setSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
550  * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
551  * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.decideHost">hcap.speech.decideHost()</a><br>
552  * @example
553  * document.addEventListener(
554  *      "speech_to_text_status_changed", 
555  *      function (param) {
556  *          // {String} param.status - "processing" : STT is processing. "ready" : STT is completed.
557  *          // {String} param.actionData - STT intent parameter when STT status is changed from "processing" to "ready".
558  *          // {String} param.serviceType - STT result category when STT status is changed from "processing" to "ready".
559  *          // {String} param.actionType - STT result intent when STT status is changed from "processing" to "ready".
560  *          // {String} param.userUtterance - STT result text when STT status is changed from "processing" to "ready".
561  *          console.log(
562  *              "Event 'speech_to_text_status_changed' is received.\n" +
563  *              "status = " + param.status
564  *              "action data = " + param.actionData
565  *              "service type = " + param.serviceType
566  *              "action type = " + param.actionType
567  *              "user utterance = " + param.userUtterance
568  *          );
569  *      },
570  *      false
571  * );
572  */
573 
574 /**
575  * Event for the channel change.<br>
576  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the current channel is changed.
577  * 
578  * @name channel_changed 
579  * @event
580  * @since 1.3.1
581  * @see
582  * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
583  * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>
584  * @example
585  * document.addEventListener(
586  *      "channel_changed", 
587  *      function (param) {
588  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the current channel is changed successfully, else false.
589  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
590  *          console.log(
591  *              "Event 'channel_changed' is received.\n" +
592  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
593  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage
594  *          );
595  *      },
596  *      false
597  * );
598  */
599 
600 /**
601  * Event for the channel status change.<br>
602  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the current channel status is changed.
603  * 
604  * @name channel_status_changed 
605  * @event
606  * @since 1.14.0
607  * @see
608  * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
609  * @example
610  * document.addEventListener(
611  *      "channel_status_changed",
612  *      function yourEventListener() {
613  *          console.log(
614  *              "Event 'channel_status_changed' is received"
615  *          ); 
616  *      },
617  *      false
618  * );
619  */
620 
621 /**
622  * Event for the carousel data cache.<br>
623  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a carousel data is cached.<br>
624  * This event is caused by <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData()</a>.
625  * @name carousel_data_cached
626  * @event
627  * @since 1.3.1
628  * @see
629  * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.clearCarouselDataCache">hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache()</a><br>
630  * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.isCarouselDataCached">hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached</a><br>
631  * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData</a>
632  * @example
633  * document.addEventListener(
634  *      "carousel_data_cached",
635  *      function (param) {
636  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if a carousel data is cached successfully, else false.
637  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
638  *          // {String} param.url - url of the cached carousel data.
639  *          // {String} param.cachePath - path where the carousel data is cached.
640  *          console.log(
641  *              "Event 'carousel_data_cached' is received.\n" +
642  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
643  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
644  *              "URL = " + param.url + "\n" +
645  *              "Cache Path = " + param.cachePath
646  *          );
647  *      },
648  *      false
649  * );
650  */
651 
652 /**
653  * Event for receiving UDP data from remote.<br>
654  * Its listener will be invoked whenever UDP data is received.<br>
655  * 
656  * @name udp_data_received
657  * @event
658  * @since 1.6.0
659  * @see
660  * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.openUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.openUdpDaemon()</a><br>
661  * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.closeUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.closeUdpDaemon()</a><br>
662  * @example
663  * document.addEventListener(
664  *      "udp_data_received",
665  *      function (param) {
666  *          // {Number} param.port - port number of UDP connection through which UDP data is received.
667  *          // {String} param.data - received UDP data.
668  *          console.log(
669  *              "Event 'udp_data_received' is received.\n" +
670  *              "port = " + param.port + "\n" +
671  *              "data = " + param.data
672  *          );
673  *      },
674  *      false
675  * );
676  */
677 
678 /**
679  * Event for receiving TCP data from remote.<br>
680  * Its listener will be invoked whenever TCP data is received.<br>
681  * 
682  * @name tcp_data_received
683  * @event
684  * @since 1.10.1
685  * @see
686  * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.openTcpDaemon">hcap.socket.openTcpDaemon()</a><br>
687  * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.closeTcpDaemon">hcap.socket.closeTcpDaemon()</a><br>
688  * @example
689  * document.addEventListener(
690  *      "tcp_data_received",
691  *      function (param) {
692  *          // {Number} param.port - port number of TCP connection through which TCP data is received.
693  *          // {String} param.data - received TCP data.
694  *          console.log(
695  *              "Event 'tcp_data_received' is received.\n" +
696  *              "port = " + param.port + "\n" +
697  *              "data = " + param.data
698  *          );
699  *      },
700  *      false
701  * );
702  */
703 
704 /**
705  * Event for receiving the MPI data.<br>
706  * Its listener will be invoked whenever MPI data is received.<br>
707  * This event is caused by <a href="hcap.mpi.html#sendMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendMpiData()</a>.
708  * 
709  * @name mpi_data_received
710  * @event
711  * @since 1.3.1
712  * @see
713  * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendAndReceiveMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData</a><br>
714  * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendMpiData()</a>
715  * @example
716  * document.addEventListener(
717  *      "mpi_data_received",
718  *      function (param) {
719  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if MPI data is received successfully, else false.
720  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
721  *          // {Number} param.id - request ID that is defined between application and MPI headend. (0 ~ 255)
722  *          // {Number} param.sequence - sequence number of packet. (0 ~ 255).
723  *          // {String} param.packet - packet data that is transferred to the MPI card. (0 ~ 32)
724  *          console.log(
725  *              "Event 'mpi_data_received' is received.\n" +
726  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
727  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
728  *              "ID = " + param.id + "\n" +
729  *              "Sequence = " + param.sequence + "\n" +
730  *              "Packet = " + param.packet
731  *          );  
732  *      },
733  *      false
734  * );
735  */
736 
737 /**
738  * Event for the property change.<br>
739  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a property is changed.
740  * 
741  * @name property_changed
742  * @event
743  * @since 1.3.1
744  * @see
745  * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
746  * <a href="hcap.property.html#.setProperty">hcap.property.setProperty()</a>
747  * @example
748  * document.addEventListener(
749  *      "property_changed",
750  *      function (param) {
751  *          // {String} param.key - property that was changed.
752  *          console.log(
753  *              "Event 'property_changed' is received.\n" +
754  *              "Changed Property = " + param.key
755  *          );
756  *      },
757  *      false
758  * );
759  */
760 
761 /**
762  * Event for the volume level change.<br>
763  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the volume level is changed.
764  * 
765  * @name volume_level_changed
766  * @event
767  * @since 1.3.1
768  * @see
769  * <a href="hcap.volume.html#.getVolumeLevel">hcap.volume.getVolumeLevel()</a><br>
770  * <a href="hcap.volume.html#.setVolumeLevel">hcap.volume.setVolumeLevel()</a>
771  * @example
772  * document.addEventListener(
773  *      "volume_level_changed",
774  *      function yourEventListener() {
775  *          console.log(
776  *              "Event 'volume_level_changed' is received"
777  *          ); 
778  *      },
779  *      false
780  * );
781  */
782 
783 /**
784  * Event for the external input change.<br>
785  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the external input is changed.
786  * 
787  * @name external_input_changed
788  * @event
789  * @since 1.3.1
790  * @see
791  * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
792  * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.isExternalInputConnected">hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected()</a><br>
793  * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a>
794  * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
795  * @example
796  * document.addEventListener(
797  *      "external_input_changed",
798  *      function() {
799  *          console.log("Event 'external_input_changed' is received.");
800  *      },
801  *      false
802  * );
803  */
804

888 /**
889  * Event for media player's status change.<br>
890  * Its listener will be invoked whenever media player's status is changed.
891  * <div align=center>
892  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
893  *   <thead>
894  *     <tr><th>Media Event Type String</th></tr>
895  *   </thead>
896  *   <tbody>
897  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"play_start"</td></tr>
898  *     <tr>            <td>"play_end"</td></tr>
899  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"error_in_playing"</td></tr>
900  *     <tr>            <td>"buffer_full"</td></tr>
901  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"file_not_found"</td></tr>
902  *     <tr>            <td>"network_disconnected"</td></tr>
903  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"network_busy"</td></tr>
904  *     <tr>            <td>"network_cannot_process"</td></tr>
905  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"seek_done"</td></tr>
906  *   </tbody>
907  *   <tfoot>
908  *     <tr><td>Media Event Type</td></tr>
909  *   </tfoot>
910  * </table>
911  * </div>
912  * @name media_event_received
913  * @event
914  * @since 1.3.1
915  * @example
916  * document.addEventListener(
917  *      "media_event_received",
918  *      function (param) {
919  *          // {String} param.eventType - changed event type
920  *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
921  *      },
922  *      false
923  * );
924  */
925

1062 /**
1063  * Event for the focus change of HCAP application.<br>
1064  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the focus is moved from HCAP application to preloaded application, or vice versa except when HCAP mode is 0 (hcap.mode.HCAP_MODE_0).
1065  * <div align=center>
1066  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1067  *   <thead>
1068  *     <tr><th>HCAP Application Focus Event Type String</th></tr>
1069  *   </thead>
1070  *   <tbody>
1071  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"focused"</td></tr>
1072  *     <tr>            <td>"unfocused"</td></tr>
1073  *   </tbody>

1075  *     <tr><td>HCAP Application Focus Event Type</td></tr>
1076  *   </tfoot>
1077  * </table>
1078  * </div>
1079  * @name hcap_application_focus_changed
1080  * @event
1081  * @since 1.18.2
1082  * @example
1083  * document.addEventListener(
1084  *      "hcap_application_focus_changed",
1085  *      function (param) {
1086  *          // {String} param.eventType - HCAP application focus event type
1087  *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
1088  *      },
1089  *      false
1090  * );
1091  */
