1093 /**
1094  * Event for the result of USB file download.<br>
1095  * Its listener will be invoked when the file requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a> is downloaded to the path in the USB storage successfully or is failed to download.<br>
1096  * @name usb_file_downloaded
1097  * @event
1098  * @since 1.18.3
1099  * @see
1100  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageList()</a><br>
1101  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageFileList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList()</a><br>
1102  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a><br>
1103  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.deleteUsbFile">hcap.file.deleteUsbFile()</a><br>
1104  * @example
1105  * document.addEventListener(
1106  *      "usb_file_downloaded",
1107  *      function (param) {
1108  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the file of uri is downloaded successfully, else false.
1109  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1110  *          // {String} param.uri - URI for the file to download to the usb storage requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a>.
1111  *          // {String} param.downloadPath - file path to download the file of uri requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a>.
1112  *          console.log(
1113  *              "Event 'usb_file_downloaded' is received.\n" +
1114  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1115  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
1116  *              "uri = " + param.uri + "\n" +
1117  *              "Download path = " + param.downloadPath
1118  *          );
1119  *      },
1120  *      false
1121  * );
1122  */
1123 
1124 /**
1125  * Event for receiving the RS232C data.<br>
1126  * Its listener will be invoked only when the property "rs232c" is "1" and rs232c data is received.<br>
1127  * Because RS232C data is serial data, received data will be separated into 1 or multibytes and delivered to HCAP application.<br>
1128  * Therefore HCAP application has to get, assemble, interpret and analyze the received rs232c data.<br>
1129  *
1130  * @name rs232c_data_received
1131  * @event
1132  * @since 1.18.4
1133  * @see
1134  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1135  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1136  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
1137  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
1138  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
1139  * @example
1140  * document.addEventListener(
1141  *      "rs232c_data_received",
1142  *      function (param) {
1143  *          // {String} param.data - rs232c data string converted from binary data to ascii data such as ascii "3B1C42" for binary 0x3B1C42 with param.dataLength 3 (3 bytes) and ascii "00" for binary null data (0x00) with param.dataLength 1 (1 byte).
1144  *          // {Number} param.dataLength - received rs232c data length in bytes. Max length of EU model is 255 (bytes) and US model is 32 (bytes).
1145  *          console.log(
1146  *              "Event 'rs232c_data_received' is received.\n" +
1147  *              "data = " + param.data + "\n" +
1148  *              "data length = " + param.dataLength
1149  *          );  
1150  *      },
1151  *      false
1152  * );
1153  */
1154 
1155 /**
1156  * Event for the cloning done.<br>
1157  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the cloning is done.
1158  * 
1159  * @name cloning_done_received 
1160  * @event
1161  * @since 1.19.0
1162  * @see
1163  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestCloning">hcap.system.requestCloning()</a><br>
1164  * @example
1165  * document.addEventListener(
1166  *      "cloning_done_received", 
1167  *      function (param) {
1168  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the cloning is done successfully, else false.
1169  *          console.log(
1170  *              "Event 'cloning_done_received' is received.\n" +
1171  *              "Result = " + param.result
1172  *          );
1173  *      },
1174  *      false
1175  * );
1176  */
1177 
1178 /**
1179  * Event for the result of locale change.<br>
1180  * Its listener will be invoked when to succeed or fail to change the locale.
1181  * 
1182  * @name locale_changed 
1183  * @event
1184  * @since 1.19.0
1185  * @see
1186  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
1187  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocale">hcap.system.getLocale()</a><br>
1188  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestLocaleChange">hcap.system.requestLocaleChange()</a><br>
1189  * @example
1190  * document.addEventListener(
1191  *      "locale_changed", 
1192  *      function (param) {
1193  *          // {String} param.specifier - locale specifier for the locale change request.
1194  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the locale is changed successfully, else false.
1195  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1196  *          console.log(
1197  *              "Event 'locale_changed' is received.\n" +
1198  *              "specifier = " + param.specifier + "\n" +
1199  *              "change result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1200  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage
1201  *          );
1202  *      },
1203  *      false
1204  * );
1205  */
1206 
1207 /**
1208  * Event for the MMR (Magic Motion RCU) low battery notification.<br>
1209  * 
1210  * @name mmr_low_battery_event_received
1211  * @event
1212  * @since 1.19.0
1213  * @example
1214  * document.addEventListener(
1215  *      "mmr_low_battery_event_received",
1216  *      function (param) {
1217  *          console.log("MMR low battery notification is received");
1218  *      },
1219  *      false
1220  * );
1221  */
1222 
1223 /**
1224  * Event for the bluetooth notification.<br>
1225  * 
1226  * @name bluetooth_event_received
1227  * @event
1228  * @since 1.19.0
1229  * @see
1230  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.disconnect">hcap.bluetooth.disconnect()</a><br>
1231  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.setScanState">hcap.bluetooth.setScanState()</a><br>
1232  * @example
1233  * document.addEventListener(
1234  *      "bluetooth_event_received",
1235  *      function (param) {
1236  *          // {String} param.eventType - bluetooth event type ("bt_gap_find_devices_result" / "bt_service_status_changed")
1237  *          // {Object} param.btGapFindDevicesResult - event data for the event type "bt_gap_find_devices_result"
1238  *          //      {
1239  *          //          {String} scanState - scan state ("found_devices" : devices are found / "done" : scanning is done with no device found)
1240  *          //          {Array} list - device list
1241  *          //                  {String} list[].name - device name 
1242  *          //                  {Number} list[].class - device class 
1243  *          //                  {String} list[].address - BD (Bluetooth Device) address 
1244  *          //                  {Number} list[].rssi - RSSI value of device 
1245  *          //      }
1246  *          // {Object} param.btServiceStatusChanged - event data for the event type "bt_service_status_changed"
1247  *          //      {
1248  *          //          {String} listType - list type ("discovered"/"bonded"/"none")
1249  *          //          {String} state - device connection state ("connected"/"disconnected"/"connecting"/"disconnecting"/"none")
1250  *          //          {String} address - BD (Bluetooth Device) address 
1251  *          //          {String} service - service profile ("hid" : HID profile / "audio" : audio src(A2DP) profile / "opc" : OPC profile / "audio_sink" : audio sink(A2DP) profile) 
1252  *          //          {String} name - device name
1253  *          //      }
1254  *          console.log("Event 'bluetooth_event_received' is received.");
1255  *          if (param.eventType === "bt_gap_find_devices_result") {
1256  *              console.log("scan state = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.scanState);
1257  *              for (var i = 0; i < param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list.length; i++) {
1258  *                  console.log("found device[" + i + "] name = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].name + ", class = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].class + ", BD address = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].address + ", rssi = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].rssi);
1259  *              }
1260  *          } else if (param.eventType === "bt_service_status_changed") {
1261  *              console.log("listType = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.listType + ", state = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.state + ", BD address = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.address + ", service profile = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.service + ", name = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.name);
1262  *          }
1263  *      },
1264  *      false
1265  * );
1266  */
1267 
1268 /**
1269  * Event for received WebRTC message.<br>
1270  * 
1271  * @name webrtc_message_received
1272  * @event
1273  * @since 1.19.1
1274  * @see 
1275  * <a href="_global_.html#event:webrtc_event_received">{Event} webrtc_event_received</a><br>
1276  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.startPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1277  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.stopPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1278  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.incomingCall">hcap.webrtc.incomingCall()</a><br>
1279  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.outgoingCall">hcap.webrtc.outgoingCall()</a><br>
1280  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.endCall">hcap.webrtc.endCall()</a><br>
1281  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.acceptMessage">hcap.webrtc.acceptMessage()</a><br>
1282  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.startCheckAudio()</a><br>
1283  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.stopCheckAudio()</a><br>
1284  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1285  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1286  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.showDiagnostics">hcap.webrtc.showDiagnostics()</a><br>
1287  * @example
1288  * document.addEventListener(
1289  *      "webrtc_message_received",
1290  *      function (param) {
1291  *          // {Number} param.remotePeerId - remote peer id
1292  *          // {String} param.message - message
1293  *          console.log("Event 'webrtc_message_received' is received.");
1294  *          console.log("remotePeerId = " + param.remotePeerId + ", message = " + param.message);
1295  *      },
1296  *      false
1297  * );
1298  */
1299 
1300 /**
1301  * Event for WebRTC.<br>
1302  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the state of WebRTC is changed.  
1303  * <div align=center>
1304  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1305  *   <thead>
1306  *     <tr><th>WebRTC Event Type String</th></tr>
1307  *   </thead>
1308  *   <tbody>
1309  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_end_call"</td></tr>
1310  *     <tr>            <td>"click_mic_on"</td></tr>
1311  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_mic_off"</td></tr>
1312  *     <tr>            <td>"click_video_on"</td></tr>
1313  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_video_off"</td></tr>
1314  *     <tr>            <td>"p2p_av_connected"</td></tr>
1315  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"p2p_av_disconnected"</td></tr>
1316  *   </tbody>
1317  *   <tfoot>
1318  *     <tr><td>WebRTC Event Type</td></tr>
1319  *   </tfoot>
1320  * </table>
1321  * </div>
1322  * @name webrtc_event_received
1323  * @event
1324  * @since 1.19.1
1325  * @see 
1326  * <a href="_global_.html#event:webrtc_message_received">{Event} webrtc_message_received</a><br>
1327  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.startPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1328  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.stopPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1329  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.incomingCall">hcap.webrtc.incomingCall()</a><br>
1330  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.outgoingCall">hcap.webrtc.outgoingCall()</a><br>
1331  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.endCall">hcap.webrtc.endCall()</a><br>
1332  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.acceptMessage">hcap.webrtc.acceptMessage()</a><br>
1333  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.startCheckAudio()</a><br>
1334  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.stopCheckAudio()</a><br>
1335  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1336  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1337  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.showDiagnostics">hcap.webrtc.showDiagnostics()</a><br>
1338  * @example
1339  * document.addEventListener(
1340  *      "webrtc_event_received",
1341  *      function (param) {
1342  *          // {String} param.eventString - WebRTC event string
1343  *          console.log("Event 'webrtc_event_received' is received.");
1344  *          console.log("eventString = " + param.eventString);
1345  *      },
1346  *      false
1347  * );
1348  */
1349 
1350 /**
1351  * Event for the result of HDMI connection change.<br>
1352  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a HDMI is connected or disconnected.<br>
1353  * 
1354  * @name hdmi_connection_changed 
1355  * @event
1356  * @since 1.20.0
1357  * @example
1358  * document.addEventListener(
1359  *      "hdmi_connection_changed", 
1360  *      function (param) {
1361  *          // {Number} param.index - index of the HDMI which was connected or disconnected.
1362  *          // {Boolean} param.connected - true if the HDMI is connected, else false.
1363  *          console.log(
1364  *              "Event 'hdmi_connection_changed' is received.\n" +
1365  *              "HDMI-" + param.index + " : " + "connected = " + param.connected
1366  *          );
1367  *      },
1368  *      false
1369  * );
1370  */
1371 
1372 /**
1373  * Event called when TV is turned off ("turn off" means TV moves on the power STANDBY).<br>
1374  * Pro:Centric HTML application has a chance to clean up its resource in this event listener by calling hcap.system.beginDestroy.<br>
1375  * TV will wait for hcap.system.beginDestroy up to 1 second. And once beginDestroy is called, endDestroy should be called. Or TV will be turned off after 10 minutes automatically.<br>
1376  * <img src="./image/on_destroy.jpg"><br>
1377  * 
1378  * @name on_destroy 
1379  * @event
1380  * @since 1.20.0
1381  * @see
1382  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.beginDestroy">hcap.system.beginDestroy()</a><br>
1383  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.endDestroy">hcap.system.endDestroy()</a>
1384  * @example
1385  * document.addEventListener(
1386  *      "on_destroy",
1387  *      function() {
1388  *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
1389  *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
1390  *              "onSuccess" : function() {
1391  *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
1392  *
1393  *                  // clean up resources
1394  *
1395  *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
1396  *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
1397  *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
1398  *                      },
1399  *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
1400  *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
1401  *                      }
1402  *                  });
1403  *              },
1404  *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
1405  *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
1406  *              }
1407  *          });
1408  *      },
1409  *      false
1410  * );
1411  */
1412 
1413 /**
1414  * Event for the screensaver.<br>
1415  * Its listener will be invoked whenever screensaver event is received.
1416  * <div align=center>
1417  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1418  *   <thead>
1419  *     <tr><th>Screensaver Event Type String</th></tr>
1420  *   </thead>
1421  *   <tbody>
1422  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"turnon_screensaver"</td></tr>
1423  *     <tr>            <td>"turnoff_screensaver"</td></tr>
1424  *   </tbody>
1425  *   <tfoot>
1426  *     <tr><td>Screensaver Event Type</td></tr>
1427  *   </tfoot>
1428  * </table>
1429  * </div>
1430  * 
1431  * @name screensaver_event_received
1432  * @event
1433  * @since 1.20.1
1434  * @example
1435  * document.addEventListener(
1436  *      "screensaver_event_received",
1437  *      function (param) {
1438  *          // {Number} param.eventType - screensaver event type.
1439  *          console.log("screensaver event type = " + param.eventType);
1440  *      },
1441  *      false
1442  * );
1443  */
1444 
1445 /**
1446  * Event for UI value change.<br>
1447  * Its listener will be invoked whenever UI value is changed.
1448  * <div align=center>
1449  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1450  *   <thead>
1451  *     <tr><th>UI Value Event Type String</th></tr>
1452  *   </thead>
1453  *   <tbody>
1454  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"bluetooth_sound_sync"</td></tr>  
1455  *     <tr>            <td>"audio_pts_offset"</td></tr>
1456  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"video_pts_offset"</td></tr>
1457  *     <tr>            <td>"beacon_mode"</td></tr>
1458  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"healthcare_headphone_mode"</td></tr>
1459  *     <tr>            <td>"vlan_id_mode"</td></tr>
1460  *   </tbody>
1461  *   <tfoot>
1462  *     <tr><td>UI Value Event Type</td></tr>
1463  *   </tfoot>
1464  * </table>
1465  * </div>
1466  * 
1467  * @name ui_value_changed
1468  * @event
1469  * @since 1.20.1
1470  * @see
1471  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.setBluetoothSoundSync">hcap.bluetooth.setBluetoothSoundSync()</a><br>
1472  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
1473  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
1474  * <a href="hcap.volume.html#.setHealthcareHeadphoneMode">hcap.volume.setHealthcareHeadphoneMode()</a><br>
1475  * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
1476  * <a href="hcap.network.html#.setVlanIdMode">hcap.network.setVlanIdMode()</a>
1477  * @example
1478  * document.addEventListener(
1479  *      "ui_value_changed",
1480  *      function (param) {
1481  *          // {String} param.key - UI Value event string
1482  *          console.log("Event 'ui_value_changed' is received.");
1483  *          console.log("eventString = " + param.key);
1484  *      },
1485  *      false
1486  * );
1487  */
1488 
1489 /**
1490  * Event for the result of asynchronous ping.<br>
1491  * Its listener will be invoked when the asynchronous ping requested by <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a> is success or fail.<br>
1492  * @name ping_result_received
1493  * @event
1494  * @since 1.22.0
1495  * @see
1496  * <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a><br>
1497 
1498  * @example
1499  * document.addEventListener(
1500  *      "ping_result_received",
1501  *      function (param) {
1502  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the result of asynchronous ping is success, else false.
1503  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1504  *          // {String} param.roundTripTimeInMs - round trip time to the target in milliseconds requested by <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a>.
1505  *          console.log(
1506  *              "Event 'ping_result_received' is received.\n" +
1507  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1508  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
1509  *              "Round trip time = " + param.roundTripTimeInMs
1510  *          );
1511  *      },
1512  *      false
1513  * );
1514  */
1515 
1516 //var navigator; // only for local jslint
1517 //var document; // only for local jslint
1518 //var WebSocket; // only for local jslint
1519 //var window; // only for local jslint
1520 
1521 var extHcapSecure; // true : wss
1522 var extRegisterHcapCloseHandler; // "onbeforeunload" : register onbeforeunload handler to close hcap websocket, "onunload" : register onunload handler to close hcap websocket
1523 var extDisableHcapConsoleLog; // true : disable hcap console log
1524 var extWebWorker; // true : hcap.js is included in webworker
1525 
1526 /**
1527  * @constructor
1528  */
1529 var hcap;
1530 if (hcap === undefined) {
1531     (function () {
1532         /**
1533          * @namespace hcap
1534          */
1535         //"use strict"; // only for local jslint
1536         hcap = {
1537             API_VERSION: "1.23.0.5725"
1538         };
1539         var hcap_key_table = [],
1540             callback_event_id = 0,
1541             hcap_cmd_buffer = [{"command_id" : "0", "param_text" : "{\"command_id\" : \"0\", \"command\" : \"notify_sdk_version\", \"hcap_js_extension_version\" : \"1.23.0.5725\"}"}],
1542             ws = null,
1543             ws_is_opened = false,
1544             is_connecting = false,
1545             guard_call = false,
1546             initialize_hcap_websocket = null,
1547             start_cmd_loop = null,
1548             hcap_command = null,
1549             is_ws_off = false,
1550             make_log = null,
1551             media_object = null;
1552         function hcapLog(s) {
1553             if (extDisableHcapConsoleLog !== true) {
1554                 var str;
1555                 if (s.length > 1024) {
1556                     str = s.substring(0, 1024);
1557                 } else {
1558                     str = s;
1559                 }
1560                 if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1561                     console.log(str);
1562                 }
1563             }
1564         }
1565         if (extDisableHcapConsoleLog === true) {
1566             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1567                 console.log("hcap console log is disabled");
1568             }
1569         } else {
1570             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1571                 console.log("hcap console log is enabled");
1572             }
1573         }
1574         hcapLog("check external value : extDisableHcapConsoleLog = " + extDisableHcapConsoleLog + ", extHcapSecure = " + extHcapSecure + ", extRegisterHcapCloseHandler = " + extRegisterHcapCloseHandler);
1575         function ws_off() {
1576             var user_agent = navigator.userAgent,
1577                 windows = user_agent.match(/Windows/),
1578                 macintosh = user_agent.match(/Macintosh/),
1579                 mac = user_agent.match(/Mac OS X/);
1580             hcapLog("UA = '" + user_agent + "'");
1581             if (windows || macintosh || mac) {
1582                 hcapLog("HCAP websocket off");
1583                 return true;
1584             }
1585             return false;
1586         }
1587         is_ws_off = ws_off();
1588         function make_log_element(idx, names, object, log_message) {
1589             var value = "", type = "", ele = "";
1590             ele = names[idx];
1591             try {
1592                 value = object[ele];
1593                 type = typeof value;
1594             } catch (e) {
1595                 value = "<unknown value>";
1596                 type = "unknown";
1597             }
1598             if (type === "function") {
1599                 value = "{/*function*/}";
1600             } else if (type === "object") {
1601                 value = make_log("", value);
1602             } else if (type === "string") {
1603                 value = "\"" + value + "\"";
1604             }
1605             log_message += "\"" + ele + "\"" + " : " + value;
1606             if (idx < names.length - 1) {
1607                 log_message += ", ";
1608             }
1609             return log_message;
1610         }
1611         make_log = function (message, object) {
1612             var i = 0, name = "", names = [], log_message = "";
1613             for (name in object) {
1614                 if (object.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
1615                     names.push(name);
1616                 }
1617             }
1618             names.sort();
1619             for (i = 0; i < names.length; i += 1) {
1620                 log_message = make_log_element(i, names, object, log_message);
1621             }
1622             return message + "{" + log_message + "}";
1623         };
1624         function on_event_received(command, param) {
1625             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1626                 var key = "",
1627                     eventType = command,
1628                     evtObj = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents");
1629                 hcapLog(make_log("event received, ", param));
1630                 evtObj.initEvent(eventType, true, false);
1631                 for (key in param) {
1632                     if (param.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
1633                         evtObj[key] = param[key];
1634                     }
1635                 }
1636                 document.dispatchEvent(evtObj);
1637             }
1638         }
1639         initialize_hcap_websocket = function () {
1640             if (is_connecting) {
1641                 hcapLog("websocket : connection is in progress");
1642                 return;
1643             }
1644             is_connecting = true;
1645             if (extHcapSecure !== true) {
1646                 hcapLog("default hcap connection");
1647                 ws = new WebSocket("ws://127.0.0.1:8053/hcap_command");
1648             } else {
1649                 hcapLog("secure hcap connection");
1650                 ws = new WebSocket("wss://localhost:8054/hcap_command");
1651             }
1652             ws.onopen = function () {
1653                 hcapLog("websocket : onopen");
1654                 is_connecting = false;
1655                 ws_is_opened = true;
1656                 setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 5);
1657             };
1658             ws.onmessage = function (evt) {
1659                 var param = JSON.parse(evt.data),
1660                     command_id = param.command_id,
1661                     command = param.command,
1662                     command_result = param.result;
1663                 if (command_id === "event") {
1664                     if (command === "debug_event_received") {
1665                         if (param.enable_log) {
1666                             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1667                                 console.log("hcap console log is enabled");
1668                             }
1669                         } else {
1670                             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1671                                 console.log("hcap console log is disabled");
1672                             }
1673                         }
1674                         extDisableHcapConsoleLog = !param.enable_log;
1675                     } else {
1676                         on_event_received(command, param);
1677                     }
1678                 } else if (hcap_cmd_buffer.length > 0 && hcap_cmd_buffer[0].command_id === command_id) {
1679                     hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + command_id + " received, ", param));
1680                     if (command_result) {
1681                         if (hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onSuccess) {
1682                             try {
1683                                 hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onSuccess(param);
1684                             } catch(e) {
1685                                 hcapLog(make_log("exception : onSuccess : " + e));
1686                             }                            
1687                         }
1688                     } else {
1689                         if (hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onFailure) {
1690                             try {
1691                                 hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onFailure(param);
1692                             } catch(e) {
1693                                 hcapLog(make_log("exception : onFailure : " + e));
1694                             }
1695                         }
1696                     }
1697                     hcap_cmd_buffer.splice(0, 1);
1698                     guard_call = false;
1699                     start_cmd_loop();
1700                 } else {
1701                     hcapLog(make_log("invalid response from server ", param));
1702                     guard_call = false;
1703                     start_cmd_loop();
1704                 }
1705             };
1706             ws.onclose = function () {
1707                 hcapLog("websocket : onclose");
1708                 is_connecting = false;
1709                 ws_is_opened = false;
1710                 guard_call = false;
1711                 setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 50);
1712             };
1713             if (extRegisterHcapCloseHandler === "onbeforeunload") {
1714                 window.onbeforeunload = function () {
1715                     hcapLog("close hcap websocket in onbeforeunload handler");
1716                     ws.onclose = function () {
1717                         return undefined;
1718                     };
1719                     ws.close();
1720                 };
1721             } else if (extRegisterHcapCloseHandler === "onunload") {
1722                 window.onunload = function () {
1723                     hcapLog("close hcap websocket in onunload handler");
1724                     ws.onclose = function () {
1725                         return undefined;
1726                     };
1727                     ws.close();
1728                 };
1729             }
1730         };
1731         start_cmd_loop = function () {
1732             if (guard_call) {
1733                 return;
1734             }
1735             guard_call = true;
1736             if (ws_is_opened) {
1737                 if (hcap_cmd_buffer.length > 0) {
1738                     hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + hcap_cmd_buffer[0].command_id + " sent, ", JSON.parse(hcap_cmd_buffer[0].param_text)));
1739                     ws.send(hcap_cmd_buffer[0].param_text);
1740                     return;
1741                 }
1742             } else {
1743                 initialize_hcap_websocket();
1744             }
1745             guard_call = false;
1746         };
1747         hcap_command = function (command, param) {
1748             if (command === null || command === "" || command === undefined) {
1749                 hcapLog("[ERROR] command should not null or empty string! command === null || command === \"\" || command === undefined");
1750                 return;
1751             }
1752             if (Object.prototype.toString.call(param) === '[object Array]') {
1753                 hcapLog("[ERROR] param should be Object type({})! param is Array. command = " + command);
1754                 return;
1755             }
1756             if (param === null || param === undefined) {
1757                 hcapLog("[ERROR] param should be Object type({})! param === null || param === undefined. command = " + command);
1758                 return;
1759             }
1760 
1761             if (is_ws_off) {
1762                 if (param.onFailure) {
1763                     param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "HCAP WebSocket is not available in this browser"});
1764                 }
1765                 return;
1766             }
1767             if (callback_event_id > 1024) {
1768                 callback_event_id = 0;
1769             } else {
1770                 callback_event_id += 1;
1771             }
1772             var command_id = callback_event_id.toString(),
1773                 param_text = "";
1774             param.command_id = command_id;
1775             param.command = command;
1776             param_text = JSON.stringify(param, null);
1777             hcap_cmd_buffer[hcap_cmd_buffer.length] = {"command_id" : command_id, "param_text" : param_text, "onSuccess" : param.onSuccess, "onFailure" : param.onFailure};
1778             hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + command_id + " added, ", hcap_cmd_buffer[hcap_cmd_buffer.length - 1]));
1779             start_cmd_loop();
1780         };
1781         if (!is_ws_off) {
1782             setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 200);
1783         }
1784         /** 
1785          * @namespace hcap.preloadedApplication
1786          */
1787         hcap.preloadedApplication = { };
1788         /**
1789          * Gets the preloaded application list.<br>
1790          * 
1791          * @param {Object} param
1792          * <ul>
1793          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
1794          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1795          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) 
1796          *       // {Array} param.list - preloaded application list supported by TV.
1797          *       //         {String} param.list[].id - preloaded application id (0 ~ 2^64 - 1)
1798          *       //         {String} param.list[].title - preloaded application title
1799          *       //         {String} param.list[].iconFilePath - file path of icon for the preloaded application
1800          *       //                 param.list example - 
1801          *       //                     "list" :  [
1802          *       //                     { "id" : "13324", "title" : "YouTube", "iconFilePath" : "/icon/youtube.png" },
1803          *       //                     { "id" : "15265", "title" : "Facebook", "iconFilePath" : "/icon/facebook.png" }
1804          *       //                     ]
1805          *   }</pre>
1806          *   </li>
1807          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
1808          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1809          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
1810          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1811          *   }</pre>
1812          *   </li>
1813          * </ul>
1814          * 
1815          * @since 1.5.0
1816          * 
1817          * @see
1818          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.launchPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1819          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.destroyPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1820          *
1821          * @example
1822          * hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList({
1823          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
1824          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
1825          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
1826          *              console.log(
1827          *                  "list[" + i + "].id = " + s.list[i].id +
1828          *                  "list[" + i + "].title = " + s.list[i].title +
1829          *                  "list[" + i + "].iconFilePath = " + s.list[i].iconFilePath
1830          *              );
1831          *          }
1832          *      },
1833          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
1834          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
1835          *      }
1836          * });
1837          */
1838         hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList = function (param) {
1839             hcap_command("get_preloaded_application_list", param);
1840         };
1841         /**
1842          * Launches a preloaded application.<br>
1843          * Following table specifies preloaded applications, their ids and parameters. (Supported preloaded applications are different according to TV model, but App IDs of preloaded applications should be same)<br> 
1844          * <table border=1 style="border: 1px;">
1845          *     <b><tr><th>Application</th><th>id</th><th>parameters</th></tr></b>
1846          *     <tr><td>3 Cats</td><td>244115188075859005</td><td></td></tr>
1847          *     <tr><td>AccuWeather</td><td>144115188075855876</td><td></td></tr>
1848          *     <tr><td>Amazon</td><td>144115188075859015</td><td></td></tr>
1849          *     <tr><td>Arirang TV</td><td>144115188075859001</td><td></td></tr>
1850          *     <tr><td>AR-Browser</td><td>201604201053010001</td><td>"{<br>
1851          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'http://url.com/adc3f'<br>
1852          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
1853          *     <tr><td>Balda</td><td>144115188075859004</td><td></td></tr>
1854          *     <tr><td>BBC-iPlayer</td><td>201604021129030008</td><td></td></tr>
1855          *     <tr><td>BBC-Sports</td><td>201609281937030001</td><td></td></tr>
1856          *     <tr><td>BBC-News</td><td>201609281937030002</td><td></td></tr>
1857          *     <tr><td>Bluetooth Sound Sync</td><td>244115188075859015</td><td></td></tr>
1858          *     <tr><td>Browser</td><td>144115188075855877</td><td>"{'params':{<br>
1859          *                                                            'target':string, // url string. default is empty. ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
1860          *                                                            'fullMode':string, // full mode. default is 'false'. 'true' : full page mode, 'false' : general web browser mode<br>
1861          *                                                            'newtab':string // default is 'true'. 'true' : new page is loaded on the new tab, 'false' : new page is loaded on the current tab.<br>
1862          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>
1863          *     <tr><td>Color Bridge</td><td>244115188075859012</td><td></td></tr>
1864          *     <tr><td>Crackle</td><td>144115188075859014</td><td></td></tr>
1865          *     <tr><td>Cutter Pillars</td><td>244115188075859011</td><td></td></tr>
1866          *     <tr><td>External Connector</td><td>244115188075859007</td><td></td></tr>
1867          *     <tr><td>Facebook</td><td>144115188075855874</td><td></td></tr>
1868          *     <tr><td>Google Maps</td><td>144115188075855875</td><td></td></tr>
1869          *     <tr><td>Gravity Ball</td><td>244115188075859009</td><td></td></tr>
1870          *     <tr><td>Hulu</td><td>144115188075859017</td><td></td></tr>
1871          *     <tr><td>K-Browser</td><td>244115188075859021</td><td>"{<br>
1872          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'http://url.com/adc3f'<br>
1873          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
1874          *     <tr><td>Mainstream</td><td>244115188075859010</td><td></td></tr>
1875          *     <tr><td>Mobile Connector</td><td>244115188075859006</td><td></td></tr>
1876          *     <tr><td>Netflix</td><td>244115188075859013</td><td></td></tr>
1877          *     <tr><td>NK-Browser</td><td>244115188075859022</td><td>"{<br>
1878          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
1879          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
1880          *     <tr><td>PC Connector</td><td>244115188075859008</td><td></td></tr>
1881          *     <tr><td>Picasa</td><td>144115188075859003</td><td></td></tr>
1882          *     <tr><td>Rhapsody</td><td>144115188075859018</td><td></td></tr>
1883          *     <tr><td>Screen Share</td><td>144115188075855880</td><td></td></tr>
1884          *     <tr><td>Skype</td><td>144115188075855878</td><td></td></tr>
1885          *     <tr><td>SmartShare</td><td>144115188075855882</td><td></td></tr>
1886          *     <tr><td>Tanks</td><td>144115188075859005</td><td></td></tr>
1887          *     <tr><td>The Associated Press</td><td>144115188075859011</td><td></td></tr>
1888          *     <tr><td>TV Hockey</td><td>244115188075859004</td><td></td></tr>
1889          *     <tr><td>Twitter</td><td>144115188075855873</td><td></td></tr>
1890          *     <tr><td>Ustream</td><td>144115188075859012</td><td></td></tr>
1891          *     <tr><td>vTuner</td><td>144115188075859000</td><td></td></tr>
1892          *     <tr><td>Wasu(TV)</td><td>244115188075859014</td><td></td></tr>
1893          *     <tr><td>Wasu(DRAMA)</td><td>244115188075859016</td><td></td></tr>
1894          *     <tr><td>Wasu(ENTERTAINMENT)</td><td>244115188075859017</td><td></td></tr>
1895          *     <tr><td>Wasu(HD)</td><td>244115188075859018</td><td></td></tr>
1896          *     <tr><td>Wasu(MOVIE)</td><td>244115188075859019</td><td></td></tr>
1897          *     <tr><td>Wasu(SPORTS)</td><td>244115188075859020</td><td></td></tr>
1898          *     <tr><td>YouTube</td><td>144115188075859002</td><td></td></tr>
1899          * </table>
1900          * 
1901          * @param {Object} param
1902          * <ul>
1903          *   <li>{String} param.id - preloaded application id to launch (0 ~ 2^64 - 1).</li>
1904          *   <li>{String} param.parameters [Optional] - parameters in JSON type string for the preloaded application to be launched.</li>
1905          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
1906          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1907          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
1908          *       // No Parameter.
1909          *   }</pre>
1910          *   </li>
1911          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
1912          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1913          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
1914          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1915          *   }</pre>
1916          *   </li>
1917          * </ul>
1918          * 
1919          * @since 1.5.0
1920          * 
1921          * @see
1922          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.getPreloadedApplicationList">hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList()</a><br>
1923          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.destroyPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1924          *
1925          * @example
1926          * hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication({
1927          *      "id" : "244115188075859022", // NK-Browser
1928          *      "parameters" : "{
1929          *          'target':'http://www.lge.com'
1930          *      }",
1931          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
1932          *          console.log("onSuccess");
1933          *      },
1934          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
1935          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
1936          *      }
1937          * });
1938          */
1939         hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication = function (param) {
1940             hcap_command("launch_preloaded_application", param);
1941         };
1942         /**
1943          * Terminates the preloaded application.<br>
1944          * 
1945          * @param {Object} param
1946          * <ul>
1947          *   <li>{String} param.id - preloaded application id to destroy (0 ~ 2^64 - 1).</li>
1948          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
1949          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1950          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
1951          *       // No Parameter.
1952          *   }</pre>
1953          *   </li>
1954          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
1955          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1956          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
1957          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1958          *   }</pre>
1959          *   </li>
1960          * </ul>
1961          * 
1962          * @since 1.19.0
1963          * 
1964          * @see
1965          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.getPreloadedApplicationList">hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList()</a><br>
1966          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.launchPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1967          *
1968          * @example
1969          * hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication({
1970          *      "id" : "15265",
1971          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
1972          *          console.log("onSuccess");
1973          *      },
1974          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
1975          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
1976          *      }
1977          * });
1978          */
1979         hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication = function (param) {
1980             hcap_command("destroy_preloaded_application", param);
1981         };
1982         /** 
1983          * @namespace hcap.application
1984          */
1985         hcap.application = { };
1986         /**
1987          * Gets the LG Service XML Contents.<br>
1988          * 
1989          * @param {Object} param
1990          * <ul>
1991          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
1992          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1993          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
1994          *       // {String} param.contents - current LG Service XML Contents.
1995          *   }</pre>
1996          *   </li>
1997          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
1998          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1999          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2000          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2001          *   }</pre>
2002          *   </li>
2003          * </ul>
2004          *  
2005          * @since 1.20.1
2006          * 
2007          * @see
2008          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2009          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2010          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2011          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2012          *
2013          * @example
2014          * hcap.application.getServiceXml({
2015          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2016          *          console.log("onSuccess : service xml = " + s.contents);
2017          *      },
2018          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2019          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2020          *      }
2021          * });
2022          */
2023         hcap.application.getServiceXml = function (param) {
2024             hcap_command("get_service_xml", param);
2025         };
2026         /**
2027          * Gets the Default LG Service XML Contents for restoring preloaded application list.<br>
2028          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".
2029          * 
2030          * @param {Object} param
2031          * <ul>
2032          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2033          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2034          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
2035          *       // {String} param.contents - default LG Service XML Contents.
2036          *   }</pre>
2037          *   </li>
2038          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2039          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2040          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2041          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2042          *   }</pre>
2043          *   </li>
2044          * </ul>
2045          *  
2046          * @since 1.20.1
2047          * 
2048          * @see
2049          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2050          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2051          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2052          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2053          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2054          *
2055          * @example
2056          * hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml({
2057          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2058          *          console.log("onSuccess : service xml = " + s.contents);
2059          *      },
2060          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2061          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2062          *      }
2063          * });
2064          */
2065         hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml = function (param) {
2066             hcap_command("get_default_service_xml", param);
2067         };
2068         /**
2069          * Gets the application list.<br>
2070          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".
2071          * 
2072          * @param {Object} param
2073          * <ul>
2074          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2075          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2076          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) 
2077          *       // {Array} param.list - application list supported by TV.
2078          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].valid - true if the application was installed.
2079          *       //         {String} param.list[].title - application title.
2080          *       //         {String} param.list[].appId - application id.
2081          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].deleted - true if the application was deleted.
2082          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].visible - true if the application can be shown at the webOS launcher.
2083          *       //         {String} param.list[].version - application version.
2084          *       //         {String} param.list[].iconPath - file path of icon for the application
2085          *       //         {String} param.list[].reason - reason that the application was not installed.
2086          *       //                 param.list example - 
2087          *       //                     "list" :  [
2088          *       //                     { "valid": true, "title": "Web Browser", "appId": "com.webos.app.browser", "deleted": false, "visible": false, "version": "2.0.0", "iconPath" : "/icon/browser.png", "reason" : "" },
2089          *       //                     { "valid": true, "title": "YouTube", "appId": "youtube.leanback.v4", "deleted": false, "visible": false, "version": "1.0.17", "iconPath" : "/icon/youtube.png", "reason" : "" }
2090          *       //                     ]
2091          *   }</pre>
2092          *   </li>
2093          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2094          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2095          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2096          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2097          *   }</pre>
2098          *   </li>
2099          * </ul>
2100          * 
2101          * @since 1.20.1
2102          * 
2103          * @see
2104          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2105          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2106          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2107          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2108          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2109          *
2110          * @example
2111          * hcap.application.getApplicationList({
2112          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2113          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
2114          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
2115          *              console.log(
2116          *                  "list[" + i + "].valid = " + s.list[i].valid +
2117          *                  "list[" + i + "].title = " + s.list[i].title +
2118          *                  "list[" + i + "].appId = " + s.list[i].appId +
2119          *                  "list[" + i + "].deleted = " + s.list[i].deleted +
2120          *                  "list[" + i + "].visible = " + s.list[i].visible +
2121          *                  "list[" + i + "].version = " + s.list[i].version +
2122          *                  "list[" + i + "].iconPath = " + s.list[i].iconPath +
2123          *                  "list[" + i + "].reason = " + s.list[i].reason
2124          *              );
2125          *          }
2126          *      },
2127          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2128          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2129          *      }
2130          * });
2131          */
2132         hcap.application.getApplicationList = function (param) {
2133             hcap_command("get_application_list", param);
2134         };
2135         /**
2136          * Launches a application.<br>
2137          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".<br>
2138          * Following table specifies applications, their ids and parameters. (Supported applications are different according to TV model, but App IDs of applications should be same)<br> 
2139          * <table border=1 style="border: 1px;">
2140          *     <b><tr><th>Application</th><th>id</th><th>parameters</th></tr></b>
2141          *     <tr><td>AccuWeather</td><td>accuweather</td><td></td></tr>
2142          *     <tr><td>Al Jazeera</td><td>aljazeera</td><td></td></tr>
2143          *     <tr><td>Amazon</td><td>amazon.html</td><td></td></tr>
2144          *     <tr><td>AR Browser</td><td>com.zenith.app.arbrowser</td><td>"{<br>
2145          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2146          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
2147          *     <tr><td>Arirang TV</td><td>arirang.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2148          *     <tr><td>BBC</td><td>bbc</td><td></td></tr>
2149          *     <tr><td>Bluetooth Sound Sync</td><td>com.webos.app.btaudiostreaming</td><td></td></tr>
2150          *     <tr><td>Browser</td><td>com.webos.app.browser</td><td>"{'params':{<br>
2151          *                                                            'target':string, // url string. default is empty. ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2152          *                                                            'fullMode':string, // full mode. default is 'false'. 'true' : full page mode, 'false' : general web browser mode<br>
2153          *                                                            'newtab':string // default is 'true'. 'true' : new page is loaded on the new tab, 'false' : new page is loaded on the current tab.<br>
2154          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>
