3921          *              "\n video stream type : " + s.videoStreamType +
3922          *              "\n audio pid         : " + s.audioPid        +
3923          *              "\n audio stream type : " + s.audioStreamType +
3924          *              "\n signal strength   : " + s.signalStrength  +
3925          *              "\n source address    : " + s.sourceAddress);
3926          *      }, 
3927          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
3928          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
3929          *      }
3930          * });
3931          * 
3932          * @param {Object} param
3933          * <ul>
3934          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
3935          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
3936          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
3937          *       // see the <a href="../symbols/hcap.channel.html#.CHANNEL_PROPERTY">{ Channel Properties }</a> in <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>.
3938          *   }</pre>
3939          *   </li>
3940          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
3941          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
3942          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
3943          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
3944          *   }</pre>
3945          *   </li>
3946          * </ul>
3947          * 
3948          * @since 1.3.1
3949          * 
3950          * @see
3951          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
3952          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
3953          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
3954          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
3955          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
3956          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
3957          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
3958          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
3959          */
3960         hcap.channel.getStartChannel = function (param) {
3961             hcap_command("get_start_channel", param);
3962         };
3963         /**
3964          * Sets the start channel which is displayed at first when TV is turned on.
3965          * 
3966          * This API is very 
3967          * similar to <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>, 
3968          * but in this case, just update the start channel setting without channel change.
3969          * 
3970          * For detailed information, such as example and related information, please refer to 
3971          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>.
3972          * 
3973          * @example
3974          * // set start channel with RF channel class 2
3975          * hcap.channel.setStartChannel({
3976          *      "channelType" : hcap.channel.ChannelType.RF, 
3977          *      "frequency" : 63000000, 
3978          *      "programNumber" : 1, 
3979          *      "rfBroadcastType" : hcap.channel.RfBroadcastType.TERRESTRIAL, 
3980          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
3981          *          console.log("onSuccess");
3982          *      }, 
3983          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
3984          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
3985          *      }
3986          * });
3987          * 
3988          * @param {Object} param
3989          * <ul>
3990          *   <li><a href="../symbols/hcap.channel.html#.CHANNEL_PROPERTY">{ Channel Properties } [Required] - Channel Information</a></li>
3991          *   <br>If you want to set off start channel, set param.channelType to hcap.channel.ChannelType.UNKNOWN.
3992          *   </li>
3993          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.<br>
3994          *            Setting to the same channel as before will invoke this callback function.
3995          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
3996          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
3997          *       // No Parameter.
3998          *   }</pre>
3999          *   </li>
4000          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4001          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4002          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4003          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4004          *   }</pre>
4005          *   </li>
4006          * </ul>
4007          * 
4008          * @since 1.3.1
4009          * 
4010          * @see
4011          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4012          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4013          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4014          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4015          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
4016          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
4017          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
4018          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
4019          */
4020         hcap.channel.setStartChannel = function (param) {
4021             hcap_command("set_start_channel", param);
4022         };
4023         /**
4024          * Gets the list of supported audio languages in the current channel.<br>
4025          * Audio language list is composed of language codes and delimiter comma(',').<br>
4026          * Application can get/set audio language of the current channel by index of the audio language list.<br><br>
4027          * If there is no audio language list of the current channel, only "xx" is returned as the audio language list.<br>
4028          * And "xx" could be returned as an audio language if the audio language is not mapped to an audio language code.<br>
4029          * 
4030          * <div align=center>
4031          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4032          *   <thead>
4033          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4034          *   </thead>
4035          *   <tbody>
4036          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4037          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4038          *   </tbody>
4039          *   <tfoot>
4040          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4041          *   </tfoot>
4042          * </table>
4043          * </div>
4044          * If the application wants to set the audio language to French ('fr'), use the index '2'.<br>
4045          * 
4046          * @param {Object} param
4047          * <ul>
4048          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4049          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4050          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4051          *       // {String} param.list - audio language list string 
4052          *       //     which is composed of language codes separated by delimiter comma(',').
4053          *   }</pre>
4054          *   </li>
4055          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4056          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4057          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4058          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4059          *   }</pre>
4060          *   </li>
4061          * </ul>
4062          * 
4063          * @since 1.3.1
4064          * 
4065          * @see
4066          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4067          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4068          *
4069          * @example
4070          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList({
4071          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4072          *          console.log("onSuccess : list = " + s.list);
4073          *      }, 
4074          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4075          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4076          *      }
4077          * });
4078          */
4079         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList = function (param) {
4080             hcap_command("get_current_channel_audio_language_list", param);
4081         };
4082         /**
4083          * Gets the audio language index of the current channel.<br>
4084          * If application wants to map the index to audio language code, then it can get the audio language list of the current channel by 
4085          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a>. 
4086          * 
4087          * <div align=center>
4088          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4089          *   <thead>
4090          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4091          *   </thead>
4092          *   <tbody>
4093          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4094          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4095          *   </tbody>
4096          *   <tfoot>
4097          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4098          *   </tfoot>
4099          * </table>
4100          * </div>
4101          *
4102          * @param {Object} param
4103          * <ul>
4104          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4105          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4106          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4107          *       // {Number} param.index - audio language index of the current channel.
4108          *   }</pre>
4109          *   </li>
4110          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4111          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4112          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4113          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4114          *   }</pre>
4115          *   </li>
4116          * </ul>
4117          * 
4118          * @since 1.3.1
4119          * 
4120          * @see
4121          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList()</a><br>
4122          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4123          *
4124          * @example
4125          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex({
4126          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4127          *          console.log("onSuccess : index = " + s.index);
4128          *      }, 
4129          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4130          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4131          *      }
4132          * });
4133          */
4134         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex = function (param) {
4135             hcap_command("get_current_channel_audio_language_index", param);
4136         };
4137         /**
4138          * Sets the audio language of the current channel.<br>
4139          * 
4140          * <div align=center>
4141          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4142          *   <thead>
4143          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4144          *   </thead>
4145          *   <tbody>
4146          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4147          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4148          *   </tbody>
4149          *   <tfoot>
4150          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4151          *   </tfoot>
4152          * </table>
4153          * </div>
4154          * 
4155          * @param {Object} param
4156          * <ul>
4157          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - audio language index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
4158          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4159          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4160          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4161          *       // No Parameter.
4162          *   }</pre>
4163          *   </li>
4164          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
4165          *            Setting to the same audio language index as before will invoke this callback function.
4166          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4167          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4168          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4169          *   }</pre>
4170          *   </li>
4171          * </ul>
4172          * 
4173          * @since 1.3.1
4174          * 
4175          * @see
4176          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList()</a><br>
4177          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4178          *
4179          * @example
4180          * hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex({
4181          *      "index" : 1, 
4182          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4183          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4184          *      }, 
4185          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4186          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4187          *      }
4188          * });
4189          */
4190         hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex = function (param) {
4191             hcap_command("set_current_channel_audio_language_index", param);
4192         };
4193         /**
4194          * Gets supported subtitle list of the current channel. <br>
4195          * Subtitle list is composed of subtitle setting values and delimiter comma(','). <br>
4196          * Application can get/set subtitle setting of the current channel by index of the subtitle list.<br>
4197          * "xx" for which no subtitle is displayed, can be returned as a subtitle setting if the subtitle is not mapped to an available system subtitle.<br>
4198          * And "off" can be returned as a subtitle setting to turn off the subtitle.<br>
4199          * If there is no subtitle list of the current channel, only "off" is returned as the subtitle list.
4200          * 
4201          * <div align=center>
4202          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4203          *   <thead>
4204          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4205          *   </thead>
4206          *   <tbody>
4207          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4208          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4209          *   </tbody>
4210          *   <tfoot>
4211          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4212          *   </tfoot>
4213          * </table>
4214          * </div>
4215          * If the application wants to set the subtitle to French ('fr'), use the index value '3'.</a>
4216          * 
4217          * @param {Object} param
4218          * <ul>
4219          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4220          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4221          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4222          *       // {String} param.list - subtitle list string 
4223          *       //     which is composed of subtitle setting values and delimiter comma(',').
4224          *   }</pre>
4225          *   </li>
4226          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4227          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4228          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4229          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4230          *   }</pre>
4231          *   </li>
4232          * </ul>
4233          * 
4234          * @since 1.3.1
4235          * 
4236          * @see
4237          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4238          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4239          *
4240          * @example
4241          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList({
4242          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4243          *          console.log("onSuccess : list = " + s.list);
4244          *      }, 
4245          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4246          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4247          *      }
4248          * });
4249          */
4250         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList = function (param) {
4251             hcap_command("get_current_channel_subtitle_language_list", param);
4252         };
4253         /**
4254          * Gets the subtitle index of the current channel. 
4255          * If application wants to map the index to subtitle setting value, get subtitle list of the current channel by 
4256          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a>.
4257          *
4258          * <div align=center>
4259          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4260          *   <thead>
4261          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4262          *   </thead>
4263          *   <tbody>
4264          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4265          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4266          *   </tbody>
4267          *   <tfoot>
4268          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4269          *   </tfoot>
4270          * </table>
4271          * </div>
4272          *
4273          * @param {Object} param
4274          * <ul>
4275          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4276          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4277          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4278          *       // {Number} param.index - subtitle setting index of the current channel.
4279          *   }</pre>
4280          *   </li>
4281          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4282          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4283          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4284          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4285          *   }</pre>
4286          *   </li>
4287          * </ul>
4288          * 
4289          * @since 1.3.1
4290          * 
4291          * @see
4292          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList()</a><br>
4293          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4294          *
4295          * @example
4296          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex({
4297          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4298          *          console.log("onSuccess : index = " + s.index);
4299          *      }, 
4300          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4301          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4302          *      }
4303          * });
4304          */
4305         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex = function (param) {
4306             hcap_command("get_current_channel_subtitle_language_index", param);
4307         };
4308         /**
4309          * Sets the subtitle index of the current channel.<br>
4310          * 
4311          * <div align=center>
4312          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4313          *   <thead>
4314          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4315          *   </thead>
4316          *   <tbody>
4317          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4318          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4319          *   </tbody>
4320          *   <tfoot>
4321          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4322          *   </tfoot>
4323          * </table>
4324          * </div>
4325          * 
4326          * If the application wants to set the subtitle to French ('fr'), use the index value '3'</a>.
4327          *
4328          * @param {Object} param
4329          * <ul>
4330          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - subtitle setting index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
4331          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4332          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4333          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4334          *       // No Parameter.
4335          *   }</pre>
4336          *   </li>
4337          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
4338          *            Setting to the same subtitle index as before will invoke this callback function. 
4339          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4340          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4341          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4342          *   }</pre>
4343          *   </li>
4344          * </ul>
4345          * 
4346          * @since 1.3.1
4347          * 
4348          * @see
4349          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList()</a><br>
4350          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4351          *
4352          * @example
4353          * hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex({
4354          *      "index" : 1, 
4355          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4356          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4357          *      }, 
4358          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4359          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4360          *      }
4361          * });
4362          */
4363         hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex = function (param) {
4364             hcap_command("set_current_channel_subtitle_language_index", param);
4365         };
4366         /**
4367          * Gets the information about the current program and the next program in the current channel.
4368          *
4369          * @param {Object} param
4370          * <ul>
4371          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4372          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4373          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4374          *       // {String} param.currentProgram.title - title of the current program.
4375          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.year - year of the start time of the current program.
4376          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.month - month of the start time of the current program.
4377          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.day - day of the start time of the current program.
4378          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.hour - hour of the start time of the current program.
4379          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.minute - minute of the start time of the current program.
4380          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.second - second of the start time of the current program.
4381          *       // {String} param.currentProgram.lengthInSeconds - length of the current program in seconds. (0 ~ 2^32 - 1)
4382          *       // {String} param.nextProgram.title - title of the next program.
4383          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.year - year of the start time of the next program.
4384          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.month - month of the start time of the next program.
4385          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.day - day of the start time of the next program.
4386          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.hour - hour of the start time of the next program.
4387          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.minute - minute of the start time of the next program.
4388          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.second - second of the start time of the next program.
4389          *       // {String} param.nextProgram.lengthInSeconds - length of the next program in seconds. (0 ~ 2^32 - 1)
4390          *   }</pre>
4391          *   </li>
4392          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4393          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4394          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4395          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4396          *   }</pre>
4397          *   </li>
4398          * </ul>
4399          * 
4400          * @since 1.5.0
4401          *
4402          * @example
4403          * hcap.channel.getProgramInfo({
4404          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4405          *          console.log("onSuccess :" + 
4406          *              "\n currentProgram title = " + s.currentProgram.title +
4407          *              "\n currentProgram startTime = " + s.currentProgram.startTime.year + 
4408          *                      "-" + s.currentProgram.startTime.month +
4409          *                      "-" + s.currentProgram.startTime.day +
4410          *                      " " + s.currentProgram.startTime.hour +
4411          *                      " : " + s.currentProgram.startTime.minute +
4412          *                      " : " + s.currentProgram.startTime.second +
4413          *              "\n currentProgram length = " + s.currentProgram.lengthInSeconds + "second(s)" +
4414          *              "\n nextProgram title = " + s.nextProgram.title +
4415          *              "\n nextProgram startTime = " + s.nextProgram.startTime.year + 
4416          *                      "-" + s.nextProgram.startTime.month +
4417          *                      "-" + s.nextProgram.startTime.day +
4418          *                      " " + s.nextProgram.startTime.hour +
4419          *                      " : " + s.nextProgram.startTime.minute +
4420          *                      " : " + s.nextProgram.startTime.second +
4421          *              "\n nextProgram length = " + s.nextProgram.lengthInSeconds + "second(s)");
4422          *      }, 
4423          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4424          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4425          *      }
4426          * });
4427          */
4428         hcap.channel.getProgramInfo = function (param) {
4429             hcap_command("get_program_info", param);
4430         };
4431         /**
4432          * Launch the application of the inband data service type in the current channel.
4433          *
4434          * @param {Object} param
4435          * <ul>
4436          *   <li>{Number} param.inband_data_service_type [Required] - inband data service type to launch at the current channel.</li>
4437          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4438          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4439          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4440          *       // No Parameter.
4441          *   }</pre>
4442          *   </li>
4443          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function. 
4444          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4445          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4446          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4447          *   }</pre>
4448          *   </li>
4449          * </ul>
4450          * 
4451          * @since 1.6.0
4452          *
4453          * @see
4454          * <a href="_global_.html#event:inband_data_service_ready">{Event} inband_data_service_ready</a><br>
4455          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHP">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP</a><br>
4456          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHEG">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG</a><br>
4457          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.HBBTV">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV</a><br>
4458          *
4459          * @example
4460          * hcap.channel.launchInbandDataService({
4461          *      "inband_data_service_type" : hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV,
4462          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4463          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4464          *      }, 
4465          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4466          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4467          *      }
4468          * });
4469          */
4470         hcap.channel.launchInbandDataService = function (param) {
4471             hcap_command("launch_inband_data_service", param);
4472         };
4473         /**
4474          * Get the available inband data service in the current channel.
4475          *
4476          * @param {Object} param
4477          * <ul>
4478          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4479          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4480          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4481          *       // {Number} param.availableDataServiceType - available data service type in the current channel. If there is no available data service, hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE will be returned.
4482          *   }</pre>
4483          *   </li>
4484          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function. 
4485          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4486          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4487          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4488          *   }</pre>
4489          *   </li>
4490          * </ul>
4491          * 
4492          * @since 1.8.0
4493          *
4494          * @see
4495          * <a href="_global_.html#event:inband_data_service_ready">{Event} inband_data_service_ready</a><br>
4496          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHP">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP</a><br>
4497          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHEG">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG</a><br>
4498          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.HBBTV">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV</a><br>
4499          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.NONE">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE</a><br>
4500          *
4501          * @example
4502          * hcap.channel.getReadyInbandDataService({
4503          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4504          *          var serviceType = "UNKNOWN";
4505          *          switch(s.availableDataServiceType) {
4506          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP: serviceType = "MHP"; break;
4507          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG: serviceType = "MHEG"; break;
4508          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV: serviceType = "HBBTV"; break;
4509          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE: serviceType = "NONE"; break;
4510          *          default: serviceType = "UNKNOWN"; break;
4511          *          }
4512          *          console.log("onSuccess : available data service type = " + serviceType);
4513          *      }, 
4514          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4515          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4516          *      }
4517          * });
4518          */
4519         hcap.channel.getReadyInbandDataService = function (param) {
4520             hcap_command("get_ready_inband_data_service", param);
4521         };
4522         /**
4523          * Gets the channel signal status.
4524          * 
4525          * @example
4526          * hcap.channel.getChannelSignalStatus({
4527          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4528          *          console.log("onSuccess  :" + 
4529          *              "\n snr value       : " + s.snrValue       +
4530          *              "\n frequency       : " + s.frequency      +
4531          *              "\n signal level    : " + s.signalLevel    +              
4532          *              "\n modulation mode : " + s.modulationMode +
4533          *              "\n lock status     : " + s.lockStatus);
4534          *      }, 
4535          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4536          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4537          *      }
4538          * });
4539          * @param {Object} param
4540          * <ul>
4541          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4542          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4543          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4544          *       // {Number} param.snrValue - snr value(dB).
4545          *       // {Number} param.frequency - current frequency(KHz).
4546          *       // {Number} param.signalLevel - signal level(%).
4547          *       // {String} param.modulationMode - modulation mode.
4548          *       // {Boolean} param.lockStatus - lock status.
4549          *   }</pre>
4550          *   </li>
4551          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4552          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4553          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4554          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4555          *   }</pre>
4556          *   </li>
4557          * </ul>
4558          * 
4559          * @since 1.19.2
4560          */
4561         hcap.channel.getChannelSignalStatus = function (param) {
4562             hcap_command("get_channel_signal_status", param);
4563         };
4564         /**
4565          * @namespace hcap.externalinput
4566          */
4567         hcap.externalinput = {};
4568         /**
4569          * @namespace hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType
4570          */
4571         hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType = {
4572             /**
4573              * External Input Type List TV
4574              * @since 1.3.1
4575              * @constant
4576              */
4577             TV                : 1,
4578             /**
4579              * External Input Type List Composite
4580              * @since 1.3.1
4581              * @constant
4582              */
4583             COMPOSITE         : 2,
4584             /**
4585              * External Input Type List S-Video
4586              * @since 1.3.1
4587              * @constant
4588              */
4589             SVIDEO            : 3,
4590             /**
4591              * External Input Type List Component
4592              * @since 1.3.1
4593              * @constant
4594              */
4595             COMPONENT         : 4,
4596             /**
4597              * External Input Type List RGB
4598              * @since 1.3.1
4599              * @constant
4600              */
4601             RGB               : 5,
4602             /**
4603              * External Input Type List HDMI
4604              * @since 1.3.1
4605              * @constant
4606              */
4607             HDMI              : 6,
4608             /**
4609              * External Input Type List SCART
4610              * @since 1.3.1
4611              * @constant
4612              */
4613             SCART             : 7,
4614             USB               : 8,
4615             /**
4616              * External Input Type List Others
4617              * @since 1.3.1
4618              * @constant
4619              */
4620             OTHERS            : 9
4621         };
4622         /**
4623          * Gets the current Audio/Video source type and index. Types and indexes of input sources depend on the H/W Spec.
4624          * Following table specifies Audio & Video source type.<br>
4625          * 
4626          * <div align=center id=".EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">
4627          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=600>
4628          *   <thead>
4629          *     <tr>
4630          *     <th>Source Type</th>
4631          *     <th>Value</th>
4632          *     </tr>
4633          *   </thead>
4634          *   <tbody>
4635          *     <tr class="odd"><td>TV       </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a></td></tr>
4636          *     <tr            ><td>Composite</td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a></td></tr>
4637          *     <tr class="odd"><td>S-Video  </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a></td></tr>
4638          *     <tr            ><td>Component</td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a></td></tr>
4639          *     <tr class="odd"><td>RGB      </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a></td></tr>
4640          *     <tr            ><td>HDMI     </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td></tr>
4641          *     <tr class="odd"><td>SCART    </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a></td></tr>
4642          *     <tr            ><td>OTHERS   </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a></td></tr>
4643          *   </tbody>
4644          *   <tfoot>
4645          *     <tr><th colspan="2">External Input Type List List</td></tr>
4646          *   </tfoot>
4647          * </table>
4648          * </div>
4649          * 
4650          * Following table shows the multiple index for the same type of Audio & Video source.<br>
4651          * <div align=center>
4652          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=600>
4653          *   <thead>
4654          *     <tr>
4655          *     <th>Device Input</th>
4656          *     <th>External Input Type List</th>
4657          *     <th>Source Index</th>
4658          *     </tr>
4659          *   </thead>
4660          *   <tbody>
4661          *     <tr class="odd"><td>1st HDMI   </td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td><td>0</td></tr>
4662          *     <tr>            <td>2nd HDMI   </td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td><td>1</td></tr>
4663          *     <tr class="odd"><td>1st S-Video</td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><td>0</td></tr>
4664          *   </tbody>
4665          *   <tfoot>
4666          *     <tr><th colspan="3">Example of Multiple Index</td></tr>
4667          *   </tfoot>
4668          * </table>
4669          * </div>
4670          *
4671          * @param {Object} param
4672          * <ul>
4673          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4674          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4675          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4676          *       // {Number} param.type - external Input Type List.
4677          *       // {Number} param.index - index of source. Index value starts with 0. 
4678          *       //     Max value of source index depends on the H/W Spec
4679          *   }</pre>
4680          *   </li>
4681          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4682          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4683          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4684          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4685          *   }</pre>
4686          *   </li>
4687          * </ul>
4688          * 
4689          * @see
4690          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
4691          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4692          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.isExternalInputConnected">hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected()</a><br>
4693          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
4694          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
4695          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
4696          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
4697          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
4698          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
4699          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
4700          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
4701          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
4702          * 
4703          * @since 1.3.1
4704          * 
4705          * @example
4706          * hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput({
4707          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4708          *          console.log("onSuccess :" + 
4709          *              "\n type = " + s.type +
4710          *              "\n index = " + s.index);
4711          *      }, 
4712          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4713          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4714          *      }
4715          * });
4716          */
4717         hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput = function (param) {
4718             hcap_command("get_external_input", param);
4719         };
4720         /**
4721          * Changes the current Audio & Video source type and index.<br>
4722          * For the external input type list, refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">{ external input type list }</a>.<br>
4723          * 
4724          * @param {Object} param
4725          * <ul>
4726          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - audio/Video source type.</li>
4727          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - index of source type. Index value starts with 0.</li>
4728          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4729          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4730          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4731          *       // No parameter.
4732          *   }</pre>
4733          *   </li>
4734          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
4735          *           Setting to same audio/video source type and index will invoke this callback function.
4736          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4737          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4738          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4739          *   }</pre>
4740          *   </li>
4741          * </ul>
4742          * 
4743          * @see
4744          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
4745          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4746          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.isExternalInputConnected">hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected()</a><br>
4747          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
4748          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
4749          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
4750          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
4751          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
4752          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
4753          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
4754          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
4755          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
4756          * 
4757          * @since 1.3.1
4758          * 
4759          * @example
4760          * hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput({
4761          *      "type" : hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI,
4762          *      "index" : 1, 
4763          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4764          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4765          *      }, 
4766          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4767          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4768          *      }
4769          * });
4770          */
4771         hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput = function (param) {
4772             hcap_command("set_external_input", param);
4773         };
4774         /**
4775          * Checks if the Audio/Video input signal is connected to RGB or HDMI, or if the cable is connected to other input sources.<br>
4776          * Types and indexes of input sources depend on the H/W Spec.<br><br>
4777          * For the external input type list, refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">{ external input type list }</a>.<br>
4778          *
4779          * @param {Object} param
4780          * <ul>
4781          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - external input type.</li>
4782          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - index of source type. Index value starts with 0.</li>
4783          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4784          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4785          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4786          *       // {Boolean} param.isConnected -  true if the signal of RGB or HDMI was connected,
4787          *       //     or the cable of other input sources was connected; otherwise false.
4788          *   }</pre>
4789          *   </li>
4790          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4791          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4792          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4793          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4794          *   }</pre>
4795          *   </li>
4796          * </ul>
4797          * 
4798          * @see
4799          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
4800          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4801          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4802          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
4803          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
4804          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
4805          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
4806          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
4807          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
4808          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
4809          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
4810          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
4811          * 
4812          * @since 1.3.1
4813          * 
4814          * @example
4815          * // this examples shows how to check that the 1st RGB input is connected.
4816          * hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected({
4817          *      "type" : hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB,
4818          *      "index" : 0,
4819          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4820          *          console.log("onSuccess : isConnected = " + s.isConnected);
4821          *      }, 
4822          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4823          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4824          *      }
4825          * });
4826          */
4827         hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected = function (param) {
4828             hcap_command("check_external_input_connected", param);
4829         };
4830         /**
4831          * Gets the physically supported external input list.<br>
4832          *
4833          * @param {Object} param
4834          * <ul>
4835          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4836          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4837          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4838          *       // {Array} param.list - external input list supported by TV
4839          *       //         {Number} param.list[].type - external input type (refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">external input type</a>)
4840          *       //         {Number} param.list[].index - external input index in the external input type
4841          *   }</pre>
4842          *   </li>
4843          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4844          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4845          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4846          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4847          *   }</pre>
4848          *   </li>
4849          * </ul>
4850          * 
4851          * @see
4852          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
4853          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4854          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
4855          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
4856          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
4857          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
4858          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
4859          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
4860          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
4861          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
4862          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
4863          * 
4864          * @since 1.20
4865          * 
4866          * @example
4867          * hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList({
4868          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4869          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
4870          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
4871          *              console.log("(" + s.list[i].type + "," + s.list[i].index + ")");
4872          *          }
4873          *      },
4874          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4875          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4876          *      }
4877          * });
4878          */
4879         hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList = function (param) {
4880             hcap_command("get_external_input_list", param);
4881         };
4882         /**
4883          * @namespace hcap.carousel
4884          */
4885         hcap.carousel = {};
4886         /**
4887          * Requests to cache the carousel data file for the given url. The carousel data will be cached internally.<br>
4888          * When the carousel data is cached, application will received the <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>.
4889          * <br><br>
4890          * The carousel data can be broadcasted in two ways. <br>
4891          * One is through RF channel and the other is through IP multicast channel.<br>
4892          *
4893          * @param {Object} param
4894          * <ul>
4895          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - carousel data url. <br>The format should be "hcap://[frequency (Hz, and MHz for satellite)].[program number].[component tag]/[path]/[content name]".<br>
4896          *                                       frequency 1 means Pro:Centric server same as data channel of RF frequency or IP multicast address.</li>
4897          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4898          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4899          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4900          *       // No Parameter.
4901          *   }</pre>
4902          *   </li>
4903          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4904          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4905          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4906          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4907          *   }</pre>
4908          *   </li>
4909          * </ul>
4910          * 
4911          * @see
4912          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.isCarouselDataCached">hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached()</a><br>
4913          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.clearCarouselDataCache">hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache()</a><br>
4914          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
4915          * 
4916          * @since 1.3.1
4917          * 
4918          * @example
4919          * // Request to cache xait.xml from data channel (frequency : 1 for both RF and IP multicast) with program number 1 and component tag 1.
4920          * hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData({
4921          *      "url" : "hcap://1.1.1/xait.xml",
4922          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4923          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4924          *      }, 
4925          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4926          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4927          *      }
4928          * });
4929          *
4930          * @example
4931          * // Request to cache xait.xml from the channel (frequency : 513MHz) with program number 1 and component tag 1.
4932          * hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData({
4933          *      "url" : "hcap://513000000.1.1/xait.xml",
4934          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4935          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4936          *      }, 
4937          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4938          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4939          *      }
4940          * });
4941          */
4942         hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData = function (param) {
4943             hcap_command("request_content", param);
4944         };
4945         /**
4946          * Checks if the carousel data is cached or not.
4947          *
4948          * @param {Object} param
4949          * <ul>
4950          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - carousel data url to check.</li>
4951          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4952          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4953          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4954          *       // {String} param.cachePath - cached url path if carousel data is cached. Empty string ("") if not.
4955          *   }</pre>
4956          *   </li>
4957          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4958          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4959          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4960          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4961          *   }</pre>
4962          *   </li>
4963          * </ul>
4964          * 
4965          * @see
4966          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData()</a><br>
4967          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.clearCarouselDataCache">hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache()</a><br>
4968          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
4969          * 
4970          * @since 1.3.1
4971          * 
4972          * @example
4973          * hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached({
4974          *      "url" : "hcap://1.1.1/xait.xml",
4975          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4976          *          console.log("onSuccess : cachePath = " + s.cachePath);
4977          *      }, 
4978          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4979          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4980          *      }
4981          * });
4982          */
4983         hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached = function (param) {
4984             hcap_command("is_content_loaded", param);
4985         };
4986         /**
4987          * Clear the cache storage for the carousel data. All carousel cache will be deleted.
4988          *
4989          * @param {Object} param
4990          * <ul>
4991          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4992          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4993          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4994          *       // No Parameter.
4995          *   }</pre>
4996          *   </li>
4997          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4998          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4999          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5000          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5001          *   }</pre>
5002          *   </li>
5003          * </ul>
5004          * 
5005          * @since 1.3.1
5006          * 
5007          * @see
5008          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData()</a><br>
5009          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.isCarouselDataCached">hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached()</a><br>
5010          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
5011          *
5012          * @example
5013          * hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache({
5014          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5015          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5016          *      }, 
5017          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5018          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5019          *      }
5020          * });
5021          */
5022         hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache = function (param) {
5023             hcap_command("clear_content_cache", param);
5024         };
5025         /**
5026          * @namespace hcap.mpi
5027          */
5028         hcap.mpi = {};
5029         /**
5030          * Sends the vendor specific data using the MPI card and receives the reply data.
5031          *
5032          * @param {Object} param
5033          * <ul>
5034          *   <li>{Number} param.id [Required] - request ID that is defined between application and headend. (0 ~ 255)</li>
5035          *   <li>{Number} param.sequence [Required] - sequence number of the packet. (0 ~ 255).</li>
5036          *   <li>{String} param.packet [Required] - packet data to the MPI card. (0 ~ 32).
5037          *   The packet format is character array. For example param.packet = "ABC0x123"; </li>          
5038          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5039          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5040          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5041          *       // {String} param.packet - received packet data (length < 32) from MPI card. 
5042          *       //     If failed to get the data, then the packet will be empty string "".
5043          *   }</pre>
5044          *   </li>
5045          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5046          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5047          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5048          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5049          *   }</pre>
5050          *   </li>
5051          * </ul>
5052          * 
5053          * @since 1.3.1
5054          * 
5055          * @see
5056          * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendMpiData()</a>
5057          * 
5058          * @example
5059          * hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData({
5060          *      "id" : 0,
5061          *      "sequence" : 0,
5062          *      "packet" : "ABC0x123",         
5063          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5064          *          console.log("onSuccess return packet " + s.packet);
5065          *      }, 
5066          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5067          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5068          *      }
5069          * });
5070          */
5071         hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData = function (param) {
5072             hcap_command("send_and_receive_mpi_data", param);
5073         };
5074         /**
5075          * Sends the vendor specific data to the MPI card<br>
5076          * The MPI data will be received by <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_data_received">{Event} mpi_data_received</a>.
5077          *
5078          * @param {Object} param
5079          * <ul>
5080          *   <li>{Number} param.id [Required] - request ID that is defined between application and headend. (0 ~ 255)</li>
5081          *   <li>{Number} param.sequence [Required] - sequence number of the packet. (0 ~ 255).</li>
5082          *   <li>{String} param.packet [Required] - packet data to the MPI card. (0 ~ 32).
5083          *   The packet format is character array. For example param.packet = "ABC0x123"; </li>          
5084          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5085          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5086          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5087          *       // No Parameter.
5088          *   }</pre>
5089          *   </li>
5090          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5091          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5092          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5093          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5094          *   }</pre>
5095          *   </li>
5096          * </ul>
5097          *  
5098          * @since 1.3.1
5099          * 
5100          * @see
5101          * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendAndReceiveMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData()</a><br>
5102          * <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_data_received">{Event} mpi_data_received</a>
5103          *
5104          * @example
5105          * hcap.mpi.sendMpiData({
5106          *      "id" : 0,
5107          *      "sequence" : 0,
5108          *      "packet" : "ABC0x123",
5109          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5110          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5111          *      }, 
5112          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5113          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5114          *      }
5115          * });
5116          */
5117         hcap.mpi.sendMpiData = function (param) {
5118             hcap_command("send_mpi_data", param);
5119         };
5120         /**
5121          * @namespace hcap.power
5122          */
5123         hcap.power = {};
5124         /**
5125          * @namespace hcap.power.PowerMode
5126          */
5127         hcap.power.PowerMode = {
5128             /**
5129              * TV seems to be turned off to user(panel is off), but both micom and chipset are on.
5130              * @since 1.3.1
5131              * @constant
5132              */
5133             WARM             : 2,
5134             /**
5135              * This is normal TV-on status to user(panel is on). Both micom and chipset are on.
5136              * @since 1.3.1
5137              * @constant
5138              */
5139             NORMAL           : 1
5140         };
5141         /**
5142          * Gets the power mode of the TV.
5143          *
5144          * @param {Object} param
5145          * <ul>
5146          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5147          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5148          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5149          *       // {Number} param.mode - power mode of the TV.
5150          *   }</pre>
5151          *   </li>
5152          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5153          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5154          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5155          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5156          *   }</pre>
5157          *   </li>
5158          * </ul>
5159          *  
5160          * @since 1.3.1
5161          * 
5162          * @see
5163          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.setPowerMode">hcap.power.setPowerMode()</a><br>
5164          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.isWarmUpdate">hcap.power.isWarmUpdate()</a><br>
5165          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.WARM">hcap.power.PowerMode.WARM</a><br>
5166          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.NORMAL">hcap.power.PowerMode.NORMAL</a>
5167          *
5168          * @example
5169          * hcap.power.getPowerMode({
5170          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5171          *          console.log("onSuccess power mode " + s.mode);
5172          *      }, 
5173          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5174          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5175          *      }
5176          * });
5177          */
5178         hcap.power.getPowerMode = function (param) {
5179             hcap_command("get_power_mode", param);
5180         };
5181         /**
5182          * Sets the power mode of the TV.
5183          *
5184          * @param {Object} param
5185          * <ul>
5186          *   <li>{Number} param.mode [Required] - power mode to be set for TV. Possible values are followings.
5187          * <div align=center>
5188          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=600>
5189          *   <thead>
5190          *     <tr><th>mode</th><th>value</th><th>description</th></tr>
5191          *   </thead>
5192          *   <tbody>
5193          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Standby mode </th><td> - </td><td>TV is off</td></tr>
5194          *     <tr><th>Normal mode</th><td><a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.NORMAL">hcap.power.PowerMode.NORMAL</td><td class="left">the board and the panel is on</td></tr>
5195          *     <tr><th>Warm mode</th><td><a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.WARM">hcap.power.PowerMode.WARM</td><td class="left">the board is alive but the panel is off</td></tr>
5196          *   </tbody>
5197          *   <tfoot>
5198          *     <tr><th colspan="3">Power mode of TV</td></tr>
5199          *   </tfoot>
5200          * </table>
5201          * </div></li>
5202          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5203          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5204          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5205          *       // No Parameter.
5206          *   }</pre>
5207          *   </li>
5208          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
5209          *        Setting to the same power mode as before will invoke this callback function. 
5210          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5211          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5212          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5213          *   }</pre>
5214          *   </li>
5215          * </ul>
5216          *  
5217          * @since 1.3.1
5218          * 
5219          * @see
5220          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.getPowerMode">hcap.power.getPowerMode()</a><br>
5221          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.isWarmUpdate">hcap.power.isWarmUpdate()</a><br>
5222          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.WARM">hcap.power.PowerMode.WARM</a><br>
5223          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.NORMAL">hcap.power.PowerMode.NORMAL</a>
5224          *
5225          * @example
5226          * hcap.power.setPowerMode({
5227          *      "mode" : hcap.power.PowerMode.WARM,
5228          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5229          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5230          *      }, 
5231          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5232          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5233          *      }
5234          * });
5235          */
5236         hcap.power.setPowerMode = function (param) {
5237             hcap_command("set_power_mode", param);
5238         };
5239         /**
5240          * Gets whether TV power is in warm update or not.<br>
5241          * "warm update" means the duration from starting HCAP application upgrade and EZ-I upgrade in the power WARM state to the power STANDBY.
5242          *
5243          * @param {Object} param
5244          * <ul>
5245          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5246          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5247          *   param.onSuccess = function(param) {
5248          *       // {Boolean} param.isWarmUpdate - true : TV power is in warm update, otherwise false.
5249          *   }</pre>
5250          *   </li>
5251          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5252          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5253          *   param.onFailure = function(param) {
5254          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5255          *   }</pre>
5256          *   </li>
5257          * </ul>
5258          *  
5259          * @since 1.19.0
5260          * 
5261          * @see
5262          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.getPowerMode">hcap.power.getPowerMode()</a><br>
5263          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.setPowerMode">hcap.power.setPowerMode()</a><br>
5264          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.WARM">hcap.power.PowerMode.WARM</a><br>
5265          * <a href="hcap.power.PowerMode.html#.NORMAL">hcap.power.PowerMode.NORMAL</a>
5266          *
5267          * @example
5268          * hcap.power.isWarmUpdate({
5269          *      "onSuccess":function(s) {
5270          *          console.log("onSuccess : is warm update = " + s.isWarmUpdate);
5271          *      }, 
5272          *      "onFailure":function(f) {
5273          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5274          *      }
5275          * });
5276          */
5277         hcap.power.isWarmUpdate = function (param) {
5278             hcap_command("is_power_warm_update", param);
5279         };
5280         /**
5281          * Turns off the TV.
5282          *
5283          * @param {Object} param
5284          * <ul>
5285          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5286          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5287          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5288          *       // No Parameter.
5289          *   }</pre>
5290          *   </li>
5291          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5292          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5293          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5294          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5295          *   }</pre>
5296          *   </li>
5297          * </ul>
5298          *  
5299          * @since 1.3.1
5300          * 
5301          * @see
5302          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.reboot">hcap.power.reboot()</a>
5303          *
5304          * @example
5305          * hcap.power.powerOff({
5306          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5307          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5308          *      }, 
5309          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5310          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5311          *      }
5312          * });
5313          */
5314         hcap.power.powerOff = function (param) {
5315             hcap_command("power_off", param);
5316         };
5317         /**
5318          * power.reboots the TV.
5319          *
5320          * @param {Object} param
5321          * <ul>
5322          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5323          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5324          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5325          *       // No Parameter.
5326          *   }</pre>
5327          *   </li>
5328          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5329          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5330          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5331          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5332          *   }</pre>
5333          *   </li>
5334          * </ul>
5335          *  
5336          * @since 1.3.1
5337          * 
5338          * @see
5339          * <a href="hcap.power.html#.powerOff">power.powerOff()</a>
5340          *
5341          * @example
5342          * hcap.power.reboot({
5343          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5344          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5345          *      }, 
5346          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5347          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5348          *      }
5349          * });
5350          */
5351         hcap.power.reboot = function (param) {
5352             hcap_command("reboot", param);
5353         };
5354         /**
5355          * @namespace hcap.time
5356          */
5357         hcap.time = {};
5358         /**
5359          * Sets the TV time.<br>
5360          * Input time is the local time which is the time after applying GMT offset for time zone and daylight saving time.<br>
5361          * GMT offset for time zone and daylight saving time are required to set the TV localtime.<br>
5362          * Current GMT offset and daylight saving time can be got from <a href="hcap.time.html#.getLocalTime">hcap.time.getLocalTime()</a>.
5363          * GMT offset must be standard GMT offset of the city.<br>
5364          * Some of the standard GMT offset values and illegal GMT offset like -110 could not be set to TV.<br>
5365          * In this error case, failure callback function will be invoked.
5366          *
5367          * @param {Object} param
5368          * <ul>
5369          *   <li>{Number} param.year [REQUIRED] - year (2000 ~ 2029).</li>
5370          *   <li>{Number} param.month [REQUIRED] - month (1 ~ 12).</li>
5371          *   <li>{Number} param.day [REQUIRED] - day (1 ~ 31).</li>
5372          *   <li>{Number} param.hour [REQUIRED] - hour (0 ~ 23).</li>
5373          *   <li>{Number} param.minute [REQUIRED] - minute (0 ~ 59).</li>
5374          *   <li>{Number} param.second [REQUIRED] - second (0 ~ 59).</li>
5375          *   <li>{Number} param.gmtOffsetInMinute [REQUIRED] - GMT offset in minute for time zone (-660 ~ 720).</li>
5376          *   <li>{Boolean} param.isDaylightSaving [REQUIRED] - false : not applying daylight saving time to local time, true : applying daylight saving time to local time.</li>
5377          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.<br>
5378          *           Setting to the same year/month/day/hour/minute/second/gmt_offset_in_minute/daylight_saving as before will invoke this callback function.
5379          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5380          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5381          *       // No Parameter.
5382          *   }</pre>
5383          *   </li>
5384          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5385          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5386          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5387          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5388          *   }</pre>
5389          *   </li>
5390          * </ul>
5391          * 
5392          * @since 1.3.1
5393          * 
5394          * @see
5395          * <a href="hcap.time.html#.getLocalTime">hcap.time.getLocalTime()</a><br>
5396          *
5397          * @example
5398          * hcap.time.setLocalTime({
5399          *      "year" : 2010, 
5400          *      "month" : 8,
