10987          *                                          console.log("onSuccess");
10988          *                                      }, 
10989          *                                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
10990          *                                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
10991          *                                      }
10992          *                                  });
10993          *                              }, 
10994          *                              "onFailure" : function(f) {
10995          *                                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
10996          *                              }
10997          *                          });
10998          *                      },
10999          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11000          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11001          *                      }
11002          *                  });
11003          *              }, 
11004          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11005          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11006          *              }
11007          *          });
11008          *      },
11009          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11010          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11011          *      }
11012          * });
11013          */
11014         hcap.Media.prototype.destroy = function (param) {
11015             if (media_object === null) {
11016                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11017                 return;
11018             }
11019             hcap_command("media_destroy", param);
11020             media_object = null;
11021         };
11022         /**
11023          * Gets information of media. For example, the title of the currently loaded media.
11024          *
11025          * @param {Object} param 
11026          * <ul>
11027          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11028          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11029          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11030          *       // {Boolean} param.videoAvailable - whether the video is available.
11031          *       // {String} param.title - a human readable title of the current media. 
11032          *       //     If the title is undetermined, this method returns null.
11033          *       // {Number} param.contentLengthInMs - length (in milliseconds) of the media.  
11034          *       //     If the length is infinite/indeterminable, then this method returns null.
11035          *   }</pre>
11036          *   </li>
11037          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11038          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11039          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11040          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11041          *   }</pre>
11042          *   </li>
11043          * </ul>
11044          *
11045          * @since 1.3.1
11046          *
11047          * 
11048          * @example
11049          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11050          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11051          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11052          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11053          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11054          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11055          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11056          *          });
11057          *          media.play({
11058          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11059          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11060          *                  media.getInformation({
11061          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11062          *                          console.log("onSuccess" +
11063          *                              "\nvideoAvailable = " + s.videoAvailable +
11064          *                              "\ntitle = " + s.title +
11065          *                              "\ncontentLengthInMs = " + s.contentLengthInMs);
11066          *                      },
11067          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11068          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11069          *                      }
11070          *                  });
11071          *              }, 
11072          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11073          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11074          *              }
11075          *          });
11076          *      },
11077          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11078          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11079          *      }
11080          * });
11081          */
11082         hcap.Media.prototype.getInformation = function (param) {
11083             if (media_object === null) {
11084                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11085                 return;
11086             }
11087             hcap_command("media_get_information", param);
11088         };
11089         /**
11090          * Gets the position (in milliseconds) in the media that the player is currently at. 
11091          * If th length of the media is infinite/indeterminable, this function returns the number of milliseconds the player has been playing the media. The default position, before the video has been played, is 0 (unless override by the position setting).
11092          *
11093          * @param {Object} param 
11094          * <ul>
11095          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11096          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11097          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11098          *       // {Number} param.positionInMs - number of milliseconds the player is into the media
11099          *   }</pre>
11100          *   </li>
11101          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11102          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11103          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11104          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11105          *   }</pre>
11106          *   </li>
11107          * </ul>
11108          *
11109          * @since 1.3.1
11110          *
11111          * @see
11112          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setPlayPosition">hcap.Media.setPlayPosition()</a><br>
11113          * 
11114          * @example
11115          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11116          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11117          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11118          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11119          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11120          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11121          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11122          *          });
11123          *          media.play({
11124          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11125          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11126          *                  media.getPlayPosition({
11127          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11128          *                          console.log("onSuccess position : " + s.positionInMs);
11129          *                      },
11130          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11131          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11132          *                      }
11133          *                  });
11134          *              }, 
11135          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11136          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11137          *              }
11138          *          });
11139          *      },
11140          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11141          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11142          *      }
11143          * });
11144          */
11145         hcap.Media.prototype.getPlayPosition = function (param) {
11146             if (media_object === null) {
11147                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11148                 return;
11149             }
11150             hcap_command("media_get_play_position", param);
11151         };
11152         /**
11153          * Sets the position of the player at which to continue playing the media at.
11154          * The 'seek_done' event will notify the result of this call. 
11155          * If you want to use this method continuously, you should check to receive the "seek_done" event before the next invocation.
11156          *
11157          * @param {Object} param 
11158          * <ul>
11159          *   <li>{Number} param.positionInMs [Required] - number of milliseconds from the start of the media the player should play from </li>
11160          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11161          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11162          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11163          *       // No parameter.
11164          *   }</pre>
11165          *   </li>
11166          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11167          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11168          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11169          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11170          *   }</pre>
11171          *   </li>
11172          * </ul>
11173          *
11174          * @since 1.3.1
11175          *
11176          * @see
11177          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getPlayPosition">hcap.Media.getPlayPosition()</a><br>
11178          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>    
11179          * 
11180          * @example
11181          * 
11182          * var media = null;
11183          * document.addEventListener(
11184          *      "media_event_received",
11185          *      function (param) {
11186          *          // {String} param.eventType - changed event type
11187          *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
11188          *          if (param.eventType === 'seek_done') {
11189          *              console.log("success about media.setPlayPosition ");
11190          *          } else if (param.eventType === 'play_start') {
11191          *              media.setPlayPosition({
11192          *                 "positionInMs" : 1000,
11193          *                 "onSuccess" : function() {
11194          *                     console.log("onSuccess");
11195          *                  },
11196          *                  "onFailure" : function(f) {
11197          *                     console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11198          *                  }
11199          *              });    
11200          *          }
11201          *      }, false
11202          * );
11203          *      
11204          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11205          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11206          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11207          *          media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11208          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11209          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11210          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11211          *          });
11212          *          media.play({
11213          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11214          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11215          *              }, 
11216          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11217          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11218          *              }
11219          *          });
11220          *      },
11221          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11222          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11223          *      }
11224          * });
11225          * 
11226          * 
11227          * 
11228          */
11229         hcap.Media.prototype.setPlayPosition = function (param) {
11230             if (media_object === null) {
11231                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11232                 return;
11233             }
11234             hcap_command("media_set_play_position", param);
11235         };
11236         /**
11237          * [RTSP Only] Gets the speed (rate) of the current media.  
11238          * The speed (rate) at which the media is currently playing. If the media has not yet started playing or is stopped, this method returns 0.
11239          *
11240          * @param {Object} param 
11241          * <ul>
11242          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11243          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11244          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11245          *       // {Number} param.speed - rate at which the media runs currently.
11246          *   }</pre>
11247          *   </li>
11248          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11249          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11250          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11251          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11252          *   }</pre>
11253          *   </li>
11254          * </ul>
11255          *
11256          * @since 1.3.1
11257          *
11258          * @see
11259          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setPlaySpeed">hcap.Media.setPlaySpeed()</a><br>
11260          * 
11261          * @example
11262          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11263          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11264          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11265          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11266          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11267          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11268          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11269          *          });
11270          *          media.play({
11271          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11272          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11273          *                  media.getPlaySpeed({
11274          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11275          *                          console.log("onSuccess speed : " + s.speed);
11276          *                          switch(s.speed) {
11277          *                            case 0 : 
11278          *                               console.log("Playback has stopped");
11279          *                               break;
11280          *                            case 1 : 
11281          *                               console.log("Media is playing");
11282          *                               break;
11283          *                            case 0.5 : 
11284          *                               console.log("Media is playing at half speed");
11285          *                               break;
11286          *                            case 2 : 
11287          *                               console.log("Media is fast-forwarding at 2x");
11288          *                               break;
11289          *                            case -2 : 
11290          *                               console.log("Media is rewinding at 2x");
11291          *                               break;
11292          *                          }
11293          *                      },
11294          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11295          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11296          *                      }
11297          *                  });
11298          *              }, 
11299          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11300          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11301          *              }
11302          *          });
11303          *      },
11304          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11305          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11306          *      }
11307          * });
11308          */
11309         hcap.Media.prototype.getPlaySpeed = function (param) {
11310             if (media_object === null) {
11311                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11312                 return;
11313             }
11314             hcap_command("media_get_play_speed", param);
11315         };
11316         /**
11317          * [RTSP Only] Sets the speed (rate) of the current media.
11318          * If the media has not been started yet, calling this function (with any rate other then 0) will start the media at the specified rate.
11319          * When the current media passed through http protocol, this API supports only fast forward. 
11320          * In mms and rtsp streaming, the speed parameter is transparently transmitted to the server without any conversion. 
11321          * Therefore, developers are responsible for matching the speed parameter between the application and the server.
11322          *
11323          * @param {Object} param 
11324          * <ul>
11325          *   <li>{Number} param.speed [Required] - rate at which the media should run</li>
11326          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11327          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11328          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11329          *       // No parameter.
11330          *   }</pre>
11331          *   </li>
11332          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11333          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11334          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11335          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11336          *   }</pre>
11337          *   </li>
11338          * </ul>
11339          *
11340          * @since 1.3.1
11341          *
11342          * @see
11343          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getPlaySpeed">hcap.Media.getPlaySpeed()</a><br>
11344          * 
11345          * @example
11346          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11347          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11348          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11349          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11350          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11351          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11352          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11353          *          });
11354          *          media.play({
11355          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11356          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11357          *                  media.setPlaySpeed({
11358          *                      "speed" : 2,
11359          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11360          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11361          *                      },
11362          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11363          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11364          *                      }
11365          *                  });
11366          *              }, 
11367          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11368          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11369          *              }
11370          *          });
11371          *      },
11372          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11373          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11374          *      }
11375          * });
11376          */
11377         hcap.Media.prototype.setPlaySpeed = function (param) {
11378             if (media_object === null) {
11379                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11380                 return;
11381             }
11382             hcap_command("media_set_play_speed", param);
11383         };
11384         /**
11385          * Sets the subtitle of the current media on or off.  
11386          * If the subtitle url is not ready, there is no effect on screen. It will work after setting subtitle url using createMedia or setSubtitleUrl.
11387          * 
11388          *
11389          * @param {Object} param 
11390          * <ul>
11391          *   <li>{Boolean} param.subtitleOn [Required] - true if the media subtitle is on. false if it is off.</li>
11392          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11393          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11394          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11395          *       // No parameter.
11396          *   }</pre>
11397          *   </li>
11398          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11399          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11400          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11401          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11402          *   }</pre>
11403          *   </li>
11404          * </ul>
11405          *
11406          * @since 1.7
11407          *
11408          * @see
11409          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.getSubtitleOn()</a><br>
11410          * 
11411          * @example
11412          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11413          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11414          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11415          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11416          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11417          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11418          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11419          *          });
11420          *          media.play({
11421          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11422          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11423          *                  media.setSubtitleOn({
11424          *                      "subtitleOn" : true,
11425          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11426          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11427          *                      },
11428          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11429          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11430          *                      }
11431          *                  });
11432          *              }, 
11433          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11434          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11435          *              }
11436          *          });
11437          *      },
11438          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11439          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11440          *      }
11441          * });
11442          */
11443         hcap.Media.prototype.setSubtitleOn = function (param) {
11444             if (media_object === null) {
11445                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11446                 return;
11447             }
11448             hcap_command("media_set_subtitle_on", param);
11449         };
11450         /**
11451          * Gets the subtitle status of the current media.  
11452          * 
11453          * @param {Object} param 
11454          * <ul>
11455          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11456          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11457          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11458          *       // {Boolean} param.subtitleOn - true if the media subtitle is on. false if it is off.
11459          *   }</pre>
11460          *   </li>
11461          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11462          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11463          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11464          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11465          *   }</pre>
11466          *   </li>
11467          * </ul>
11468          *
11469          * @since 1.7
11470          *
11471          * @see
11472          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.setSubtitleOn()</a><br>
11473          * 
11474          * @example
11475          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11476          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11477          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11478          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11479          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11480          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11481          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11482          *          });
11483          *          media.play({
11484          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11485          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11486          *                  media.getSubtitleOn({
11487          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11488          *                          console.log("onSuccess : subtitleOn = " + s.subtitleOn);
11489          *                      },
11490          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11491          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11492          *                      }
11493          *                  });
11494          *              }, 
11495          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11496          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11497          *              }
11498          *          });
11499          *      },
11500          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11501          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11502          *      }
11503          * });
11504          */
11505         hcap.Media.prototype.getSubtitleOn = function (param) {
11506             if (media_object === null) {
11507                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11508                 return;
11509             }
11510             hcap_command("media_get_subtitle_on", param);
11511         };
11512         /**
11513          * Sets the subtitle url of the current media. It will replace the subtitle url which is registered by createMedia().  
11514          * 
11515          * @param {Object} param 
11516          * <ul>
11517          *   <li>{String} param.subtitleUrl [Required] - subtitle url.</li>
11518          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11519          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11520          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11521          *   }</pre>
11522          *   </li>
11523          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11524          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11525          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11526          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11527          *   }</pre>
11528          *   </li>
11529          * </ul>
11530          *
11531          * @since 1.7
11532          *
11533          * @see
11534          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.setSubtitleOn()</a><br>
11535          * 
11536          * @example
11537          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11538          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11539          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11540          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11541          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11542          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11543          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11544          *          });
11545          *          media.play({
11546          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11547          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11548          *                  media.setSubtitleUrl({
11549          *                      "subtitleUrl" : "http://lge.com/subtitle.srt",
11550          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11551          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11552          *                      },
11553          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11554          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11555          *                      }
11556          *                  });
11557          *              }, 
11558          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11559          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11560          *              }
11561          *          });
11562          *      },
11563          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11564          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11565          *      }
11566          * });
11567          */
11568         hcap.Media.prototype.setSubtitleUrl = function (param) {
11569             if (media_object === null) {
11570                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11571                 return;
11572             }
11573             hcap_command("media_set_subtitle_url", param);
11574         };
11575         /**
11576          * Gets player status. Status can be 'play', 'pause' or 'stop'.
11577          *
11578          * @param {Object} param 
11579          * <ul>
11580          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11581          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11582          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11583          *       // {String} param.state - a human readable status of the current media. 
11584          *       //     It can be 'play', 'pause' or 'stop'.
11585          *   }</pre>
11586          *   </li>
11587          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11588          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11589          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11590          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11591          *   }</pre>
11592          *   </li>
11593          * </ul>
11594          *
11595          * @since 1.3.1
11596          *
11597          * @example
11598          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11599          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11600          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11601          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11602          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11603          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11604          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11605          *          });
11606          *          media.play({
11607          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11608          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11609          *                  media.getState({
11610          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11611          *                          console.log("onSuccess state : " + s.state);
11612          *                      },
11613          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11614          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11615          *                      }
11616          *                  });
11617          *              }, 
11618          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11619          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11620          *              }
11621          *          });
11622          *      },
11623          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11624          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11625          *      }
11626          * });
11627          */
11628         hcap.Media.prototype.getState = function (param) {
11629             if (media_object === null) {
11630                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11631                 return;
11632             }
11633             hcap_command("media_get_state", param);
11634         };
11635         /**
11636          * Gets the list of supported audio languages and the index of list in the current media.<br>
11637          * Audio language list is composed of language codes and delimiter comma(',').<br>
11638          * Application can get/set audio language of the current media by index of the audio language list.<br><br>
11639          * If there is no audio language list of the current channel, only "xx" is returned as the audio language list.<br>
11640          * And "xx" could be returned as an audio language if the audio language is not mapped to an audio language code.<br>
11641          * 
11642          * <div align=center>
11643          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
11644          *   <thead>
11645          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
11646          *   </thead>
11647          *   <tbody>
11648          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
11649          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
11650          *   </tbody>
11651          *   <tfoot>
11652          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
11653          *   </tfoot>
11654          * </table>
11655          * </div>
11656          * If the application wants to set the audio language to French ('fr'), use the index '2'.<br>
11657          * 
11658          * @param {Object} param
11659          * <ul>
11660          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11661          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11662          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11663          *       // {String} param.list - audio language list string 
11664          *       //     which is composed of language codes separated by delimiter comma(',').
11665          *       // {Number} param.index - audio language index of the current media.
11666          *   }</pre>
11667          *   </li>
11668          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11669          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11670          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11671          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11672          *   }</pre>
11673          *   </li>
11674          * </ul>
11675          * 
11676          * @since 1.12
11677          * 
11678          * @see
11679          * <a href="hcap.Media.html#setAudioLanguage">hcap.Media.setAudioLanguage()</a><br>
11680          *
11681          * @example
11682          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11683          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11684          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11685          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11686          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11687          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11688          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11689          *          });
11690          *          media.play({
11691          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11692          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11693          *                  media.getAudioLanguage({
11694          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11695          *                          console.log("onSuccess audio language list : " + s.list + " index : " + s.index);
11696          *                      },
11697          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11698          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11699          *                      }
11700          *                  });
11701          *              }, 
11702          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11703          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11704          *              }
11705          *          });
11706          *      },
11707          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11708          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11709          *      }
11710          * });
11711          */
11712         hcap.Media.prototype.getAudioLanguage = function (param) {
11713             hcap_command("media_get_audio_language", param);
11714         };
11715         /**
11716          * Sets the audio language of the current media.<br>
11717          * 
11718          * <div align=center>
11719          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
11720          *   <thead>
11721          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
11722          *   </thead>
11723          *   <tbody>
11724          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
11725          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
11726          *   </tbody>
11727          *   <tfoot>
11728          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
11729          *   </tfoot>
11730          * </table>
11731          * </div>
11732          * 
11733          * @param {Object} param
11734          * <ul>
11735          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - audio language index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
11736          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11737          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11738          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11739          *       // No Parameter.
11740          *   }</pre>
11741          *   </li>
11742          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
11743          *            Setting to the same audio language index as before will invoke this callback function.
11744          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11745          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11746          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11747          *   }</pre>
11748          *   </li>
11749          * </ul>
11750          * 
11751          * @since 1.12
11752          * 
11753          * @see
11754          * <a href="hcap.Media.html#getAudioLanguage">hcap.Media.getAudioLanguage()</a><br>
11755          *
11756          * @example
11757          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11758          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11759          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11760          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11761          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11762          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11763          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11764          *          });
11765          *          media.play({
11766          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11767          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11768          *                  media.setAudioLanguage({
11769          *                      "index" : 1, 
11770          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11771          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11772          *                      },
11773          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11774          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11775          *                      }
11776          *                  });
11777          *              }, 
11778          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11779          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11780          *              }
11781          *          });
11782          *      },
11783          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11784          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11785          *      }
11786          * });
11787          */
11788         hcap.Media.prototype.setAudioLanguage = function (param) {
11789             hcap_command("media_set_audio_language", param);
11790         };
11791         /**
11792          * Gets the subtitle type and track number and ISO639-1 launguage code if available.
11793          * 
11794          * @param {Object} param 
11795          * <ul>
11796          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11797          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11798          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11799          *       // {Number} param.type - Current played subtitle type.
11800          *       // {Number} param.index - Current played subtitle track number, On the case of external subtitle, don't care this value.
11801          *       // {String} param.list - Language code of 'xx' if no available.
11802          *   }</pre>
11803          *   </li>
11804          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11805          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11806          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11807          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11808          *   }</pre>
11809          *   </li>
11810          * </ul>
11811          *
11812          * @since 1.22.0
11813          *
11814          * @see
11815          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitle">hcap.Media.setSubtitle()</a><br>
11816          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.NONE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.NONE</a><br>
11817          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
11818          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
11819          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.CLOSED_CAPTION">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.CLOSED_CAPTION</a>
11820          *  
11821          * @example
11822          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11823          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11824          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11825          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11826          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11827          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11828          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11829          *          });
11830          *          media.play({
11831          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11832          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11833          *                  media.getSubtitle({
11834          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11835          *                          console.log("onSuccess : subtitle type = " + s.type + "index = " + s.index + "language = " + s.list);
11836          *                      },
11837          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11838          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11839          *                      }
11840          *                  });
11841          *              }, 
11842          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11843          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11844          *              }
11845          *          });
11846          *      },
11847          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11848          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11849          *      }
11850          * });
11851          */
11852         hcap.Media.prototype.getSubtitle = function (param) {
11853             if (media_object === null) {
11854                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11855                 return;
11856             }
11857             hcap_command("media_get_subtitle", param);
11858         };
11859         /**
11860          * Sets the subtitle type and track number  
11861          * 
11862          *
11863          * @param {Object} param 
11864          * <ul>
11865          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - Support 3 type of subtitle following as none, internal subtitle, external subtitle, closed caption.</li>
11866          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - Subtitle index to be set. Index starts with 0. onthe case of external subtitle, don't care this value.</li>
11867          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11868          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11869          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11870          *       // No parameter.
11871          *   }</pre>
11872          *   </li>
11873          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11874          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11875          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11876          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11877          *   }</pre>
11878          *   </li>
11879          * </ul>
11880          *
11881          * @since 1.22.0
11882          *
11883          * @see
11884          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getSubtitle">hcap.Media.getSubtitle()</a><br>
11885          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.NONE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.NONE</a><br>
11886          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
11887          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
11888          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.CLOSED_CAPTION">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.CLOSED_CAPTION</a>
11889          *  
11890          * @example
11891          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11892          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11893          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11894          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11895          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11896          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11897          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11898          *          });
11899          *          media.play({
11900          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11901          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11902          *                  media.setSubtitle({
11903          *                      "type" :  hcap.Media.SubtitleType.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE,
11904          *                      "index" : 0,
11905          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11906          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11907          *                      },
11908          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11909          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11910          *                      }
11911          *                  });
11912          *              }, 
11913          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11914          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11915          *              }
11916          *          });
11917          *      },
11918          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11919          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11920          *      }
11921          * });
11922          */
11923         hcap.Media.prototype.setSubtitle = function (param) {
11924             if (media_object === null) {
11925                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11926                 return;
11927             }
11928             hcap_command("media_set_subtitle", param);
11929         };
11930         /**
11931          * @namespace hcap.Media.SubtitleType
11932          */
11933         hcap.Media.SubtitleType = {
11934             /**
11935              * None
11936              * @since 1.22.0
11937              * @constant
11938              */
11939         	NONE : 0,
11940             /**
11941              * Internal Subtitle
11942              * @since 1.22.0
11943              * @constant
11944              */
11945             INTERNAL_SUBTITLE : 1,
11946             /**
11947              * External Subtitle
11948              * @since 1.22.0
11949              * @constant
11950              */
11951             EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE : 2,
11952             /**
11953              * Closed Caption
11954              * @since 1.22.0
11955              * @constant
11956              */
11957             CLOSED_CAPTION : 3
11958         };
11959         /**
11960          * @namespace hcap.rms
11961          */
11962         hcap.rms = {};
11963         /**
11964          * Request RMS (Remote Management System) command in XML format to RMS.<br>
11965          * RMS XML protocol will be provided separately.<br>
11966          * Response for this request will be received by the result of this API or by registering the <a href="_global_.html#event:rms_response_received">{Event} rms_response_received</a>. How to receive the response is different command by command. 
11967          * 
11968          * @param {Object} param
11969          * <ul>
11970          *   <li>{String} param.message [Required] - RMS request message in XML.</li>
11971          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11972          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11973          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11974          *       // {String} param.response - response result for the request.
11975          *   }</pre>
11976          *   </li>
11977          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional]  - failure callback function.
11978          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11979          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11980          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11981          *   }</pre>
11982          *   </li>
11983          * </ul>
11984          *  
11985          * @since 1.6.0
11986          * 
11987          * @see
11988          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rms_response_received">{Event} rms_response_received</a><br>
11989          *
11990          * @example
11991          * hcap.rms.requestRms({
11992          *      "message" : "xxxxxxx",
11993          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11994          *          console.log("onSuccess : response message = " + s.response);
11995          *      }, 
11996          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11997          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11998          *      }
11999          * });
12000          */
12001         hcap.rms.requestRms = function (param) {
12002             hcap_command("request_rms", param);
12003         };
12004         /** 
12005          * @namespace hcap.socket
12006          */
12007         hcap.socket = { };
12008         /**
12009          * Open UDP socket daemon.<br>
12010          * To try opening UDP socket daemon with a port that has already been opened will be failed. In this case, please close the previous daemon and try it again.<br>
12011          * And if the application is unloaded, all opened UDP socket daemons will be destroyed.<br>
12012          * 
12013          * @param {Object} param
12014          * <ul>
12015          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - socket port number to open its UDP socket daemon.</li>
12016          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12017          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12018          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12019          *       // No Parameter.
12020          *   }</pre>
12021          *   </li>
12022          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12023          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12024          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12025          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12026          *   }</pre>
12027          *   </li>
12028          * </ul>
12029          *  
12030          * @since 1.6.0
12031          * 
12032          * @see
12033          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.closeUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.closeUdpDaemon()</a><br>
12034          * <a href="_global_.html#event:udp_data_received">{Event} udp_data_received</a><br>
12035          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.sendUdpData">hcap.socket.sendUdpData()</a><br>
12036          *
12037          * @example
12038          * hcap.socket.openUdpDaemon({
12039          *      "port" : 9311,
12040          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12041          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12042          *      }, 
12043          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12044          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12045          *      }
12046          * });
12047          */
12048         hcap.socket.openUdpDaemon = function (param) {
12049             hcap_command("open_udp_daemon", param);
12050         };
12051         /**
12052          * Close UDP socket daemon.<br>
12053          * 
12054          * @param {Object} param
12055          * <ul>
12056          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - port number of UDP connection to close.</li>
12057          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12058          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12059          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12060          *       // No Parameter.
12061          *   }</pre>
12062          *   </li>
12063          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12064          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12065          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12066          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12067          *   }</pre>
12068          *   </li>
12069          * </ul>
12070          *  
12071          * @since 1.6.0
12072          * 
12073          * @see
12074          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.openUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.openUdpDaemon()</a><br>
12075          * <a href="_global_.html#event:udp_data_received">{Event} udp_data_received</a><br>
12076          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.sendUdpData">hcap.socket.sendUdpData()</a><br>
12077          *
12078          * @example
12079          * hcap.socket.closeUdpDaemon({
12080          *      "port" : 9311,
12081          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12082          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12083          *      }, 
12084          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12085          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12086          *      }
12087          * });
12088          */
12089         hcap.socket.closeUdpDaemon = function (param) {
12090             hcap_command("close_udp_daemon", param);
12091         };
12092         /**
12093          * Open TCP socket daemon.<br>
12094          * To try opening TCP socket daemon with a port that has already been opened will be failed. In this case, please close the previous daemon and try it again.<br>
12095          * And if the application is unloaded, all opened TCP socket daemons will be destroyed.<br>
12096          * 
12097          * @param {Object} param
12098          * <ul>
12099          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - socket port number to open its TCP socket daemon.</li>
12100          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12101          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12102          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12103          *       // No Parameter.
12104          *   }</pre>
12105          *   </li>
12106          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12107          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12108          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12109          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12110          *   }</pre>
12111          *   </li>
12112          * </ul>
12113          *  
12114          * @since 1.10.1
12115          * 
12116          * @see
12117          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.closeTcpDaemon">hcap.socket.closeTcpDaemon()</a><br>
12118          * <a href="_global_.html#event:tcp_data_received">{Event} tcp_data_received</a><br>
12119          *
12120          * @example
12121          * hcap.socket.openTcpDaemon({
12122          *      "port" : 9312,
12123          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12124          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12125          *      }, 
12126          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12127          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12128          *      }
12129          * });
12130          */
12131         hcap.socket.openTcpDaemon = function (param) {
12132             hcap_command("open_tcp_daemon", param);
12133         };
12134         /**
12135          * Close TCP socket daemon.<br>
12136          * 
12137          * @param {Object} param
12138          * <ul>
12139          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - port number of TCP connection to close.</li>
12140          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12141          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12142          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12143          *       // No Parameter.
12144          *   }</pre>
12145          *   </li>
12146          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12147          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12148          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12149          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12150          *   }</pre>
12151          *   </li>
12152          * </ul>
12153          *  
12154          * @since 1.10.1
12155          * 
12156          * @see
12157          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.openTcpDaemon">hcap.socket.openTcpDaemon()</a><br>
12158          * <a href="_global_.html#event:tcp_data_received">{Event} tcp_data_received</a><br>
12159          *
12160          * @example
12161          * hcap.socket.closeTcpDaemon({
12162          *      "port" : 9312,
12163          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12164          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12165          *      }, 
12166          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12167          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12168          *      }
12169          * });
12170          */
12171         hcap.socket.closeTcpDaemon = function (param) {
12172             hcap_command("close_tcp_daemon", param);
12173         };
12174         /**
12175          * Send UDP packet data to remote UDP server.<br>
12176          * 
12177          * @param {Object} param
12178          * <ul>
12179          *   <li>{String} param.ip [Required] - IP address of remote UDP server to send UDP packet data.</li>
12180          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - port number of remote UDP server.</li>
12181          *   <li>{String} param.udpData [Required] - UDP packet data.</li>
12182          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12183          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12184          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12185          *       // No Parameter.
12186          *   }</pre>
12187          *   </li>
12188          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12189          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12190          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12191          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12192          *   }</pre>
12193          *   </li>
12194          * </ul>
12195          *  
12196          * @since 1.10.1
12197          * 
12198          * @see
12199          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.openUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.openUdpDaemon()</a><br>
12200          * <a href="hcap.socket.html#.closeUdpDaemon">hcap.socket.closeUdpDaemon()</a><br>
12201          * <a href="_global_.html#event:udp_data_received">{Event} udp_data_received</a><br>
12202          *
12203          * @example
12204          * hcap.socket.sendUdpData({
12205          *      "ip" : "192.168.123.56",
12206          *      "port" : 7222,
12207          *      "udpData" : "UDP packet data to send",
12208          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12209          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12210          *      }, 
12211          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12212          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12213          *      }
12214          * });
12215          */
12216         hcap.socket.sendUdpData = function (param) {
12217             hcap_command("send_udp_data", param);
12218         };
12219         hcap.drm = {};
12220         /*
12221          * @namespace hcap.drm.securemedia
12222          */
12223         hcap.drm.securemedia = {};
12224         /**
12225          * initialize secure media agent.<br>
12226          * 
12227          * @param {Object} param
12228          * <ul>
12229          *   <li>{String} param.companyName [Required] - This is used to separate service providers using SecureMedia.</li>
12230          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12231          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12232          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12233          *       // No Parameter.
12234          *   }</pre>
12235          *   </li>
12236          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12237          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12238          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12239          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12240          *   }</pre>
12241          *   </li>
12242          * </ul>
12243          *  
12244          * @since 1.7.0
12245          * 
12246          * @see
12247          * @example
12248          * hcap.drm.securemedia.initialize({
12249          *      "companyName" : "LGE",
12250          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12251          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12252          *      }, 
12253          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12254          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12255          *      }
12256          * });
12257          * 
12258          * If you want to use secure media DRM, you should add information to url on hcap.Media.createMedia method.
12259          * That url has device id, password, user data for right manager and register url. And each parameter should have be seperated with "|" character. 
12260          * For example of url is "http://71.170.161.24/sm/Airplane-Encrypted/hls_CE_DEVICES.m3u8?|DRM_INFO={DEVICE_ID=E8:5B:5B:B8:7F:CF|AINFO1=<user><id>vzec81yq</id><domain>DNET</domain></user>|AINFO2=KLCISIPCTEMJAE3LuKoRLzjLkg//8yQxsSSRFj4wWRjQ6Rs5x3SAH8fc|REGISTER_URL=https://gwott30.verizon.net/esam/esamservice}|COMPONENT=HLS"
12261          * 
12262          * var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12263          *      "url" : "http://71.170.161.24/sm/Airplane-Encrypted/hls_CE_DEVICES.m3u8?|DRM_INFO={DEVICE_ID=E8:5B:5B:B8:7F:CF|AINFO1=<user><id>vzec81yq</id><domain>DNET</domain></user>|AINFO2=KLCISIPCTEMJAE3LuKoRLzjLkg//8yQxsSSRFj4wWRjQ6Rs5x3SAH8fc|REGISTER_URL=https://gwott30.verizon.net/esam/esamservice}|COMPONENT=HLS", 
12264          *      "mimeType" : "video/mpeg", 
12265          *      "drmType" : "SECUREMEDIA",
12266          *      "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi",
12267          * });
12268          */
12269         hcap.drm.securemedia.initialize = function (param) {
12270             hcap_command("secure_media_drm_initialize", param);
12271         };
12272         /**
12273          * unregister secure media agent.<br>
12274          * 
12275          * @param {Object} param
12276          * <ul>
12277          *   <li>{String} param.companyName [Required] - This is used to separate service providers using SecureMedia.</li>
12278          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12279          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12280          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12281          *       // No Parameter.
12282          *   }</pre>
12283          *   </li>
12284          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12285          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12286          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12287          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12288          *   }</pre>
12289          *   </li>
12290          * </ul>
12291          *  
12292          * @since 1.7.0
12293          * 
12294          * @see
12295          * @example
12296          * hcap.drm.securemedia.unregister({
12297          *      "companyName" : "LGE",
12298          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12299          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12300          *      }, 
12301          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12302          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12303          *      }
12304          * });
12305          */
12306         hcap.drm.securemedia.unregister = function (param) {
12307             hcap_command("secure_media_drm_unregister", param);
12308         };
12309         /**
12310          * check whether secure media agent register.<br>
12311          * 
12312          * @param {Object} param
12313          * <ul>
12314          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12315          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12316          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12317          *       // {Boolean} param.isRegisteration - true if the secure media agent is registered successfully, else false.
12318          *   }</pre>
12319          *   </li>
12320          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12321          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12322          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12323          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12324          *   }</pre>
12325          *   </li>
12326          * </ul>
12327          *  
12328          * @since 1.7.0
12329          * 
12330          * @see
12331          * @example
12332          * hcap.drm.securemedia.isRegistration({
12333          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12334          *          console.log("onSuccess" + s.isRegisteration);
12335          *      }, 
12336          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12337          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12338          *      }
12339          * });
12340          */
12341         hcap.drm.securemedia.isRegistration = function (param) {
12342             hcap_command("secure_media_drm_is_registration", param);
12343         };
12344         /**
12345          * register secure media agent.<br>
12346          * 
12347          * @param {Object} param
12348          * <ul>
12349          *   <li>{String} param.deviceInfo [Required] - device info, It becomes ID for SecureMedia (ex> E8:5B:5B:B8:7F:CF).</li>
12350          *   <li>{String} param.appInfo [Required] - It becomes password.</li>
12351          *   <li>{String} param.esamUrl [Required] - It is the url of ESAM server.</li>
12352          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12353          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12354          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12355          *       // No Parameter.
12356          *   }</pre>
12357          *   </li>
12358          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12359          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12360          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12361          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12362          *   }</pre>
12363          *   </li>
12364          * </ul>
12365          *  
12366          * @since 1.7.0
12367          * 
12368          * @see
12369          * @example
12370          * hcap.drm.securemedia.register({
12371          *      "deviceInfo" : "E8:5B:5B:B8:7F:CF",
12372          *      "appInfo" : "<user><id>vzec81yq</id><domain>DNET</domain></user>",
12373          *      "esamUrl" : "http://71.170.161.24/sm/Airplane-Encrypted/hls_CE_DEVICES.m3u8?|DRM_INFO={DEVICE_ID=E8:5B:5B:B8:7F:CF|AINFO1=<user><id>vzec81yq</id><domain>DNET</domain></user>|AINFO2=KLCISIPCTEMJAE3LuKoRLzjLkg//8yQxsSSRFj4wWRjQ6Rs5x3SAH8fc|REGISTER_URL=https://gwott30.verizon.net/esam/esamservice}|COMPONENT=HLS",
12374          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12375          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12376          *      }, 
12377          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12378          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12379          *      }
12380          * });
12381          */
12382         hcap.drm.securemedia.register = function (param) {
12383             hcap_command("secure_media_drm_register", param);
12384         };
12385         /**
12386          * finalize secure media agent.<br>
12387          * 
12388          * @param {Object} param
12389          * <ul>
12390          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12391          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12392          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12393          *       // No Parameter.
12394          *   }</pre>
12395          *   </li>
12396          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12397          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12398          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12399          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12400          *   }</pre>
12401          *   </li>
12402          * </ul>
12403          *  
12404          * @since 1.7.0
12405          * 
12406          * @see
12407          * @example
12408          * hcap.drm.securemedia.finalize({
12409          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12410          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12411          *      }, 
12412          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12413          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12414          *      }
12415          * });
12416          */
12417         hcap.drm.securemedia.finalize = function (param) {
12418             hcap_command("secure_media_drm_finalize", param);
12419         };
12420         /** 
12421          * @namespace hcap.file
12422          */
12423         hcap.file = { };
12424         /**
12425          * Gets the USB storage list.<br>
12426          * 
12427          * @param {Object} param
12428          * <ul>
12429          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12430          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12431          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12432          *       // {Array} param.list - list for the USB storage devices connected to TV.
12433          *       //         {String} param.list[].name - unique device name within the system
12434          *       //         {String} param.list[].displayName - display name
12435          *       //         {String} param.list[].mountPoint - mount point path
12436          *       //         {String} param.list[].status - status among "INIT"(device is initializing), "AVAILABLE"(device is available), "BUSY"(device is unavailable for a while because device is busy in the other work) and "OFFLINE"(device is physically connected but is unavailable)
12437          *       //         {String} param.list[].filesystemStatus - filesystem status among "READ_ONLY" and "READ_WRITE"
12438          *       //         {String} param.list[].totalSize - total size in bytes
12439          *       //         {String} param.list[].freeSize - free size in bytes
12440          *   }</pre>
12441          *   </li>
12442          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12443          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12444          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12445          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12446          *   }</pre>
12447          *   </li>
12448          * </ul>
12449          * 
12450          * @since 1.18.1
12451          * 
12452          * @see
12453          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageFileList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList()</a><br>
12454          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a><br>
12455          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.deleteUsbFile">hcap.file.deleteUsbFile()</a><br>
12456          * <a href="_global_.html#event:usb_file_downloaded">{Event} usb_file_downloaded</a><br>
12457          *
12458          * @example
12459          * hcap.file.getUsbStorageList({
12460          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12461          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
12462          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
12463          *              console.log(
12464          *                  "[" + i + "].name = " + s.list[i].name +
12465          *                  "[" + i + "].displayName = " + s.list[i].displayName +
12466          *                  "[" + i + "].mountPoint = " + s.list[i].mountPoint +
12467          *                  "[" + i + "].status = " + s.list[i].status +
12468          *                  "[" + i + "].filesystemStatus = " + s.list[i].filesystemStatus +
12469          *                  "[" + i + "].totalSize = " + s.list[i].totalSize +
12470          *                  "[" + i + "].freeSize = " + s.list[i].freeSize
12471          *              );
12472          *          }
12473          *      },
12474          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12475          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12476          *      }
12477          * });
12478          */
12479         hcap.file.getUsbStorageList = function (param) {
12480             hcap_command("get_usb_storage_list", param);
12481         };
12482         /**
12483          * Gets the file list for the given path in a USB storage.<br>
12484          * 
12485          * @param {Object} param
12486          * <ul>
12487          *   <li>{String} param.path [Required] - directory path to get file list. Only the directory equal to or lower than a USB mount point path is allowed.</li>
12488          *   <li>{Number} param.position [Optional] - start position (starts with 0) where starts to make file list in the directory. Default <em>position</em> is 0.</li>
12489          *   <li>{Number} param.length [Optional] - at most the <em>length</em> number of files from the <em>position</em> will be listed up. Default <em>length</em> is 100.</li>
12490          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12491          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12492          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12493          *       // {Array} param.list - file list
12494          *       //         {String} param.list[].name - file name
12495          *       //         {String} param.list[].type - file type among "BLK"(block device), "CHR"(character device), "DIR"(directory), "FIFO"(named pipe), "LNK"(symbolic link), "REG"(regular file), "SOCK"(UNIX domain socket) and "UNKNOWN"(unknown)
12496          *       //         {String} param.list[].length - file length
12497          *   }</pre>
12498          *   </li>
12499          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12500          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12501          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12502          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12503          *   }</pre>
12504          *   </li>
12505          * </ul>
12506          * 
12507          * @since 1.18.1
12508          * 
12509          * @see
12510          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageList()</a><br>
12511          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a><br>
12512          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.deleteUsbFile">hcap.file.deleteUsbFile()</a><br>
12513          * <a href="_global_.html#event:usb_file_downloaded">{Event} usb_file_downloaded</a><br>
12514          *
12515          * @example
12516          * hcap.file.getUsbStorageList({
12517          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12518          *          hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList({
12519          *              "path" : s[0].mountPoint,
12520          *              "onSuccess" : function (param) {
12521          *                  console.log("file list length = " + param.list.length);
12522          *                  for (var i = 0; i < param.list.length; i++) {
12523          *                      console.log(
12524          *                          "[" + i + "].name = " + param.list[i].name +
12525          *                          "[" + i + "].type = " + param.list[i].type +
12526          *                          "[" + i + "].length = " + param.list[i].length
12527          *                      );
12528          *                  }
12529          *              },
12530          *              "onFailure" : function(ff) {
12531          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + ff.errorMessage);
12532          *              }
12533          *          });
12534          *      },
12535          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12536          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12537          *      }
12538          * });
12539          */
12540         hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList = function (param) {
12541             hcap_command("get_usb_storage_file_list", param);
12542         };
12543         /**
12544          * Downloads the file given by uri to the path in the USB storage.<br>
12545          * 
12546          * The result for the download can be obtained by registering the
