12547          * <a href="_global_.html#event:usb_file_downloaded">{Event} usb_file_downloaded</a><br><br>
12548          *     
12549          * @param {Object} param
12550          * <ul>
12551          *   <li>{String} param.uri [Required] - URI for the file to download to the USB storage. Only "http" and "https" are allowed.</li>
12552          *   <li>{String} param.path [Required] - file path to download the file of uri. The file path should be equal to or lower than a USB mount point path. And if the directory doesn't exist, it will be created automatically.</li>
12553          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12554          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12555          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12556          *       // No Parameter.
12557          *   }</pre>
12558          *   </li>
12559          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12560          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12561          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12562          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12563          *   }</pre>
12564          *   </li>
12565          * </ul>
12566          * 
12567          * @since 1.18.3
12568          * 
12569          * @see
12570          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageList()</a><br>
12571          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageFileList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList()</a><br>
12572          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.deleteUsbFile">hcap.file.deleteUsbFile()</a><br>
12573          * <a href="_global_.html#event:usb_file_downloaded">{Event} usb_file_downloaded</a><br>
12574          *
12575          * @example
12576          * hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb({
12577          *      "uri" : "http://mycompany.com/resource/a.mp3",
12578          *      "path" : "/tmp/usb/sda/sda1/download/b.mp3",
12579          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12580          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12581          *      },
12582          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12583          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12584          *      }
12585          * });
12586          */
12587         hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb = function (param) {
12588             hcap_command("download_file_to_usb", param);
12589         };
12590         /**
12591          * Deletes the file or directory given by the path in the USB storage.<br>
12592          *     
12593          * @param {Object} param
12594          * <ul>
12595          *   <li>{String} param.path [Required] - file path or directory path to delete in the USB storage. Only the file path or the directory path under a USB mount point path (except the root directory of a USB mount point path as a directory path) are allowed. The designated path will be deleted without any warning. (It is same as "rm -rf") And if the path doesn't exist, the success callback will be returned.</li>
12596          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12597          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12598          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12599          *       // No Parameter.
12600          *   }</pre>
12601          *   </li>
12602          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12603          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12604          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12605          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12606          *   }</pre>
12607          *   </li>
12608          * </ul>
12609          * 
12610          * @since 1.18.3
12611          * 
12612          * @see
12613          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageList()</a><br>
12614          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageFileList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList()</a><br>
12615          * <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a><br>
12616          * <a href="_global_.html#event:usb_file_downloaded">{Event} usb_file_downloaded</a><br>
12617          *
12618          * @example
12619          * hcap.file.deleteUsbFile({
12620          *      "path" : "/tmp/usb/sda/sda1/download/a.mp4", // or a directory "/tmp/usb/sda/sda1/download"
12621          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12622          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12623          *      },
12624          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12625          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12626          *      }
12627          * });
12628          */
12629         hcap.file.deleteUsbFile = function (param) {
12630             hcap_command("delete_usb_file", param);
12631         };
12632         /**
12633          * @namespace hcap.rs232c
12634          */
12635         hcap.rs232c = {};
12636         /**
12637          * @namespace hcap.rs232c.BaudRate
12638          */
12639         hcap.rs232c.BaudRate = {
12640             /**
12641              * unknown value.
12642              * @since 1.18.4
12643              * @constant
12644              */
12645             BR_UNKNOWN : 0,
12646             /**
12647              * baud rate 110.
12648              * @since 1.18.4
12649              * @constant
12650              */
12651             BR_110 : 110,
12652             /**
12653              * baud rate 300.
12654              * @since 1.18.4
12655              * @constant
12656              */
12657             BR_300 : 300,
12658             /**
12659              * baud rate 600.
12660              * @since 1.18.4
12661              * @constant
12662              */
12663             BR_600 : 600,
12664             /**
12665              * baud rate 1200.
12666              * @since 1.18.4
12667              * @constant
12668              */
12669             BR_1200 : 1200,
12670             /**
12671              * baud rate 2400.
12672              * @since 1.18.4
12673              * @constant
12674              */
12675             BR_2400 : 2400,
12676             /**
12677              * baud rate 4800.
12678              * @since 1.18.4
12679              * @constant
12680              */
12681             BR_4800 : 4800,
12682             /**
12683              * baud rate 9600.
12684              * @since 1.18.4
12685              * @constant
12686              */
12687             BR_9600 : 9600,
12688             /**
12689              * baud rate 14400.
12690              * @since 1.18.4
12691              * @constant
12692              */
12693             BR_14400 : 14400,
12694             /**
12695              * baud rate 19200.
12696              * @since 1.18.4
12697              * @constant
12698              */
12699             BR_19200 : 19200,
12700             /**
12701              * baud rate 38400.
12702              * @since 1.18.4
12703              * @constant
12704              */
12705             BR_38400 : 38400,
12706             /**
12707              * baud rate 57600.
12708              * @since 1.18.4
12709              * @constant
12710              */
12711             BR_57600 : 57600,
12712             /**
12713              * baud rate 115200.
12714              * @since 1.18.4
12715              * @constant
12716              */
12717             BR_115200 : 115200,
12718             /**
12719              * baud rate 128000.
12720              * @since 1.18.4
12721              * @constant
12722              */
12723             BR_128000 : 128000,
12724             /**
12725              * baud rate 230400.
12726              * @since 1.18.4
12727              * @constant
12728              */
12729             BR_230400 : 230400,
12730             /**
12731              * baud rate 256000.
12732              * @since 1.18.4
12733              * @constant
12734              */
12735             BR_256000 : 256000,
12736             /**
12737              * baud rate 512000.
12738              * @since 1.18.4
12739              * @constant
12740              */
12741             BR_512000 : 512000,
12742             /**
12743              * baud rate 768000.
12744              * @since 1.18.4
12745              * @constant
12746              */
12747             BR_768000 : 768000,
12748             /**
12749              * baud rate 921600.
12750              * @since 1.18.4
12751              * @constant
12752              */
12753             BR_921600 : 921600,
12754             /**
12755              * baud rate 1024000.
12756              * @since 1.18.4
12757              * @constant
12758              */
12759             BR_1024000 : 1024000
12760         };
12761         /**
12762          * @namespace hcap.rs232c.DataBit
12763          */
12764         hcap.rs232c.DataBit = {
12765             /**
12766              * unknown value.
12767              * @since 1.18.4
12768              * @constant
12769              */
12770             BIT_UNKNOWN : 0,
12771             /**
12772              * data bit 7 bit.
12773              * @since 1.18.4
12774              * @constant
12775              */
12776             BIT_7 : 7,
12777             /**
12778              * data bit 8 bit.
12779              * @since 1.18.4
12780              * @constant
12781              */
12782             BIT_8 : 8
12783         };
12784         /**
12785          * @namespace hcap.rs232c.Parity
12786          */
12787         hcap.rs232c.Parity = {
12788             /**
12789              * unknown value.
12790              * @since 1.18.4
12791              * @constant
12792              */
12793             UNKNOWN : 0,
12794             /**
12795              * parity none.
12796              * @since 1.18.4
12797              * @constant
12798              */
12799             NONE : 1,
12800             /**
12801              * parity even.
12802              * @since 1.18.4
12803              * @constant
12804              */
12805             EVEN : 2,
12806             /**
12807              * parity odd.
12808              * @since 1.18.4
12809              * @constant
12810              */
12811             ODD : 3
12812         };
12813         /**
12814          * @namespace hcap.rs232c.StopBit
12815          */
12816         hcap.rs232c.StopBit = {
12817             /**
12818              * unknown value.
12819              * @since 1.18.4
12820              * @constant
12821              */
12822             UNKNOWN : 0,
12823             /**
12824              * stop bit 1 bit.
12825              * @since 1.18.4
12826              * @constant
12827              */
12828             BIT_1 : 1,
12829             /**
12830              * stop bit 2 bit.
12831              * @since 1.18.4
12832              * @constant
12833              */
12834             BIT_2 : 2
12835         };
12836         /**
12837          * @namespace hcap.rs232c.FlowControl
12838          */
12839         hcap.rs232c.FlowControl = {
12840             /**
12841              * unknown value.
12842              * @since 1.18.4
12843              * @constant
12844              */
12845             UNKNOWN : 0,
12846             /**
12847              * flow control none.
12848              * @since 1.18.4
12849              * @constant
12850              */
12851             NONE : 1,
12852             /**
12853              * flow control Xon/Xoff.
12854              * @since 1.18.4
12855              * @constant
12856              */
12857             XON_XOFF : 2,
12858             /**
12859              * flow control hardware.
12860              * @since 1.18.4
12861              * @constant
12862              */
12863             HARDWARE : 3
12864         };
12865         /**
12866          * Returns the current RS232C configuration.<br>
12867          * This is worked only when the property "rs232c" is "1".<br>
12868          *     
12869          * @param {Object} param
12870          * <ul>
12871          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12872          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12873          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12874          *       // {Number} param.port - COM port such as 1 for COM1 and 13 for COM13.
12875          *       // {Number} param.baudRate - baud rate (hcap.rs232c.BaudRate)
12876          *       // {Number} param.dataBit - data bit (hcap.rs232c.DataBit)
12877          *       // {Number} param.parity - parity (hcap.rs232c.Parity)
12878          *       // {Number} param.stopBit - stop bit (hcap.rs232c.StopBit)
12879          *       // {Number} param.flowControl - flow control (hcap.rs232c.FlowControl)
12880          *       // {Number} param.rxTimeoutInMs - Rx data timeout in ms which could be set from 0 to 1000(ms) by 10(ms). Max buffer size for Rx data is 80 bytes. For the Rx data bigger than 80 bytes, 80 bytes will be delivered to HCAP application first regardless of the timeout and the rest of the data will be sent in the next timeout.
12881          *   }</pre>
12882          *   </li>
12883          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12884          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12885          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12886          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12887          *   }</pre>
12888          *   </li>
12889          * </ul>
12890          * 
12891          * @since 1.18.4
12892          * 
12893          * @see
12894          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
12895          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
12896          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
12897          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
12898          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rs232c_data_received">{Event} rs232c_data_received</a><br>
12899          *
12900          * @example
12901          * hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration({
12902          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
12903          *          console.log("onSuccess : port = " + p.port + ", baud rate = " + p.baudRate + ", data bit = " + p.dataBit + ", parity = " + p.parity + ", stop bit = " + p.stopBit + ", flow control = " + p.flowControl + ", Rx timeout (ms) = " + p.rxTimeoutInMs);
12904          *      },
12905          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12906          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12907          *      }
12908          * });
12909          */
12910         hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration = function (param) {
12911             hcap_command("rs232c_get_configuration", param);
12912         };
12913         /**
12914          * Sets the RS232C configuration.<br>
12915          * This is worked only when the property "rs232c" is "1".<br>
12916          * Once RS232C is configured, it maintains its configuration unless the property "rs232c" is changed, TV is reset or other setting values are configured.<br>
12917          * If given setting value is not supported in the platform, it will be failed.<br>
12918          * Supported setting values are dependent on the platform or the model.<br>
12919          * To set rs232c configuration, we recommend to get the current configuration, modify it for values you want to change and set.<br>
12920          *     
12921          * @param {Object} param
12922          * <ul>
12923          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - COM port such as 1 for COM1 and 13 for COM13.</li>
12924          *   <li>{Number} param.baudRate [Required] - baud rate (hcap.rs232c.BaudRate)</li>
12925          *   <li>{Number} param.dataBit [Required] - data bit (hcap.rs232c.DataBit)</li>
12926          *   <li>{Number} param.parity [Required] - parity (hcap.rs232c.Parity)</li>
12927          *   <li>{Number} param.stopBit [Required] - stop bit (hcap.rs232c.StopBit)</li>
12928          *   <li>{Number} param.flowControl [Required] - flow control (hcap.rs232c.FlowControl)</li>
12929          *   <li>{Number} param.rxTimeoutInMs [Required] - Rx data timeout in ms which could be set from 0 to 1000(ms) by 10(ms). Max buffer size for Rx data is 80 bytes. For the Rx data bigger than 80 bytes, 80 bytes will be delivered to HCAP application first regardless of the timeout and the rest of the data will be sent in the next timeout.</li>
12930          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12931          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12932          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12933          *       // No Parameter.
12934          *   }</pre>
12935          *   </li>
12936          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12937          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12938          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12939          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12940          *   }</pre>
12941          *   </li>
12942          * </ul>
12943          * 
12944          * @since 1.18.4
12945          * 
12946          * @see
12947          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
12948          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
12949          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
12950          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
12951          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rs232c_data_received">{Event} rs232c_data_received</a><br>
12952          *
12953          * @example
12954          * hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration({
12955          *      "port" : 3,
12956          *      "baudRate" : hcap.rs232c.BaudRate.BR_115200,
12957          *      "dataBit" : hcap.rs232c.DataBit.BIT_7,
12958          *      "parity" : hcap.rs232c.Parity.NONE,
12959          *      "stopBit" : hcap.rs232c.StopBit.BIT_1,
12960          *      "flowControl" : hcap.rs232c.FlowControl.NONE,
12961          *      "rxTimeoutInMs" : 10,
12962          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12963          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12964          *      },
12965          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12966          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12967          *      }
12968          * });
12969          */
12970         hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration = function (param) {
12971             hcap_command("rs232c_set_configuration", param);
12972         };
12973         /**
12974          * Sends RS232C data.<br>
12975          * This is worked only when the property "rs232c" is "1".<br>
12976          *     
12977          * @param {Object} param
12978          * <ul>
12979          *   <li>{String} param.data - rs232c data string converted from binary data to ascii data such as ascii "3B1C42" for binary 0x3B1C42 with param.dataLength 3 (3 bytes) and ascii "00" for binary null data (0x00) with param.dataLength 1 (1 byte).</li>
12980          *   <li>{Number} param.dataLength - received rs232c data length in bytes. Max length of EU model is 255 (bytes) and US model is 32 (bytes).</li>
12981          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12982          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12983          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12984          *       // No Parameter.
12985          *   }</pre>
12986          *   </li>
12987          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12988          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12989          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12990          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12991          *   }</pre>
12992          *   </li>
12993          * </ul>
12994          * 
12995          * @since 1.18.4
12996          * 
12997          * @see
12998          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
12999          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
13000          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
13001          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
13002          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rs232c_data_received">{Event} rs232c_data_received</a><br>
13003          *
13004          * @example
13005          * hcap.rs232c.sendData({
13006          *      "data" : "3B1C42",
13007          *      "dataLength" : 3,
13008          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13009          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13010          *      },
13011          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13012          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13013          *      }
13014          * });
13015          */
13016         hcap.rs232c.sendData = function (param) {
13017             hcap_command("rs232c_send_data", param);
13018         };
13019         /**
13020          * Sets startup command which is fired to RS232C when TV is turned on.<br>
13021          * This is worked only when the property "rs232c" is "1".<br>
13022          *     
13023          * @param {Object} param
13024          * <ul>
13025          *   <li>{String} param.data - rs232c data string converted from binary data to ascii data such as ascii "3B1C42" for binary 0x3B1C42 with param.dataLength 3 (3 bytes) and ascii "00" for binary null data (0x00) with param.dataLength 1 (1 byte).</li>
13026          *   <li>{Number} param.dataLength - received rs232c data length in bytes. Max length of EU model is 255 (bytes) and US model is 32 (bytes).</li>
13027          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13028          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13029          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13030          *       // No Parameter.
13031          *   }</pre>
13032          *   </li>
13033          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13034          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13035          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13036          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13037          *   }</pre>
13038          *   </li>
13039          * </ul>
13040          * 
13041          * @since 1.18.4
13042          * 
13043          * @see
13044          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
13045          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
13046          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
13047          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
13048          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rs232c_data_received">{Event} rs232c_data_received</a><br>
13049          *
13050          * @example
13051          * hcap.rs232c.setStartupData({
13052          *      "data" : "3B1C42",
13053          *      "dataLength" : 3,
13054          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13055          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13056          *      },
13057          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13058          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13059          *      }
13060          * });
13061          */
13062         hcap.rs232c.setStartupData = function (param) {
13063             hcap_command("rs232c_set_teaching_data", param);
13064         };
13065         /**
13066          * Clears startup command which is fired to RS232C when TV is turned on.<br>
13067          * This is worked only when the property "rs232c" is "1".<br>
13068          *     
13069          * @param {Object} param
13070          * <ul>
13071          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13072          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13073          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13074          *       // No Parameter.
13075          *   }</pre>
13076          *   </li>
13077          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13078          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13079          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13080          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13081          *   }</pre>
13082          *   </li>
13083          * </ul>
13084          * 
13085          * @since 1.18.4
13086          * 
13087          * @see
13088          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
13089          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
13090          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
13091          * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
13092          * <a href="_global_.html#event:rs232c_data_received">{Event} rs232c_data_received</a><br>
13093          *
13094          * @example
13095          * hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData({
13096          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13097          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13098          *      },
13099          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13100          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13101          *      }
13102          * });
13103          */
13104         hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData = function (param) {
13105             hcap_command("rs232c_clear_teaching_data", param);
13106         };
13107         /** 
13108          * @namespace hcap.system
13109          */
13110         hcap.system = { };
13111         /**
13112          * Requests screen capture.<br>
13113          * 
13114          * @param {Object} param
13115          * <ul>
13116          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13117          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13118          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
13119          *       // No Parameter.
13120          *   }</pre>
13121          *   </li>
13122          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13123          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13124          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13125          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13126          *   }</pre>
13127          *   </li>
13128          * </ul>
13129          *  
13130          * @since 1.23.0
13131          * 
13132          * @see
13133          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getScreenCaptureImage">hcap.system.getScreenCaptureImage()</a><br>
13134          *
13135          * @example
13136          * hcap.system.requestScreenCaptureImage({
13137          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13138          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13139          *      }, 
13140          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13141          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13142          *      }
13143          * });
13144          */
13145         hcap.system.requestScreenCaptureImage = function (param) {
13146             hcap_command("request_screen_capture_image", param);
13147         };
13148         /**
13149          * Gets the screen capture image.<br>
13150          * 
13151          * @param {Object} param
13152          * <ul>
13153          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13154          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13155          *   param.onSuccess = function(param) {
13156          *       // {String} param.uri - URI for the screen capture image.
13157          *   }</pre>
13158          *   </li>
13159          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13160          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13161          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13162          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13163          *   }</pre>
13164          *   </li>
13165          * </ul>
13166          *  
13167          * @since 1.23.0
13168          * 
13169          * @see
13170          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestScreenCaptureImage">hcap.system.requestScreenCaptureImage()</a><br>
13171          *
13172          * @example
13173          * hcap.system.getScreenCaptureImage({
13174          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
13175          *          console.log("onSuccess : uri = " + s.uri);
13176          *      }, 
13177          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13178          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13179          *      }
13180          * });
13181          */
13182         hcap.system.getScreenCaptureImage = function (param) {
13183             hcap_command("get_screen_capture_image", param);
13184         };
13185         /**
13186          * Loads HCAP HTML application.<br>
13187          * When a HCAP HTML application has already been loaded, the HCAP HTML application is reloaded according to the "alternative_url" policy.<br>
13188          * That is, if the property "alternative_url" exists and it is not empty string, load "alternative_url". Otherwise, the application specified in XAIT.xml is loaded.<br>
13189          * 
13190          * @param {Object} param
13191          * <ul>
13192          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13193          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13194          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
13195          *       // No Parameter.
13196          *   }</pre>
13197          *   </li>
13198          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13199          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13200          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13201          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13202          *   }</pre>
13203          *   </li>
13204          * </ul>
13205          *  
13206          * @since 1.19.0
13207          * 
13208          * @see
13209          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a>
13210          *
13211          * @example
13212          * hcap.system.launchHcapHtmlApplication({
13213          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13214          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13215          *      }, 
13216          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13217          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13218          *      }
13219          * });
13220          */
13221         hcap.system.launchHcapHtmlApplication = function (param) {
13222             hcap_command("launch_hcap_html_application", param);
13223         };
13224         /**
13225          * Gets the percentage of the used memory.<br>
13226          * 
13227          * @param {Object} param
13228          * <ul>
13229          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13230          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13231          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13232          *       // {Number} param.percentage - percentage of used memory.
13233          *   }</pre>
13234          *   </li>
13235          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13236          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13237          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13238          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13239          *   }</pre>
13240          *   </li>
13241          * </ul>
13242          *  
13243          * @since 1.19.0
13244          * 
13245          * @see
13246          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getCpuUsage">hcap.system.getCpuUsage()</a>
13247          *
13248          * @example
13249          * hcap.system.getMemoryUsage({
13250          *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
13251          *          console.log("onSuccess : percentage of used memory = " + param.percentage);
13252          *      }, 
13253          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13254          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13255          *      }
13256          * });
13257          */
13258         hcap.system.getMemoryUsage = function (param) {
13259             hcap_command("get_memory_usage", param);
13260         };
13261         /**
13262          * Gets the percentage of the used CPU resource.<br>
13263          * 
13264          * @param {Object} param
13265          * <ul>
13266          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13267          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13268          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13269          *       // {Number} param.percentage - percentage of used CPU resource.
13270          *   }</pre>
13271          *   </li>
13272          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13273          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13274          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13275          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13276          *   }</pre>
13277          *   </li>
13278          * </ul>
13279          *  
13280          * @since 1.19.0
13281          * 
13282          * @see
13283          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getMemoryUsage">hcap.system.getMemoryUsage()</a>
13284          *
13285          * @example
13286          * hcap.system.getCpuUsage({
13287          *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
13288          *          console.log("onSuccess : percentage of used CPU resource = " + param.percentage);
13289          *      }, 
13290          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13291          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13292          *      }
13293          * });
13294          */
13295         hcap.system.getCpuUsage = function (param) {
13296             hcap_command("get_cpu_usage", param);
13297         };
13298         /**
13299          * Requests to make HCAP application get focused.<br>
13300          * If this request is successful and the focus is changed from a Preloaded Application to HCAP Application,
13301          * HCAP Application will get the notification <a href="_global_.html#event:hcap_application_focus_changed">{Event} hcap_application_focus_changed</a><br><br>.
13302          * If HCAP Application gets focused already, there will be no notification regarding focus change.
13303          * This is worked only when the property "block_hotkey" is "1".
13304          * 
13305          * @param {Object} param
13306          * <ul>
13307          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. 
13308          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13309          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
13310          *       // No Parameter.
13311          *   }</pre>
13312          *   </li>
13313          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13314          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13315          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13316          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13317          *   }</pre>
13318          *   </li>
13319          * </ul>
13320          *  
13321          * @since 1.19.0
13322          *
13323          * @see
13324          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
13325          * 
13326          * @example
13327          * hcap.system.requestFocus({
13328          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13329          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13330          *      }, 
13331          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13332          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13333          *      }
13334          * });
13335          */
13336         hcap.system.requestFocus = function (param) {
13337             hcap_command("request_focus", param);
13338         };
13339         /**
13340          * Gets whether HCAP application gets focused or not.<br>
13341          * This is worked only when the property "block_hotkey" is "1".
13342          * 
13343          * @param {Object} param
13344          * <ul>
13345          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. 
13346          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13347          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13348          *       // {Boolean} param.focused - true if the HCAP application gets focused, else false.
13349          *   }</pre>
13350          *   </li>
13351          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13352          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13353          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13354          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13355          *   }</pre>
13356          *   </li>
13357          * </ul>
13358          *  
13359          * @since 1.19.0
13360          *
13361          * @see
13362          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
13363          * 
13364          * @example
13365          * hcap.system.getFocused({
13366          *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
13367          *          console.log("onSuccess : focused = " + param.focused);
13368          *      }, 
13369          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13370          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13371          *      }
13372          * });
13373          */
13374         hcap.system.getFocused = function (param) {
13375             hcap_command("get_focused", param);
13376         };
13377         /**
13378          * Requests XML cloning to TV.<br>
13379          * This acts exactly same as USB cloning.<br>
13380          * When the cloning is done, HCAP Application will get the notification <a href="_global_.html#event:cloning_done_received">{Event} cloning_done_received</a>.<br>
13381          * <strong>We strongly recommend reboot after xml cloning.</strong><br>
13382          * 
13383          * @param {Object} param
13384          * <ul>
13385          *   <li>{String} param.xml - XML string for cloning.</li>
13386          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13387          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13388          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
13389          *       // No Parameter.
13390          *   }</pre>
13391          *   </li>
13392          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13393          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13394          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13395          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13396          *   }</pre>
13397          *   </li>
13398          * </ul>
13399          * 
13400          * @since 1.19.0
13401          * 
13402          * @see
13403          * <a href="_global_.html#event:cloning_done_received">{Event} cloning_done_received</a><br>
13404          *
13405          * @example
13406          * hcap.system.requestCloning({
13407          *      "xml" : "<xml>....</xml>",
13408          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13409          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13410          *      },
13411          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13412          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13413          *      }
13414          * });
13415          */
13416         hcap.system.requestCloning = function (param) {
13417             hcap_command("request_cloning", param);
13418         };
13419         /**
13420          * Gets the supported locale item list with an item (specifier, language name, country name).<br>
13421          * Locale specifier is composed of {language code}-{country code} and it is worked as the identifier when setting system locale.<br>
13422          * 
13423          * @param {Object} param
13424          * <ul>
13425          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13426          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13427          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13428          *       // {Array} param.list - locale list supported by TV.
13429          *       //         {String} param.list[].specifier - locale specifier ({language code}-{country code} such as "en-GB" and "ko-KR")
13430          *       //         {String} param.list[].language - language name
13431          *       //         {String} param.list[].country - country name
13432          *       //                 param.list example - 
13433          *       //                     "list" :  [
13434          *       //                     { "specifier" : "en-GB", "language" : "English", "country" : "United Kingdom" },
13435          *       //                     { "specifier" : "ko-KR", "language" : "", "country" : "" },
13436          *       //                     ]
13437          *   }</pre>
13438          *   </li>
13439          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13440          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13441          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13442          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13443          *   }</pre>
13444          *   </li>
13445          * </ul>
13446          * 
13447          * @since 1.19.0
13448          * 
13449          * @see
13450          * <a href="_global_.html#event:locale_changed">{Event} locale_changed</a><br>
13451          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
13452          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestLocaleChange">hcap.system.requestLocaleChange()</a><br>
13453          *
13454          * @example
13455          * hcap.system.getLocaleList({
13456          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
13457          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
13458          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
13459          *              console.log(
13460          *                  "list[" + i + "].specifier = " + s.list[i].specifier +
13461          *                  "list[" + i + "].language = " + s.list[i].language +
13462          *                  "list[" + i + "].country = " + s.list[i].country
13463          *              );
13464          *          }
13465          *      },
13466          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13467          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13468          *      }
13469          * });
13470          */
13471         hcap.system.getLocaleList = function (param) {
13472             hcap_command("get_locale_list", param);
13473         };
13474         /**
13475          * Gets the locale specifier of the current locale.<br>
13476          * 
13477          * @param {Object} param
13478          * <ul>
13479          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. 
13480          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13481          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13482          *       // {String} param.specifier - locale specifier of the current locale.
13483          *       // {String} param.language - language name of the current locale.
13484          *       // {String} param.country - country name of the current locale.
13485          *   }</pre>
13486          *   </li>
13487          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13488          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13489          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13490          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13491          *   }</pre>
13492          *   </li>
13493          * </ul>
13494          *  
13495          * @since 1.19.0
13496          *
13497          * @see
13498          * <a href="_global_.html#event:locale_changed">{Event} locale_changed</a><br>
13499          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
13500          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestLocaleChange">hcap.system.requestLocaleChange()</a><br>
13501          * 
13502          * @example
13503          * hcap.system.getLocale({
13504          *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
13505          *          console.log("onSuccess : specifier = " + param.specifier + ", language = " + param.language + ", country = " + param.country);
13506          *      }, 
13507          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13508          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13509          *      }
13510          * });
13511          */
13512         hcap.system.getLocale = function (param) {
13513             hcap_command("get_locale", param);
13514         };
13515         /**
13516          * Requests the system locale change to TV.<br>
13517          * It will return soon after the request is done.<br>
13518          * If the request is successful, the menu language will be changed and the locale change result will be notified through <a href="_global_.html#event:locale_changed">{Event} locale_changed</a>.<br>
13519          * 
13520          * @param {Object} param
13521          * <ul>
13522          *   <li>{String} param.specifier - locale specifier to set.</li>
13523          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13524          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13525          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
13526          *       // No Parameter.
13527          *   }</pre>
13528          *   </li>
13529          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13530          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13531          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13532          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13533          *   }</pre>
13534          *   </li>
13535          * </ul>
13536          * 
13537          * @since 1.19.0
13538          * 
13539          * @see
13540          * <a href="_global_.html#event:locale_changed">{Event} locale_changed</a><br>
13541          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
13542          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocale">hcap.system.getLocale()</a><br>
13543          *
13544          * @example
13545          * hcap.system.requestLocaleChange({
13546          *      "specifier" : "ko-KR",
13547          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13548          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13549          *      },
13550          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13551          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13552          *      }
13553          * });
13554          */
13555         hcap.system.requestLocaleChange = function (param) {
13556             hcap_command("request_locale_change", param);
13557         };
13558         /**
13559          * Gets the current configuration of Pro:Centric server.<br>
13560          * 
13561          * @param {Object} param
13562          * <ul>
13563          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13564          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13565          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13566          *       // {String} param.mode - Pro:Centric mode. ([US] "configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html", [EU] "off"/"configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html")
13567          *       // {String} param.media - media type ("rf"/"ip")
13568          *       // {Object} param.rfServer - data for param.media = "rf"
13569          *       //      {
13570          *       //          {String} type - RF data channel type ([US] "auto"/ "manual", [EU] "dvb-t"/"dvb-c")
13571          *       //          {Number} dataChannelNumber - [US] data channel number of RF server
13572          *       //          {Number} frequency - [EU] frequency of RF server (Hz, and MHz for satellite)
13573          *       //      }
13574          *       // {Object} param.ipServer - data for param.media = "ip"
13575          *       //      {
13576          *       //          {String} type - [US/EU] IP address type ("ip" : IPv4 or IPv6 type / "domain_name" : domain name)
13577          *       //          {String} ip - [US/EU] IPv4 or IPv6 address taken affect only when type is "ip"
13578          *       //          {String} domainName - [US/EU] domain name taken affect only when type is "domain_name"
13579          *       //          {Number} port - [US/EU] IP port number
13580          *       //      }
13581          *   }</pre>
13582          *   </li>
13583          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13584          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13585          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13586          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13587          *   }</pre>
13588          *   </li>
13589          * </ul>
13590          * 
13591          * @since 1.19.0
13592          * 
13593          * @see
13594          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setProcentricServer">hcap.system.setProcentricServer()</a><br>
13595          *
13596          * @example
13597          * hcap.system.getProcentricServer({
13598          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
13599          *          console.log("onSuccess : Pro:Centric server mode = " + p.mode + ", media = " + p.media);
13600          *          if (p.media === "rf") {
13601          *              console.log("RF server type = " + p.rfServer.type + ", data channel number = " + p.rfServer.dataChannelNumber); // US
13602          *              console.log("RF server type = " + p.rfServer.type + ", frequency = " + p.rfServer.freqeuncy); // EU
13603          *          } else if (p.media === "ip") {
13604          *              if (p.ipServer.type === "ip") {
13605          *                  console.log("IP server : type = ip, ip address = " + p.ipServer.ip + ", port = " + p.ipServer.port);
13606          *              } else if (p.ipServer.type === "domain_name") {
13607          *                  console.log("IP server : type = domain_name, domain name = " + p.ipServer.domainName + ", port = " + p.ipServer.port);
13608          *              }
13609          *          }
13610          *      },
13611          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13612          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13613          *      }
13614          * });
13615          */
13616         hcap.system.getProcentricServer = function (param) {
13617             hcap_command("get_procentric_server", param);
13618         };
13619         /**
13620          * Sets the configuration of Pro:Centric server.<br>
13621          * 
13622          * @param {Object} param
13623          * <ul>
13624          *   <li>{String} param.mode [Required] - Pro:Centric mode. ([US] "configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html", [EU] "off"/"configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html")</li>
13625          *   <li>{String} param.media [Required] - media type ("rf"/"ip")</li>
13626          *   <li>{Object} param.rfServer [Required] - data for param.media = "rf"<br>
13627          *         {<br>
13628          *             {String} type - RF data channel type ([US] "auto"/ "manual", [EU] "dvb-t"/"dvb-c")<br>
13629          *             {Number} dataChannelNumber - [US] data channel number of RF server<br>
13630          *             {Number} frequency - [EU] frequency of RF server (Hz, and MHz for satellite)<br>
13631          *         }
13632          *   </li>
13633          *   <li>{Object} param.ipServer [Required] - data for param.media = "ip"<br>
13634          *         {<br>
13635          *             {String} type - [US/EU] IP address type ("ip" : IPv4 or IPv6 type / "domain_name" : domain name)<br>
13636          *             {String} ip - [US/EU] IPv4 or IPv6 address taken affect only when type is "ip"<br>
13637          *             {String} domainName - [US/EU] domain name taken affect only when type is "domain_name"<br>
13638          *             {Number} port - IP port number<br>
13639          *         }
13640          *   </li>
13641          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13642          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13643          *   param.onSuccess = function()
13644          *       // No Parameter.
13645          *   }</pre>
13646          *   </li>
13647          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13648          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13649          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13650          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13651          *   }</pre>
13652          *   </li>
13653          * </ul>
13654          * 
13655          * @since 1.19.0
13656          * 
13657          * @see
13658          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProcentricServer">hcap.system.getProcentricServer()</a><br>
13659          *
13660          * @example
13661          * hcap.system.setProcentricServer({
13662          *      "mode" : "gem",
13663          *      "media" : "ip",
13664          *      "ipServer" :  {
13665          *          "type" : "domain_name",
13666          *          "domainName" : "lge.com",
13667          *          "port" : 3876
13668          *      },
13669          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13670          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13671          *      },
13672          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13673          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13674          *      }
13675          * });
13676          */
13677         hcap.system.setProcentricServer = function (param) {
13678             hcap_command("set_procentric_server", param);
13679         };
13680         /**
13681          * @namespace hcap.system.SoundOutputType
13682          */
13683         hcap.system.SoundOutputType = {
13684             /**
13685              * Unknown
13686              * @since 1.20.0
13687              * @constant
13688              */
13689             UNKNOWN : 0,
13690             /**
13691              * Internal TV Speaker
13692              * @since 1.20.0
13693              * @constant
13694              */
13695             INTERNAL_TV_SPEAKER : 1,
13696             /**
13697              * Wired Headphones
13698              * @since 1.20.0
13699              * @constant
13700              */
13701             WIRED_HEADPHONES : 2,
13702             /**
13703              * Off
13704              * @since 1.23.0
13705              * @constant
13706              */
13707             OFF : 3,
13708             /**
13709              * Optical
13710              * @since 1.23.0
13711              * @constant
13712              */
13713             OPTICAL : 4,
13714             /**
13715              * Optical LG Sound Sync
13716              * @since 1.23.0
13717              * @constant
13718              */
13719             OPTICAL_LGSOUNDSYNC : 5,
13720             /**
13721              * External ARC
13722              * @since 1.23.0
13723              * @constant
13724              */
13725             EXTERNAL_ARC : 6
13726         };
13727         /**
13728          * Gets the current sound output.<br>
13729          * 
13730          * @param {Object} param
13731          * <ul>
13732          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13733          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13734          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13735          *       // {Number} param.soundOutput - sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.
13736          *   }</pre>
13737          *   </li>
13738          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13739          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13740          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13741          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13742          *   }</pre>
13743          *   </li>
13744          * </ul>
13745          * 
13746          * @since 1.20.0
13747          * 
13748          * @see
13749          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setSoundOutput">hcap.system.setSoundOutput()</a><br>
13750          *
13751          * @example
13752          * hcap.system.getSoundOutput({
13753          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
13754          *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
13755          *      },
13756          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13757          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13758          *      }
13759          * });
13760          */
13761         hcap.system.getSoundOutput = function (param) {
13762             hcap_command("get_sound_output", param);
13763         };
13764         /**
13765 		 * Gets the default sound output.<br>
13766 		 * 
13767 		 * @param {Object} param
13768 		 * <ul>
13769 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13770 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13771 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13772 		 *       // {Number} param.defaultSoundOutput - default sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.
13773 		 *   }</pre>
13774 		 *   </li>
13775 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13776 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13777 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13778 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13779 		 *   }</pre>
13780 		 *   </li>
13781 		 * </ul>
13782 		 * 
13783 		 * @since 1.23.0
13784 		 * 
13785 		 * @see
13786 		 * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setDefaultSoundOutput">hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput()</a><br>
13787 		 *
13788 		 * @example
13789 		 * hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput({
13790 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
13791 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.defaultSoundOutput);
13792 		 *      },
13793 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13794 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13795 		 *      }
13796 		 * });
13797 		 */
13798 		hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput = function (param) {
13799 			hcap_command("get_default_sound_output", param);
13800 		};
13801         /**
13802          * Sets the sound output.<br>
13803          * 
13804          * @param {Object} param
13805          * <ul>
13806          *   <li>{Number} param.soundOutput [Required] - sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.</li>
13807          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13808          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13809          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13810          *       // No Parameter.
13811          *   }</pre>
13812          *   </li>
13813          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13814          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13815          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13816          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13817          *   }</pre>
13818          *   </li>
13819          * </ul>
13820          * 
13821          * @since 1.20.0
13822          * 
13823          * @see
13824          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getSoundOutput">hcap.system.getSoundOutput()</a><br>
13825          *
13826          * @example
13827          * hcap.system.setSoundOutput({
13828          *      "soundOutput" : hcap.system.SoundOutputType.WIRED_HEADPHONES,
13829          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
13830          *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
13831          *      },
13832          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13833          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13834          *      }
13835          * });
13836          */
13837         hcap.system.setSoundOutput = function (param) {
13838             hcap_command("set_sound_output", param);
13839         };
13840         /**
13841 		 * Sets the default sound output.<br>
13842 		 * 
13843 		 * @param {Object} param
13844 		 * <ul>
13845 		 *   <li>{Number} param.defaultSoundOutput [Required] - default sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.</li>
13846 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13847 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13848 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13849 		 *       // No Parameter.
13850 		 *   }</pre>
13851 		 *   </li>
13852 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13853 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13854 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13855 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13856 		 *   }</pre>
13857 		 *   </li>
13858 		 * </ul>
13859 		 * 
13860 		 * @since 1.23.0
13861 		 * 
13862 		 * @see
13863 		 * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getDefaultSoundOutput">hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput()</a><br>
13864 		 *
13865 		 * @example
13866 		 * hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput({
13867 		 *      "soundOutput" : hcap.system.SoundOutputType.WIRED_HEADPHONES,
13868 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
13869 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
13870 		 *      },
13871 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13872 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13873 		 *      }
13874 		 * });
13875 		 */
13876 		hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput = function (param) {
13877 			hcap_command("set_default_sound_output", param);
13878 		};
13879         /**
13880          * Informs TV of that the application will start cleaning up its resource.<br>
13881          * This should be called within 1 second in the event "on_destroy" listener, or it will be failed.<br>
13882          * If this is not called or is called after 1 second, TV will not wait for hcap.system.endDestroy and go turn off.<br>
13883          * 
13884          * @param {Object} param
13885          * <ul>
13886          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13887          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13888          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13889          *       // No Parameter.
13890          *   }</pre>
13891          *   </li>
13892          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13893          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13894          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13895          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13896          *   }</pre>
13897          *   </li>
13898          * </ul>
13899          * 
13900          * @since 1.20.0
13901          * 
13902          * @see
13903          * <a href="_global_.html#event:on_destroy">{Event} on_destroy</a><br>
13904          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.endDestroy">hcap.system.endDestroy()</a><br>
13905          *
13906          * @example
13907          * document.addEventListener(
13908          *      "on_destroy",
13909          *      function() {
13910          *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
13911          *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
13912          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
13913          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
13914          *
13915          *                  // clean up resources
13916          *
13917          *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
13918          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
13919          *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
13920          *                      },
13921          *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
13922          *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
13923          *                      }
13924          *                  });
13925          *              },
13926          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
13927          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13928          *              }
13929          *          });
13930          *      },
13931          *      false
13932          * );
13933          */
13934         hcap.system.beginDestroy = function (param) {
13935             hcap_command("begin_destroy", param);
13936         };
13937         /**
13938          * Informs TV of that the application finishes its cleanup job.<br>
13939          * TV waits for hcap.system.endDestroy up to 10 minutes after hcap.system.beginDestroy is called.<br>
13940          * 
13941          * @param {Object} param
13942          * <ul>
13943          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13944          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13945          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
13946          *       // No Parameter.
13947          *   }</pre>
13948          *   </li>
13949          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13950          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13951          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13952          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13953          *   }</pre>
13954          *   </li>
13955          * </ul>
13956          * 
13957          * @since 1.20.0
13958          * 
13959          * @see
13960          * <a href="_global_.html#event:on_destroy">{Event} on_destroy</a><br>
13961          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.beginDestroy">hcap.system.beginDestroy()</a><br>
13962          *
13963          * @example
13964          * document.addEventListener(
13965          *      "on_destroy",
13966          *      function() {
13967          *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
13968          *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
13969          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
13970          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
13971          *
13972          *                  // clean up resources
13973          *
13974          *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
13975          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
13976          *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
13977          *                      },
13978          *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
13979          *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
13980          *                      }
13981          *                  });
13982          *              },
13983          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
13984          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13985          *              }
13986          *          });
13987          *      },
13988          *      false
13989          * );
13990          */
13991         hcap.system.endDestroy = function (param) {
13992             hcap_command("end_destroy", param);
13993         };
13994         /**
13995          * Gets the current audio pts offset.<br>
13996          * 
13997          * @param {Object} param
13998          * <ul>
13999          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14000          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14001          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14002          *       // {Number} param.audioPtsOffset - audio pts offset.
14003          *   }</pre>
14004          *   </li>
14005          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14006          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14007          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14008          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14009          *   }</pre>
14010          *   </li>
14011          * </ul>
14012          * 
14013          * @since 1.21.0
14014          * 
14015          * @see
14016          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14017          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14018          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14019          *
14020          * @example
14021          * hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset({
14022          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14023          *          console.log("onSuccess : audio pts offset = " + p.audioPtsOffset);
14024          *      },
14025          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14026          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14027          *      }
14028          * });
14029          */
14030         hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset = function (param) {
14031             hcap_command("get_audio_pts_offset", param);
14032         };
14033         /**
14034          * sets the audio pts offset.<br>
14035          * 
14036          * @param {Object} param
14037          * <ul>
14038          *   <li>{Number} param.audioPtsOffset [Required] - audio pts offset. The value must be multiples of 10 (-500 ~ 500).</li>
14039          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14040          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14041          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14042          *       // No Parameter.
14043          *   }</pre>
14044          *   </li>
14045          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14046          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14047          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14048          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14049          *   }</pre>
14050          *   </li>
14051          * </ul>
14052          * 
14053          * @since 1.21.0
14054          * 
14055          * @see
14056          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14057          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14058          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14059          * <a href="_global_.html#event:ui_value_changed">{Event} ui_value_changed</a><br>
14060          *
14061          * @example
14062          * hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset({
14063          *      "audioPtsOffset" : 10,
14064          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14065          *          console.log("onSuccess : audio pts offset = " + p.audioPtsOffset);
14066          *      },
14067          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14068          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14069          *      }
14070          * });
14071          */
14072         hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset = function (param) {
14073             hcap_command("set_audio_pts_offset", param);
14074         };
14075         /**
14076          * Gets the current video pts offset.<br>
14077          * 
14078          * @param {Object} param
14079          * <ul>
14080          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14081          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14082          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14083          *       // {Number} param.videoPtsOffset - video pts offset.
14084          *   }</pre>
14085          *   </li>
14086          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14087          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14088          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14089          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14090          *   }</pre>
14091          *   </li>
14092          * </ul>
14093          * 
14094          * @since 1.21.0
14095          * 
14096          * @see
14097          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14098          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14099          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14100          *
14101          * @example
14102          * hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset({
14103          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14104          *          console.log("onSuccess : video pts offset = " + p.videoPtsOffset);
14105          *      },
14106          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14107          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14108          *      }
14109          * });
14110          */
14111         hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset = function (param) {
14112             hcap_command("get_video_pts_offset", param);
14113         };
14114         /**
14115          * sets the video pts offset.<br>
14116          * 
14117          * @param {Object} param
14118          * <ul>
14119          *   <li>{Number} param.videoPtsOffset [Required] - video pts offset. The value must be multiples of 10 (-500 ~ 500).</li>
14120          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14121          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14122          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14123          *       // No Parameter.
14124          *   }</pre>
14125          *   </li>
14126          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14127          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14128          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14129          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14130          *   }</pre>
14131          *   </li>
14132          * </ul>
14133          * 
14134          * @since 1.21.0
14135          * 
14136          * @see
14137          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
14138          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14139          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
14140          * <a href="_global_.html#event:ui_value_changed">{Event} ui_value_changed</a><br>
14141          *
14142          * @example
14143          * hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset({
14144          *      "videoPtsOffset" : 10,
14145          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14146          *          console.log("onSuccess : video pts offset = " + p.videoPtsOffset);
14147          *      },
14148          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14149          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14150          *      }
14151          * });
14152          */
14153         hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset = function (param) {
14154             hcap_command("set_video_pts_offset", param);
14155         };
14156         /**
14157          * Gets the current configuration of proxy server.<br>
14158          * 
14159          * @param {Object} param
14160          * <ul>
14161          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14162          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14163          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14164          *       // {String} param.ip - IPv4 or IPv6 address
14165          *       // {Number} param.port - IP port number
14166          *   }</pre>
14167          *   </li>
14168          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14169          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14170          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14171          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14172          *   }</pre>
14173          *   </li>
14174          * </ul>
14175          * 
14176          * @since 1.21.0
14177          * 
14178          * @see
14179          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setProxyServer">hcap.system.setProxyServer()</a><br>
14180          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.expireProxyServer">hcap.system.expireProxyServer()</a><br>
14181          *
14182          * @example
14183          * hcap.system.getProxyServer({
14184          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14185          *          console.log("onSuccess : proxy server ip address= " + p.ip + ", port = " + p.port);
14186          *      },
14187          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14188          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14189          *      }
14190          * });
14191          */
14192         hcap.system.getProxyServer = function (param) {
14193             hcap_command("get_proxy_server", param);
14194         };
14195         /**
14196          * Sets the configuration of proxy server.<br>
14197          * 
14198          * @param {Object} param
14199          * <ul>
14200          *   <li>{String} param.ip [Required] - ip - IPv4 or IPv6 address</li>
14201          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - port - IP port number</li>
14202          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14203          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14204          *   param.onSuccess = function()
14205          *       // No Parameter.
14206          *   }</pre>
14207          *   </li>
14208          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14209          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14210          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14211          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14212          *   }</pre>
14213          *   </li>
14214          * </ul>
14215          * 
14216          * @since 1.21.0
14217          * 
14218          * @see
14219          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProxyServer">hcap.system.getProxyServer()</a><br>
14220          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.expireProxyServer">hcap.system.expireProxyServer()</a><br>
14221          *
14222          * @example
14223          * hcap.system.setProxyServer({
14224          *      "ip" : "1.2.3.4",
14225          *      "port" : 3876,
14226          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
14227          *          console.log("onSuccess");
14228          *      },
