16296          *ioOvHBHeyw2PzqO4KbIXrvj0dihDBWc/SltS/4htXs4JL76rA7+Byj9AUVxrm2QK\n\
16297          *gmsignOklllYUkLdIjLPyJy8tDUFTcR4oElWN+mGME4zl0x8mCaTaPf8niBw9hfI\n\
16298          *Cymj\n\
16299          *-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n",
16300          *      "urlPattern" : "https://jkcloud.lge.com",
16301          *      "issuerCN" : "ROOT CA",
16302          *      "isSelfSigned" : true,
16303          *      "accessCode" : "passCode1",
16304          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16305          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16306          *      }, 
16307          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16308          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16309          *      }
16310          * });
16311          */
16312         hcap.security.registerClientCertificate = function (param) {
16313             hcap_command("register_client_certificate", param);
16314         };
16315         /**
16316          * Unregisters a server certificate and deactivate the TLS authentication and the host verification.<br>
16317          * 
16318          * @param {Object} param
16319          * <ul>
16320          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname for the server certificate to unregister.<br>
16321          *   <li>{String} param.accessCode [Required] - password to be used for the registration of the server certificate before.<br>
16322          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16323          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16324          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16325          *       // No Parameter. 
16326          *   }</pre>
16327          *   </li>
16328          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16329          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16330          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16331          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16332          *   }</pre>
16333          *   </li>
16334          * </ul>
16335          *  
16336          * @since 1.20.0
16337          * 
16338          * @see 
16339          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerServerCertificate">hcap.security.registerServerCertificate()</a><br>
16340          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerClientCertificate">hcap.security.registerClientCertificate()</a><br>
16341          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterClientCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterClientCertificate()</a><br>
16342          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existServerCertificate">hcap.security.existServerCertificate()</a><br>
16343          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existClientCertificate">hcap.security.existClientCertificate()</a><br>
16344          *
16345          * @example
16346          * hcap.security.unregisterServerCertificate({
16347          *      "nickname" : "testserver",
16348          *      "accessCode" : "passCode1",
16349          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16350          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16351          *      }, 
16352          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16353          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16354          *      }
16355          * });
16356          */
16357         hcap.security.unregisterServerCertificate = function (param) {
16358             hcap_command("unregister_server_certificate", param);
16359         };
16360         /**
16361          * Unregisters a client certificate and its private key, and deactivate the TLS authentication.<br>
16362          * 
16363          * @param {Object} param
16364          * <ul>
16365          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname for the client certificate to unregister.<br>
16366          *   <li>{String} param.accessCode [Required] - password to be used for the registration of the client certificate before.<br>
16367          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16368          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16369          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16370          *       // No Parameter. 
16371          *   }</pre>
16372          *   </li>
16373          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16374          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16375          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16376          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16377          *   }</pre>
16378          *   </li>
16379          * </ul>
16380          *  
16381          * @since 1.20.0
16382          * 
16383          * @see 
16384          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerServerCertificate">hcap.security.registerServerCertificate()</a><br>
16385          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerClientCertificate">hcap.security.registerClientCertificate()</a><br>
16386          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterServerCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterServerCertificate()</a><br>
16387          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existServerCertificate">hcap.security.existServerCertificate()</a><br>
16388          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existClientCertificate">hcap.security.existClientCertificate()</a><br>
16389          *
16390          * @example
16391          * hcap.security.unregisterClientCertificate({
16392          *      "nickname" : "testclient",
16393          *      "accessCode" : "passCode1",
16394          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16395          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16396          *      }, 
16397          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16398          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16399          *      }
16400          * });
16401          */
16402         hcap.security.unregisterClientCertificate = function (param) {
16403             hcap_command("unregister_client_certificate", param);
16404         };
16405         /**
16406          * Returns whether a server certificate was registered or not.<br>
16407          * 
16408          * @param {Object} param
16409          * <ul>
16410          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname for the server certificate.<br>
16411          *   <li>{String} param.accessCode [Required] - password to be used for the registration of the server certificate before.<br>
16412          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16413          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16414          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) { 
16415          *       // {String} param.nickname - nickname for the server certificate.
16416          *       // {Boolean} param.exist - true if the server certificate was registered.
16417          *   }</pre>
16418          *   </li>
16419          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16420          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16421          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16422          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16423          *   }</pre>
16424          *   </li>
16425          * </ul>
16426          *  
16427          * @since 1.20.0
16428          * 
16429          * @see 
16430          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerServerCertificate">hcap.security.registerServerCertificate()</a><br>
16431          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerClientCertificate">hcap.security.registerClientCertificate()</a><br>
16432          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterServerCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterServerCertificate()</a><br>
16433          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterClientCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterClientCertificate()</a><br>
16434          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existClientCertificate">hcap.security.existClientCertificate()</a><br>
16435          *
16436          * @example
16437          * hcap.security.existServerCertificate({
16438          *      "nickname" : "testserver",
16439          *      "accessCode" : "passCode1",
16440          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16441          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16442          *      }, 
16443          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16444          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16445          *      }
16446          * });
16447          */
16448         hcap.security.existServerCertificate = function (param) {
16449             hcap_command("exist_server_certificate", param);
16450         };
16451         /**
16452          * Returns whether a client certificate was registered or not.<br>
16453          * 
16454          * @param {Object} param
16455          * <ul>
16456          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname for the client certificate.<br>
16457          *   <li>{String} param.accessCode [Required] - password to be used for the registration of the client certificate before.<br>
16458          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16459          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16460          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) { 
16461          *       // {String} param.nickname - nickname for the client certificate.
16462          *       // {Boolean} param.exist - true if the client certificate was registered.
16463          *   }</pre>
16464          *   </li>
16465          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16466          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16467          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16468          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16469          *   }</pre>
16470          *   </li>
16471          * </ul>
16472          *  
16473          * @since 1.20.0
16474          * 
16475          * @see 
16476          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerServerCertificate">hcap.security.registerServerCertificate()</a><br>
16477          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.registerClientCertificate">hcap.security.registerClientCertificate()</a><br>
16478          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterServerCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterServerCertificate()</a><br>
16479          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.unregisterClientCertificate">hcap.security.unregisterClientCertificate()</a><br>
16480          * <a href="hcap.security.html#.existServerCertificate">hcap.security.existServerCertificate()</a><br>
16481          *
16482          * @example
16483          * hcap.security.existClientCertificate({
16484          *      "nickname" : "testclient",
16485          *      "accessCode" : "passCode1",
16486          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16487          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16488          *      }, 
16489          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16490          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16491          *      }
16492          * });
16493          */
16494         hcap.security.existClientCertificate = function (param) {
16495             hcap_command("exist_client_certificate", param);
16496         };
16497         /** 
16498          * @namespace hcap.iot
16499          */
16500         hcap.iot = { };
16501         /**
16502          * Requests to set the bridge status.<br>
16503          * If the bridge status is changed, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a> will be delivered.<br>
16504          * In "scan" mode, a bridge can terminate the "scan" mode and change to "normal" mode by the timeout (the timeout is different binding by binding).<br>   
16505          * 
16506          * @param {Object} param
16507          * <ul>
16508          *   <li>{String} param.bridgeUid [Required] - bridge UID.<br>
16509          *   <li>{String} param.status [Required] - "scan" for scan status, "normal" for normal (non-scan) status.<br>
16510          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. Request for the same status returns <i>onSuccess</i> and it has no effect.
16511          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16512          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
16513          *       // No Parameter. 
16514          *   }</pre>
16515          *   </li>
16516          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16517          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16518          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16519          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16520          *   }</pre>
16521          *   </li>
16522          * </ul>
16523          *  
16524          * @since 1.22.2
16525          *
16526          * @see
16527          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16528          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16529          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16530          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16531          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16532          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16533          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16534          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16535          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16536          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16537          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16538          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16539          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16540          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16541          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16542          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16543          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16544          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16545          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16546          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16547          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16548          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16549          * 
16550          * @example
16551          * hcap.iot.getThingList({
16552          *      "thingType": "ThingBridge",
16553          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
16554          *          console.log("getThingList onSuccess");
16555          *          hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus({
16556          *              "bridgeUid": s.thingList[0].thingUid,
16557          *              "status": "scan",
16558          *              "onSuccess": function() {
16559          *                  console.log("requestSetBridgeStatus onSuccess");
16560          *              },
16561          *              "onFailure": function(sf) {
16562          *                  console.log("requestSetBridgeStatus onFailure : errorMessage = " + sf.errorMessage);
16563          *              }
16564          *          });
16565          *      }, 
16566          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16567          *          console.log("getThingList onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16568          *      }
16569          * });
16570          */
16571         hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus = function (param) {
16572             hcap_command("iot_request_set_bridge_status", param);
16573         };
16574         /**
16575          * Gets the bridge status.<br>
16576          * 
16577          * @param {Object} param
16578          * <ul>
16579          *   <li>{String} param.bridgeUid [Required] - bridge UID.<br>
16580          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16581          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16582          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
16583          *       // {String} param.status - "scan" for scan status, "normal" for normal (non-scan) status.
16584          *   }</pre>
16585          *   </li>
16586          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16587          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16588          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16589          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16590          *   }</pre>
16591          *   </li>
16592          * </ul>
16593          * 
16594          * @since 1.22.2
16595          * 
16596          * @see
16597          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16598          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16599          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16600          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16601          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16602          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16603          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16604          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16605          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16606          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16607          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16608          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16609          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16610          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16611          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16612          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16613          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16614          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16615          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16616          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16617          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16618          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16619          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16620          *
16621          * @example
16622          * hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus({
16623          *      "bridgeUid": "Zigbee:ZHA",
16624          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
16625          *          console.log("getBridgeStatus onSuccess : status = " + s.status);
16626          *      }, 
16627          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16628          *          console.log("getBridgeStatus onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16629          *      }
16630          * });
16631          */
16632         hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus = function (param) {
16633             hcap_command("iot_get_bridge_status", param);
16634         };
16635         /**
16636          * Requests registration for a discovered thing.<br>
16637          * If the discovered thing is registered, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a> will be delivered and <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a> may also be delivered subsequently.<br>
16638          * 
16639          * @param {Object} param
16640          * <ul>
16641          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - UID of the discovered thing to register.<br>
16642          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16643          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16644          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
16645          *       // No Parameter. 
16646          *   }</pre>
16647          *   </li>
16648          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16649          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16650          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16651          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16652          *   }</pre>
16653          *   </li>
16654          * </ul>
16655          *  
16656          * @since 1.22.2
16657          * 
16658          * @see
16659          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16660          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16661          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16662          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16663          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16664          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16665          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16666          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16667          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16668          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16669          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16670          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16671          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16672          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16673          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16674          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16675          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16676          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16677          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16678          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16679          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16680          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16681          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16682          *
16683          * @example
16684          * document.addEventListener(
16685          *      "iot_thing_discovered",
16686          *      function (param) {
16687          *          // {String} param.bindingId - binding ID.
16688          *          // {String} param.thingUid : thing UID.
16689          *          console.log(
16690          *              "Event 'iot_thing_discovered' is received.\n" +
16691          *              "bindingId = " + param.bindingId + "\n" +
16692          *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
16693          *          );
16694          *          hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing({
16695          *              "thingUid": param.thingUid,
16696          *              "onSuccess": function() {
16697          *                  console.log("requestRegisterThing onSuccess");
16698          *              },
16699          *              "onFailure": function(f) {
16700          *                  console.log("requestRegisterThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16701          *              }
16702          *          });
16703          *      },
16704          *      false
16705          * );
16706          */
16707         hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing = function (param) {
16708             hcap_command("iot_request_register_thing", param);
16709         };
16710         /**
16711          * Requests a reject to register a discovered thing.<br>
16712          * If the discovered thing is rejected to register, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a> will be delivered.<br>
16713          * 
16714          * @param {Object} param
16715          * <ul>
16716          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - UID of the discovered thing to reject.<br>
16717          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16718          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16719          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
16720          *       // No Parameter. 
16721          *   }</pre>
16722          *   </li>
16723          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16724          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16725          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16726          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16727          *   }</pre>
16728          *   </li>
16729          * </ul>
16730          * 
16731          * @since 1.22.2
16732          * 
16733          * @see
16734          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16735          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16736          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16737          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16738          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16739          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16740          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16741          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16742          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16743          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16744          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16745          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16746          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16747          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16748          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16749          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16750          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16751          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16752          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16753          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16754          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16755          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16756          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16757          *
16758          * @example
16759          * hcap.iot.requestRejectThing({
16760          *     "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
16761          *     "onSuccess": function() {
16762          *         console.log("requestRejectThing onSuccess");
16763          *     },
16764          *     "onFailure": function(f) {
16765          *         console.log("requestRejectThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16766          *     }
16767          * });
16768          */
16769         hcap.iot.requestRejectThing = function (param) {
16770             hcap_command("iot_request_reject_thing", param);
16771         };
16772         /**
16773          * Gets cached information for registered things.<br>
16774          * Each parameter works as a filter for result things list.<br>
16775          * If several parameters are given, only the highest priority parameter will be effective. Priorities among parameters are (HIGH) > <i>thingUidList</i> > <i>thingTypeId</i> > (LOW).<br>
16776          * If no parameter is given, it's same as no filter, therefore all things list will be returned.<br>
16777          * 
16778          * @param {Object} param
16779          * <ul>
16780          *   <li>{Array} param.thingUidList [Required] - thing UID list as an array of a string thingUids like [|thingUid-0|, |thingUid-1|, ..., |thingUid-n|] while |thingUid-n| is a string of thing UID.<br>
16781          *   <li>{String} param.thingType [Optional] - |ThingType|, thing type. <b><i>ThingBridge</i></b> for bridges. <b><i>ThingDiscovered</i></b> for discovered things.<br>
16782          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16783          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16784          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
16785          *       // {Array} s.thingList - information for things as a type of json array as of [|thing-0|, |thing-1|, ..., |thing-n|]
16786          *       //   |thing-n| - json object for a thing
16787          *       //     {
16788          *       //       "bindingId": |string|, // binding ID
16789          *       //       "thingUid" : |string|, //thing UID
16790          *       //       "thingId" : |string|, // thing ID
16791          *       //       "thingType" : |ThingType|, //thing type
16792          *       //       "thingMetaData" : |ThingMetaData|, // thing meta data
16793          *       //       "thingComponentList": [|thingComponentList-0|, |thingComponentList-1|, ..., |thingComponentList-n|], // component list of the thing
16794          *       //     }
16795          *       //   |thingComponentList-n| - json object for a component
16796          *       //     {
16797          *       //       "parentThingUid": |string|, // parent thing UID of the component
16798          *       //       "componentType": |string|, // component type
16799          *       //       "componentId": |string|, // component ID
16800          *       //       "componentValueType": |string|, // component value type
16801          *       //       "componentValue": |ComponentValue|, // component value
16802          *       //       "componentGettable": |boolean|, // true:component is gettable, false:component is not gettable
16803          *       //       "componentSettable": |boolean|, // true:component is settable, false:component is not settable
16804          *       //     }
16805          *       //   |ComponentValue| - json object for a component value
16806          *       //     {
16807          *       //       "valueType": |string|, // "Unknown", "String", "Boolean", "Variables", "Double", "Float", "Int8", "Int16", "Int32", "Int64", "UInt8", "UInt16", "UInt32", "UInt64"
16808          *       //       "value": |string|, // value
16809          *       //       "additionalValue": |string|, //custom additional value as a string
16810          *       //     }
16811          *   }</pre>
16812          *   </li>
16813          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16814          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16815          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16816          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16817          *   }</pre>
16818          *   </li>
16819          * </ul>
16820          *  
16821          * @since 1.22.2
16822          * 
16823          * @see
16824          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16825          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16826          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16827          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16828          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16829          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16830          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16831          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16832          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16833          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16834          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16835          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16836          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16837          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16838          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16839          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16840          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16841          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16842          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16843          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16844          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16845          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16846          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16847          *
16848          * @example
16849          * hcap.iot.getThingList({
16850          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
16851          *          console.log("getThingList onSuccess : valueType of the first component of the first thing = " + s.thingList[0].thingComponentList[0].componentValue.valueType);
16852          *      }, 
16853          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16854          *          console.log("getThingList onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16855          *      }
16856          * });
16857          */
16858         hcap.iot.getThingList = function (param) {
16859             hcap_command("iot_get_thing_list", param);
16860         };
16861         /**
16862          * Gets the binding ID list.<br>
16863          * 
16864          * @param {Object} param
16865          * <ul>
16866          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16867          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16868          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
16869          *       // {Array} s.bindingIdList - binding ID list when returnValue is true.
16870          *   }</pre>
16871          *   </li>
16872          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16873          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16874          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16875          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16876          *   }</pre>
16877          *   </li>
16878          * </ul>
16879          *  
16880          * @since 1.22.2
16881          * 
16882          * @see
16883          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16884          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16885          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16886          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16887          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16888          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16889          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16890          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16891          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16892          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16893          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16894          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16895          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16896          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16897          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16898          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16899          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
16900          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16901          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16902          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16903          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16904          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16905          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16906          *
16907          * @example
16908          * hcap.iot.getBindingIdList({
16909          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
16910          *          console.log("getBindingIdList onSuccess : bindingIdList = " + JSON.stringify(s.bindingIdList));
16911          *      }, 
16912          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16913          *          console.log("getBindingIdList onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16914          *      }
16915          * });
16916          */
16917         hcap.iot.getBindingIdList = function (param) {
16918             hcap_command("iot_get_binding_id_list", param);
16919         };
16920         /**
16921          * Requests to set the component value.<br>
16922          * If this call is succeeded or failed, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a> will be delivered.<br>
16923          * If the component value is changed, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a> will be delivered.<br>
16924          * 
16925          * @param {Object} param
16926          * <ul>
16927          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID.<br>
16928          *   <li>{String} param.componentId [Required] - component ID.<br>
16929          *   <li>{Object} param.componentValue [Required] - |ComponentValue|. component value to set.<br>
16930          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16931          *       // {Object} |ComponentValue| - json object for a variable
16932          *       //     {
16933          *       //       "valueType": |string|, // "Unknown", "String", "Boolean", "Variables", "Double", "Float", "Int8", "Int16", "Int32", "Int64", "UInt8", "UInt16", "UInt32", "UInt64"
16934          *       //       "value": |string|, // value
16935          *       //       "additionalValue": |string|, //custom additional value as a string
16936          *       //     }</pre>
16937          *   <li>{String} param.callId [Required] - callId which will be delivered for the result identification of this call via <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a>.<br>
16938          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16939          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16940          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
16941          *       // No Parameter. 
16942          *   }</pre>
16943          *   </li>
16944          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16945          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16946          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16947          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16948          *   }</pre>
16949          *   </li>
16950          * </ul>
16951          *  
16952          * @since 1.22.2
16953          * 
16954          * @see
16955          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
16956          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
16957          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
16958          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
16959          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
16960          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
16961          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
16962          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
16963          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
16964          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
16965          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
16966          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16967          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
16968          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
16969          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
16970          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
16971          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
16972          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
16973          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
16974          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
16975          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
16976          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
16977          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
16978          *
16979          * @example
16980          * hcap.iot.requestSetComponent({
16981          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
16982          *      "componentId": "Dimming",
16983          *      "componentValue": {
16984          *          "additionalVlaue":"",
16985          *          "valueType": "Double",
16986          *          "value": "60"
16987          *      },
16988          *      "callId": "7",
16989          *      "onSuccess": function() {
16990          *          console.log("requestSetComponent onSuccess");
16991          *      }, 
16992          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16993          *          console.log("requestSetComponent onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16994          *      }
16995          * });
16996          */
16997         hcap.iot.requestSetComponent = function (param) {
16998             hcap_command("iot_request_set_component", param);
16999         };
17000         /**
17001          * Requests to unregister a thing.<br>
17002          * If a thing is unregistered, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a> will be delivered.<br>
17003          * 
17004          * @param {Object} param
17005          * <ul>
17006          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to unregister.<br>
17007          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17008          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17009          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
17010          *       // No Parameter. 
17011          *   }</pre>
17012          *   </li>
17013          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17014          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17015          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17016          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17017          *   }</pre>
17018          *   </li>
17019          * </ul>
17020          *  
17021          * @since 1.22.2
17022          * 
17023          * @see
17024          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17025          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17026          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17027          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17028          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17029          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17030          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17031          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17032          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17033          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17034          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17035          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17036          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17037          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17038          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17039          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17040          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17041          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17042          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
17043          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
17044          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
17045          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
17046          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
17047          *
17048          * @example
17049          * hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing({
17050          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
17051          *      "onSuccess": function() {
17052          *          console.log("requestUnregisterThing onSuccess");
17053          *      }, 
17054          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17055          *          console.log("requestUnregisterThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17056          *      }
17057          * });
17058          */
17059         hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing = function (param) {
17060             hcap_command("iot_request_unregister_thing", param);
17061         };
17062         /**
17063          * Set the nickname of a thing.<br>
17064          * The change of the nickname of a thing causes <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a>.<br>
17065          * 
17066          * @param {Object} param
17067          * <ul>
17068          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to remove.<br>
17069          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname.<br>
17070          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17071          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17072          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
17073          *       // No Parameter. 
17074          *   }</pre>
17075          *   </li>
17076          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17077          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17078          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17079          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17080          *   }</pre>
17081          *   </li>
17082          * </ul>
17083          *  
17084          * @since 1.22.2
17085          * 
17086          * @see
17087          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17088          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17089          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17090          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17091          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17092          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17093          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17094          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17095          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17096          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17097          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17098          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17099          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17100          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17101          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17102          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17103          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17104          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17105          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
17106          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
17107          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
17108          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
17109          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
17110          *
17111          * @example
17112          * hcap.iot.setThingNickname({
17113          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
17114          *      "nickname": "NewNickname",
17115          *      "onSuccess": function() {
17116          *          console.log("setThingNickname onSuccess");
17117          *      }, 
17118          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17119          *          console.log("setThingNickname onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17120          *      }
17121          * });
17122          */
17123         hcap.iot.setThingNickname = function (param) {
17124             hcap_command("iot_set_thing_nickname", param);
17125         };
17126         /**
17127          * Requests to synchronize components values of an IoT thing between components values in TV's cache and them in the thing.<br>
17128          * This request is a trigger to update components between TV and the thing.<br>
17129          * Therefore if the thing is not reached by the reason like thing's sleep, it will be failed to synchronize components.<br>
17130          * If the request for a component update is reached to the thing, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a> will be delivered.<br>
17131          * 
17132          * @param {Object} param
17133          * <ul>
17134          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to synchronize.<br>
17135          *   <li>{String} param.componentId [Optional] - component ID to synchronize. If <i>componentId</i> is not defined, all components of the thing will be requested to synchronize.<br>
17136          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17137          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17138          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
17139          *       // No Parameter. 
17140          *   }</pre>
17141          *   </li>
17142          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17143          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17144          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17145          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17146          *   }</pre>
17147          *   </li>
17148          * </ul>
17149          *  
17150          * @since 1.22.2
17151          * 
17152          * @see
17153          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17154          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17155          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17156          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17157          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17158          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17159          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17160          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17161          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17162          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17163          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17164          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17165          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17166          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17167          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17168          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17169          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17170          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17171          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
17172          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
17173          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
17174          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
17175          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
17176          *
17177          * @example
17178          * hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing({
17179          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
17180          *      "onSuccess": function() {
17181          *          console.log("requestSynchronizeThing onSuccess");
17182          *      }, 
17183          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17184          *          console.log("requestSynchronizeThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17185          *      }
17186          * });
17187          */
17188         hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing = function (param) {
17189             hcap_command("iot_request_synchronize_thing", param);
17190         };
17191         /**
17192          * Gets the IoT framework status.<br> 
17193          * 
17194          * @param {Object} param
17195          * <ul>
17196          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17197          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17198          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
17199          *       // {String} param.status - "off" : framework is off, "initializing" : framework is initializing, "ready" : framework is ready. 
17200          *   }</pre>
17201          *   </li>
17202          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17203          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17204          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17205          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17206          *   }</pre>
17207          *   </li>
17208          * </ul>
17209          *  
17210          * @since 1.22.2
17211          * 
17212          * @see
17213          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17214          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17215          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17216          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17217          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17218          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17219          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17220          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17221          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17222          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17223          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17224          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17225          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17226          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17227          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17228          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17229          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17230          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17231          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
17232          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
17233          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
17234          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
17235          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
17236          *
17237          * @example
17238          * hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus({
17239          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
17240          *          console.log("getFrameworkStatus onSuccess : status = " + s.status);
17241          *      }, 
17242          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17243          *          console.log("getFrameworkStatus onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17244          *      }
17245          * });
17246          */
17247         hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus = function (param) {
17248             hcap_command("iot_get_framework_status", param);
17249         };
17250         /**
17251          * Request to do factory reset for core DB and binding DBs.<br> 
17252          * If factory reset is successful,  <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a> will be delivered.<br>
17253          * 
17254          * @param {Object} param
17255          * <ul>
17256          *   <li>{Array} param.bindingIdList [Required] - binding ID list to do factory reset.<br> If bindingIdList is undefined, core and all bindings will remove DB file.<br> 
17257          *                                                If bindingIdList is defined, the bindings in bindingIdList will remove DB files, and core will remove bindings in binidngIdList and their information in core DB but core will not remove core DB file.<br>
17258          *                                                For core or bindings to delete its DB file, its factory reset result will be included in factoryResetResultList of IoT event <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received<br>
17259          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17260          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17261          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
17262          *       // No parameter. 
17263          *   }</pre>
17264          *   </li>
17265          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17266          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17267          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17268          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17269          *   }</pre>
17270          *   </li>
17271          * </ul>
17272          *  
17273          * @since 1.22.2
17274          * 
17275          * @see
17276          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17277          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17278          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17279          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17280          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17281          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17282          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17283          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17284          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17285          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17286          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17287          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17288          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17289          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17290          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17291          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17292          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17293          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17294          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
17295          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
17296          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
17297          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
17298          *
17299          * @example
17300          * hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset({
17301          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
17302          *          console.log("requestFactoryReset onSuccess");
17303          *      }, 
17304          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17305          *          console.log("requestFactoryReset onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17306          *      }
17307          * });
17308          */
17309         hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset = function (param) {
17310             hcap_command("iot_request_factory_reset", param);
17311         };
17312         /**
17313          * Get versions of hcapmw, iotservice, core and bindings.<br>
17314          * 
17315          * @param {Object} param
17316          * <ul>
17317          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17318          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17319          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
17320          *       // {Object} s.versions - versions of JSON foramt when returnValue is true. If no binding is ready, "bindings" doesn't exist.
17321          *   }</pre>
17322          *   </li>
17323          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17324          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17325          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17326          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17327          *   }</pre>
17328          *   </li>
17329          * </ul>
17330          *  
17331          * @since 1.22.2
17332          * 
17333          * @see
17334          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
17335          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
17336          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
17337          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
17338          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
17339          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
17340          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
17341          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
17342          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
17343          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
17344          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
17345          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17346          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
17347          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
17348          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
17349          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
17350          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
17351          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
17352          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
17353          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
17354          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
17355          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
17356          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
17357          *
17358          * @example
17359          * hcap.iot.getVersions({
17360          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
17361          *          console.log("getVersions onSuccess : versions = " +  JSON.stringify(s.versions));
17362          *      }, 
17363          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17364          *          console.log("getVersions onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17365          *      }
17366          * });
17367          */
17368         hcap.iot.getVersions = function (param) {
17369             hcap_command("iot_get_versions", param);
17370         };
17371         hcap.iot.getThingListPrivate = function (param) {
17372             hcap_command("iot_get_thing_list_private", param);
17373         };
17374 		/** 
17375 		 * @namespace hcap.speech
17376 		 */
17377 		hcap.speech = { };
17378 		/**
17379 		 * Sets using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled or disabled.<br>
17380 		 * 
17381 		 * @param {Object} param
17382 		 * <ul>
17383 		 *   <li>{Boolean} param.enable [Required] - true : enable to speech recognition, false : disable.</li>
17384 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17385 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17386 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
17387 		 *       // No Parameter. 
17388 		 *   }</pre>
17389 		 *   </li>
17390 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17391 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17392 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17393 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17394 		 *   }</pre>
17395 		 *   </li>
17396 		 * </ul>
17397 		 *  
17398 		 * @since 1.22.2
17399 		 * 
17400 		 * @see
17401 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
17402 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
17403 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.decideHost">hcap.speech.decideHost()</a><br>
17404 		 *
17405 		 * @example
17406 		 * hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition({
17407 		 *      "enable" : true,
17408 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
17409 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
17410 		 *      }, 
17411 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17412 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17413 		 *      }
17414 		 * });
17415 		 */
17416 		hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition = function (param) {
17417 			hcap_command("set_speech_recognition", param);
17418 		};
17419 		/**
17420 		 * Gets whether using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled or disabled.<br>
17421 		 * 
17422 		 * @param {Object} param
17423 		 * <ul>
17424 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17425 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17426 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
17427 		 *       // {Boolean} param.enable - true if using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled. false if using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is disabled.
17428 		 *   }</pre>
17429 		 *   </li>
17430 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17431 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17432 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17433 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17434 		 *   }</pre>
17435 		 *   </li>
17436 		 * </ul>
17437 		 *  
17438 		 * @since 1.22.2
17439 		 * 
17440 		 * @see
17441 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
17442 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.setSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
17443 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.decideHost">hcap.speech.decideHost()</a><br>
17444 		 *
17445 		 * @example
17446 		 * hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition({
17447 		 *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
17448 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : get speech recognition = " + param.enable);
17449 		 *      }, 
17450 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17451 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17452 		 *      }
17453 		 * });
17454 		 */
17455 		hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition = function (param) {
17456 			hcap_command("get_speech_recognition", param);
17457 		};
17458 		/**
17459 		 * @namespace hcap.speech.HostType
17460 		 */
17461 		hcap.speech.HostType = {
17462 			/**
17463 			 * Not Support
17464 			 * @since 1.22.2
17465 			 * @constant
17466 			 */
17467 			NOT_SUPPORT : 0,
17468 			/**
17469 			 * HCAP Application is in charge of handling the speech recognition
17470 			 * @since 1.22.2
17471 			 * @constant
17472 			 */
17473 			APPLICATION : 1,
17474 			/**
17475 			 * The Pro:Centric platform is in charge of handling the speech recognition
17476 			 * @since 1.22.2
17477 			 * @constant
17478 			 */
17479 			TV : 2
17480 		};
17481 		/**
17482 		 * Decides who is in charge of handling the speech recognition.<br>
17483 		 * 
17484 		 * @param {Object} param
17485 		 * <ul>
17486 		 *   <li>{String} param.serviceType [Required] - STT result category.</li>
17487 		 *   <li>{String} param.actionType [Required] - STT result intent.</li>
17488 		 *   <li>{Number} param.hostType [Required] - host type defined <a href="hcap.speech.HostType.html">hcap.speech.HostType</a>.</li>      
17489 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
17490 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17491 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
17492 		 *       // No Parameter. 
17493 		 *   }</pre>
17494 		 *   </li>
17495 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
17496 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
17497 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
17498 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
17499 		 *   }</pre>
17500 		 *   </li>
17501 		 * </ul>
17502 		 *  
17503 		 * @since 1.22.2
17504 		 * 
17505 		 * @see
17506 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
17507 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.setSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
17508 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
17509 		 *
17510 		 * @example
17511 		 * hcap.speech.decideHost({
17512 		 *      "serviceType" : "id_time",
17513 		 *      "actionType" : "id_time_info",
17514 		 *      "hostType" : hcap.speech.HostType.APPLICATION,
17515 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
17516 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
17517 		 *      }, 
17518 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
17519 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
17520 		 *      }
17521 		 * });
17522 		 */
17523 		hcap.speech.decideHost = function (param) {
17524 			hcap_command("decide_host", param);
17525 		};
17526     }());
17527 }
